title: Great starter with tremendous room to grow
text: Absolutely as advertised, first flight was successful thanks to instructions and on-line help (available conveniently through app downloaded to Android phone.  Very complete package and capable enough to take beginners well beyond the basics with features rivaling machines in much high price brackets. Highly recommended for "pilots" looking for headroom to explore.

title: Should have tested it before gifting it ????
text: Bought this Dec 2018 as a gift and first time using on 5/19 one motor did not work and can't get it to work. Too bad for me since its out of warrenty... Not happy..

title: Great Drone
text:
I have flown this drone once and it was really easy to fly. The automatic take off and landing is really nice. It flew steady in the wind. The video quality is decent.
The options for the price point are well worth it.

title: Fun
text: Husband loves it

title: App issues
text:
So I just received this drone, and it's too early to leave a proper or complete review but I ran into a problem with the app right away.
I searched all over the internet, help areas from Holy Stone, YouTube, etc...without getting anywhere. The app simply wouldn't load properly on my phone, but I was able to get in touch with someone from Holy Stone and described my problem. After a couple of e-mails back and forth, he suggested that I set the WiFi on my phone to airplane mode. He explained that doing so should help prevent any interference from other WiFi signals and he was absolutely correct.
I haven't been able to really test fly the drone much yet, but I thought maybe I could share this information in the hopes that it may help others if they have any similar issues with the app.
I should point out, too, that the person who helped me from Holy Stone was really terrific and I am very pleased with their customer service!
Happy Flying, everyone!

title: I like this drone
text: I like this drone. It is good for beginners. And easy to learn. The remote control is great. However I don‚Äôt like when the drone is facing toward you, the controls become inverted. Overall I like this drone.

title: Horrible! Cheap! Can‚Äôt even fly!
text: Horrible! Not worth the money! Couldn‚Äôt even fly at 10 feet! Can‚Äôt handle a bit of wind at all!

title: Wonderful product, fabulous customer service
text: Customer service couldn‚Äôt have been any better or attentive

title: Husbands Birthday Gift
text: Gave this to my husband for his birthday, received email detailing blades were on bottom of box prior to giving him his drone, was a life save as may not have found them. Easily assembled, HS App loaded and he was off and flying in very little time. Excellent product for beginners. Would definitely recommend to anyone wanting a low cost reliable drone introduction

title: Fought like hell to get these to connect and work, worst of my 5 drones
text: Took forever fighting with setup to even to get these to connect and fly.  Once I finally fought through all the hoops and got the thing off the ground, I discovered that two of the motors won't run full speed so the drone immediately falls over and tries to destroy itself.  By far the most frustrating drone I've ever bought.  Snaptain connected and worked in seconds.  My Hubsan Zino 2+ took more effort than the Snaptain to get connected and running, but still a piece of cake compared to this Holy Stone disaster.  Just avoid and save yourself the hassle.

title: Easy to use!!!
text: Such a great drone. Was really concerned how hard it was to fly but seriously had it up and running in about 15 minutes. Was a little concerned it would be hard to fly but had no issues. Would highly recommend.

title: Holy Stone HS-100 Drone  Best on the Market
text:
Review..
As a Holy Stone HS-100 owner I sincerely love the drone. This drone has a lot of great reviews and features for the price and it‚Äôs definitely true. The GPS return home is very accurate and the follow me feature great!! The drone is fast and the maneuverability is fantastic. The HS-100 has different settings for beginners and for the advanced and so easy to learn.. I Truly love this drone with all the great features I highly recommend it also the customer support is just as important to me as the product who answers quickly. The drone is very easy on the wallet with hours of fun!

title: VERY GOOD BEGINNER AND WONDERFUL CUSTOMER SUPPORT
text:
This is my first drone and I am 85 yeard old. It has alot of features and is fun to learn how to operate.
I needed some help connecting my cell phone and recording the photos to my memory card. The HELP staff is teriffic and sticks with you until you get all problems solved.
The staff is polite and knowledegable.
When I move up to another drone it will be a Holy Stone.

title: Junk
text: Don‚Äôt buy! I‚Äôve been owning this for four months and it is nothing but problems! Seems like I can‚Äôt fly more than 3 flights before the battery is dead on the transmitter. So it was another waste of money spent on extra batteries for the drone. I‚Äôve never crashed it. It flys good. Just seems like every time I try to fly, there is a battery problem. Total waste of money. Don‚Äôt waste yours. It‚Äôs not all that! I‚Äôm pretty sure the 5 star reviews are fabricated!

title: The condition of the Drone
text: Excellent!  Works great!

title: Good for play and for work
text: This is my first drone had it up and flying in and hour after reading the manual and watching a few of the YouTube videos. Got some practice to do with it but I feel like won‚Äôt take long to be flying like a pro. I purchased this product for my work to inspect roof of buildings. The plan is to cut time by not having to set up ladders and from a safety stand point keeping me on the ground safe since I have to climb ladders alone. Once I have used this product more I will add to this review. As of now I feel it‚Äôs a great buy.

title: First time flyer and it is as easy as advertised
text: First time flyer and it is as easy as advertised. Reviews match all that it does. I am impressed.

title: Excellent Customer Service
text: Had a small issue and customer service got back with me the same day!  I was shocked to say the least.  Ended up being my fault as I didn‚Äôt calibrate the remote properly!

title: Great Drone for Flights under a Mile
text:
The battery is easily charged using my I-phone plug which means I can also use it from my car charger.
The controls work flawlessly and are easily learned. The camera records off an SD card and can be checked
in the field with my laptop!

title: setup was easy. First flight was simple using the auto take ...
text: Came fast, setup was easy.  First flight was simple using the auto take off and landing.  I like that it will stay in one place in the air with no effort.  Allows operator to focus on pics and video with worrying so much about flight. App works fine.  Camera could have been better.  I wanted my first real drone to be an easy learner and I seem to have found it.  Pretty darn fun.

title: Great drone, especially in this price range
text: Arrived on schedule, package was securely packed. Drone requires a little bit of a learning curve (not much). I was impressed with the quality, and all the capabilities this drone has. After putting it together took it out and was flying in no time. The pictures were clear, even from quite a bit of distance away. If I were in the market for another drone I would be buying this same brand.

title: Great drone for the money.
text: Great drone for the money. Very easy to maneuver.

title: Easy to fly pretty good drone.  Happy
text:
Easy to fly. Works great. Easy to connect. Videos to show you how if you struggle to follow the instructions. I love the landing feature and the hovering feature. Excellent choice for beginners. My only complaint is how long you have to charge the battery for the flight time and the camera quality isn't that great. But other than that I love my drone

I did have some issues with the remote after about a month, but customer services really wants 5 star reviews so they emailed me several times about my review. They did send me a whole new drone which I didn't ask them do but i did accept when the offered. It was really above and beyond. So they do have great customer service. But they also really really want 5 star reviews so do keep that in mind when you read all these reviews.

title: To noisy and clumsy  not good stability.
text: Camera don‚Äôt operate to good or don‚Äôt function sometimes also not to stable.

title: Good Product.  Bit of Hassle with Issue but got resolution.
text: Complained about Controller being broken out of the box and eventually got a replacement.  Had to go through a bit more hassle then I wanted to get it fixed but customer service eventually stepped up and took care of the problem.  Would have been a 5 star if I was rating on the product alone.

title: Great east to fly, non-profesional Drone, with Great advanced features for the money
text: Excellent Drone, especially for the price.  Fast Prime delivery service from Amazon, as usual.  This is a 2nd drone for me after much more toy-like Syma X5C, which gave me a good start in the basics, but HS100 is both Easy to Fly and MUCH more featured - at this price, incredibly so in my opinion.  Love the stability, altitude and position hold, auto takeoff and land via GPS, and strong wireless connection for FPV to HolyStone smartphone app (which also has many device controls and detail settings via the app (ie.e Flight "Fence" settings). Suggest making or buying a sunshade for smartphone for those sunny days.  Also like the easy batt charge via simple 2-amp Ph charger with charge meter on each Batt (extra batts are inexpensive also) Haven't had a chance to fly at Dusk yet but underside LED are big and bright, so should be fun.  Great logical layout controller also providing switch to Headless mode if needed.  Also like the remote tilt-controlled Cam.  Definitely a 5-Star from me.....

title: Very easy to fly
text:
This Holy Stone drone was very easy to setup and I quickly began to fly.

The instruction manual was relatively easy to follow and the app is quite good as well.

I've included some stills we took of a home under construction. The reviews are very good too.

Good value for price. The newer iterations have the higher resolution cameras which take this drone to a new level of cool.

Enjoy!

title: Not So Beginner Friendly
text:
Bought 2 for my sons for Christmas. Both had difficulty operating the drone. Takes plenty of practice for novice drone users.
Sent one back, calibration was not the easiest.

title: Unit flies fine but the controller has built in recharge battery and ...
text: Unit flies fine but the controller has built in recharge battery and it won't charge. Looks like most negative reviews have the same issue. Would the been a 5 start but they need to fix that problem first.

title: Good drone
text: Very easy to fly out of the box. Had a takeoff button that gets it to a safe height. Just have to fly it back close to you and hit the landing button and it will land itself. Comes with one battery which initially would not charge. Did an Amazon exchange and had very fast shipping. The drone is fun. Sensitive to wind and can‚Äôt see video once the drone is out of WiFi range but the drone itself and go pretty far.

title: CONTROLLER BATTERY NOT HOLDING CHARGE. STILL CANNOT FLY THIS DRONE.
text:
The only reason for low rating is that after 3-4 calls to Holystone's support, they still have not resolved the issue with a faulty controller.
The drone and the 'controller' have been fully charged numerous times. Then when I take the drone out for a flight, the controller gives me an error that the battery is too low. So apparently the battery is not holding it's charge from the time I fully charge it until 5 minutes later when I try to fly the drone. I still have not had one flight on this product and I purchased it 2-3 months ago.

title: Great Drone
text: This drone has some great qualities. It is steady when gps is on..I am not sure about the follow mode. Tried it a couple of times and it was not great. Lost itself often. Could need some improvement. Maybe a firmware upgrade. Can't beat it for the price.

title: Second Holy Stone drone!
text: This is our second Holy Stone drone.  We bought the F181 earlier this year as a "starter" drone for my son and I.  We had a great experience with the F181 and when I had questions regarding the product the customer service was amazing!  We recently ordered the HS100 because we were interested in the more high tech features, such as "come back to me" and "follow me".  These features work great and both drones have turned out to be a great opportunity for my son and I to bond and spend time together.  I highly recommend Holy Stone!

title: I really do not know where those good reviews came from?!?!
text:
In one word it is GARBAGE. In detail: propeller guards attached with screws that kept spinning so there is no "meat" to hold the tread. 5 mins into the flight. Left side of the joystick stop responding, so we were able to go up, down and turn around. Not able to move forward or backwards. 10 mins later landed and the sign for the battery turned red.
To top the "excitment" we replaced the battery in the drone and try to fly again, but without any luck because the remote battery died.

title: Easy to learn how to fly.
text: I love the drone.  It's easy to learn to use.  In no time I was flying like a pro.

title: Hmm...
text: Hard to get off the ground. My son complains the battery runs out to quick.

title: Good drone for the money, it's a ton of fun. Just make sure to get more batteries so you have enough fly time to enjoy your dron
text: The drone is great once you learn the controller. Wish batteries lasted longer and didn't  take so long to charge. We would recommend this drone to our friends and family. Received a free battery card with our order but still have not received our free battery. We ordered two more batteries and will have to order two more which will give us 5 batteries and once will receive our free one this will gives us 6 total batteries which will give us an hour or more of fly time.

title: Bought two - one broke on the 3rd take off (motor burned out)
text: We bought two and 1 broke on the 3rd take off. Had not crashed. It motor just stopped working. Customer service is very difficult to understand and and deal with. Not pleased. Also, the calibration method every time is super annoying. You get what you pay for.

title: Customer service is amazing.
text:
Edit to original review.
Customer service did send new drone and corrected the issue.
This did not meet any expectations. Bought for a gift. Waited to open 30 days after purchase has faulty battery. Customer required a 2 minute video but explained that the issue was the battery asked them to send replacement battery they never did

title: Decent drone
text: The directions are not real good for this thing. The sync and calibration are a pain at first. And for some reason you have to re-sync/calibrate all the time. The drone itself is really good. Easy to fly. Run time is a short 15 minutes so buy extra battery!

title: Had high hopes
text:
Just got the drone and charged the battery per instructions. Battery will just blink blue and will not hold a charge. I have emailed customer service and will update accordingly.

UPDATE:
I did order 2 more batteries and the drone flys great so far. Holystone was going to send a new battery but said it would take 15-21 days which is outrageous so they just suggested I ask for a replacement. That is coming but as I tell Amazon the one the are sending is not like the one in the photo and from the description has a downgraded camera. We will see when it arrives if they sent the correct one.

title: Old as New
text: This drone had to be returned. We ordered this as a new product and it came clearly used. It even had the return slip from the previous owner inside the box. It‚Äôs rotors were scuffed and there were marks on the drone body as well.

title: Fun and easy to learn! An amazing camera drone!
text:
This drone has been incredible. It has far exceeded my expectations!

I have owned and flown other drones in the past but they have always been difficult to control and break before I really get to master them. This drone is extremely simple to get started with and takes fantastic pictures! When you become more comfortable with it, the fast mode offers new challenges!

The GPS will both bring the drone back when the battery gets low and allow you to limit how far away the drone will fly. The gimble for the camera lets you take pictures from many angles.

I love flying and I try to fly this drone every day. Holy Stone makes a great product at a value price and also provides impressive service. I now want more drones and I plan to order them from Holy Stone.

title: Awesome
text: Drone works great, battery is short lived but the functions are all in working order and it is easy to use and can see myself coming back to order more from this company

title: Super easy to fly! Camera plastic is very cheap. Upgraded camera is a battery hog!
text:
I am writing this review to highlight what I liked and a couple of things I didn't. The drone arrived with fast as always free prime shipping. The box is proper and packaged securely. Assembly was simple even with instructions being in translated English. Pretty straight forward set up and calibration. I stayed in beginners mode for the first day to be safe. This is only my 2nd drone, and the first was a child toy that was junk. I was prepared for a few crashes while learning how to fly it. However, It was the exact opposite! This drone basicly flew itself. Easy take off, easy land! GPS and return home worked perfect! Very good beginner/hobby drone. I was very impressed with battery life and total control.

Now, I will say that my first crash was a bit upsetting. The drone went to "motor protection" mode and basically just fell from the sky with no control. I was pretty disappointed when I realized the camera had smashed to pieces... (not repairable) . I went back online and bought the upgrade version camera (1080p). Plug and play simple install.

The upgrade 1080p camera works well, but has been a battery hog and cuts flight time in half. There is no option to buy a replacement 720 camera or I would go back to it.

title: Great drone for a beginner
text: Very easy to fly, easy set up and the Camera is great.

title: Very fun drone at great price
text: Such a fun toy. Although not really accurate to call it a ‚Äútoy,‚Äù given how cool and sophisticated it is. Camera quality is fantastic ... able to easily take great pics and video with just a click of a button, and the images automatically go right into Photos on my iPhone.  I had an issue with controlling the droned, called the company, and they provided outstanding service.  Very happy with my purchase!

title: So much fun!
text:
UPDATE 12/29/18: Well I had given up hope as I had not heard anything back from customer support for several weeks...then out of the blue I received an email from holy stone customer support apologizing for the late response and indicating that a new transmitter/controller would be sent in the mail immediately...WOW!! I received the confirmation email with tracking info for the package within hours of the above email once my mailing address was confirmed...This was definitely a nice surprise and I am so glad that holy stone is standing by their product and providing quality customer service...The kids and I are very much looking forward to getting our drone back in the air! Thanks holy stone for your outstanding product support!

EDIT: After Several months of use the transmitter/controller for the drone has stopped taking a charge/working (Noticed many other reviews indicate the same issue). I have contacted Holy Stone custo/mer support and left messages regarding the issue and what they can/will do to assist. Will update if I hear anything back.

Great drone for the novice or professional. Very easy and fun to put together and it was super easy to fly after reading through the instructions/how to booklet. My kids loved watching it fly and they were super excited to look at the pictures and movies the drone could take from way up high. Super fast shipping, packaged very well and customer support seems to be on top of things. Thanks!

title: Big drone for little money
text: [[VIDEOID:fe5726dd8fa08012ceff997d1f99fff7]] Camera is great quality and it's super easy to fly. Took it up over 1000ft and could have went higher. Still getting used to flying it!

title: Thank you for the fast shipping looks really cool haven't taken it out yet do to weather easy ...
text: Thank you for the fast shipping looks really cool haven't taken it out yet do to weather easy instructions

title: Ok
text: Ok

title: Good Drone, OK Camera Horrible Batteries
text: The Drone is easy to learn and fly, it's a decent product. The Camera is OK, if you want a quality picture, you will need to spend much more. The batteries though are not the best and that's frustrating. I would get if the drone came with "more" batteries and you didn't have to buy after-market batteries.

title: It is nice to fly
text:
The first one had a problem with the Micro SD card insertion, it kept going above where it should have, I had to twice remove it with a Dental Pic.

So after the first day I had to return it, I am waiting for my Prime card to get credited but after calling Amazon and printing the return label, I did order another one right away.

It is nice to fly, when you let go of the controls it stays where it is. I also flew it on a windy day and it basically stayed in the same spot.

It comes with a 8mb sd card and reader, nice perk.

You really can't mess up, well worth the money, it sells for 249.99 but there was a $30.00 coupon so it came to 249.00

title: excellent even for beginners
text: This company is awesome.  they even package extra parts in case of breakage due to crash.  it happens.  they do not gouge you for all the extras.  i am impressed how easy this is to learn to fly.  I am a beginner and already having hours of fun

title: This newest HolyStone drone is absolutely the best so far.
text: Good news. Bad news. The good news is that this drone is a beast. It's the best one I've ever flown. It is fast. It's quick. It's very maneuverable and it's stable in flight. I took some video that I can see on my phone but the file was too big to transfer. So I'll go out tomorrow and try for a shorter one. It was only about 5-6 minutes but it wound up being over 30mb and my phone just refused to send it anywhere. But this bird is fabulous. Besides the fact that the customer service with this company is about the best I've ever seen, this drone is on the way to giving DJ some serious competition. The quality of the video is really good and I'm so sorry I couldn't show it but I'll have something better up tomorrow. I would recommend this drone without reservation. Had a chance to go out and fly again. Unfortunately it's Saturday and I went to the park and it was full. LOL. Kids and dogs everywhere. BUT, when you've gotta fly, you've gotta fly. So here's my first video with the HS 100. It's a little jerky I know. I'll have to learn to be a little smoother. But I was impressed with the color of the video and the stability of the flight itself. Great bird.

title: Great company
text: Very easy to fly

title: Amazing product!
text: I got this for my husband for his birthday and he absolutely loves it. He flies it every afternoon after work üòÜ. Amazing product!!
AWESOME.....well worth the price and (YES) I would purchase this drone again.

title: Missing parts, cheap product
text: Item came in damage box, was obviously opened and missing the wings. Also, after opening and looking at the product, the drone appears to be a cheaply made, flimsy model, and the model does not come with a carrying case. Luckily it was tampered with and missing parts so I could return it the same day it arrived

title: Great drone for the price and even if it were more expensive.
text:
I have had a large drone for a few years and I hardly ever used it because it was too much of a hassle with the extra gas box, the pairing, and the lack of a controller (it used an iPhone). While easy to fly it wasn‚Äôt easy to get pictures.
Then along came the HS270. I ordered this one after researching a number of lower cost drones. I like it is a folding drone, has a good battery and the camera is HD. It also has a remote control and pairs easily with my phone and the drone.
Flying is very easy. The calibration takes a little to get used to but once you‚Äôre done it takes off without any glitches.
Once in the air it is easy to take a picture on the phone with a push of a button on the controller. Same with a video. It saves directly to my phone which makes it much easier for sharing.
I guess it has brushes in the motors (which I have read isn‚Äôt as good as a brushless motor) but I haven‚Äôt noticed any issue with them.

Pros:
Great drone, great price, easy to fly.

Cons:
The camera is very wide which causes a fisheye effect on pictures of the horizon. That would be my only complaint but it is very detailed so that offsets it.

What else would I consider? The Holy Stone HS720 looks to be a great drone as well.

My price range is under $300 so this was a great deal.

title: BUY IT NOW
text: I've only ever owned this drone, but I have to say it's easy to use, easy to learn and I absolutely love it.  It goes really high, fast, great quality video. OMG I bought one for my gf too.

title: Great drone. Great customer service
text: Great drone for the price. Camera is a little shaky when moving but great value and still takes clear pictures. Customer service is Amazing. My drone would not fly off longer than a few mins and they were super responsive and sent a new battery in a few days.

title: Great but.
text: Bought this for a give away for a convention. Awesome product.

title: Lots of bang for the buck!  AND even better:  My husband can fly this without crashing!
text: I got this for my husband's birthday.  He bought cheap ones which were impossible to fly and of course they all crashed making them unusable.  He was very discouraged and gave up.  Then there was prime day. I had a coupon and saw the Drones were on sale.  Well, I read thru many reviews and watched videos!  A Lot! I have to say that this Drone in my opinion was the best choice.  It has many of the features of more expensive Drones, comes with extra parts and good tech support for the price was great!  G.P.S., auto return if the battery is going dead, can land on its own or it can follow you around to take pictures of you and much more!  How cool.  Even the camera is pretty good and better than many of them out there for the same or more expensive price.  It was awesome to see my husbands face when he opened his gift.  He immediately started watching the video tutorials on this device.  Which I have to say are very good. He was so pleased to find out how user friendly this Drone is.  I am really glad I purchased this for him!

title: Great customer service
text: Enjoy this drone! Customer service has been exceptional.

title: Great first drone!
text: This was a Christmas present.  The unit needed some assembly, but that went very well.  I could follow the instructions quite easily.  I am a total novice.  There were several videos on their website and YouTube about flying the HS100.  I went out armed with a good bit of familiarity of the drone and controller from the videos.  The unit has is capably to use your cell phone as a real time video link to the drone camera - you can shoot videos and take still pictures.  I have not been able to get his part working yet, but I do know it does work (there are videos of it from non-company people showing it happening).  The camera does work from the controller, you just cant see exactly what you are shooting at.  I have no worries that we will figure out what is going on.  The Holy Stone support is very good and very patient (remember I said I am a novice drone operator).  They also have a pretty active FaceBook page with a good bunch of user participation.  I highly recommend Holy Stone, this drone (the HS100) and think this will be the beginning of a long relationship.

title: Great product and great customer service
text: I have been flying RC helicopters for years, but this was my first GPS drone. It makes flying much more pleasant, without worrying about fighting the wind or losing the model. Everything worked as advertised, and the first flight was the most enjoyable I have ever experienced. The AP worked flawlessly and it was great to see the real time video and drone status right from my cell phone. I had one small issue though. After the first flight I noticed one of the LED covers was missing. Apparently it had fallen off during the first flight. I contacted Holy Stone for a replacement and worked with a representative named Ally. It turns out they did not have any LED covers available. Ally continued to work on this and stayed in contact with me until he came of with a a resolution which was I was very pleased with. He offered to send me a non-working unit that I could use for spare parts. I have not experienced this level of customer service from any of the other RC manufacturers I have dealt with. This has made me a committed Holy Stone customer. Thank you Ally.

title: Very customer focused company!
text: i received this drone, but it was unfortunately defective. Holy Stone customer support was great as they were quick to try and solve the problem, but unfortunately this one just needed to go back to Holy Stone, so I returned it without issue. I ended up purchasing a professional DJI drone for much more, even though Goly Stone offered to replace the drone. I passed as I just decided to go with something more for professional use. I later received an email from Cathy S. at Holy Stone, who offered me a free gift to offset my troubles. Cathy was great and my gift arrived in a couple of days! Overall, Customer Support (Cathy) at Holy Stone is some of the best I‚Äôve experienced.

title: Easy to use
text: Bought this for when the grand kids visit.  They figure out how to get it going and love it.  Good quality and works great.

title: Does NOT come with charger.
text: I haven't tested this out yet. But keep in mind it does NOT come with a charger. I will update as soon as I test it out.

title: Great Beginner Drone
text:
Alright, first drone I didn't think came with propellers they were stored under the foam box. So if you think you are missing them, flip the foam box over.

First flight:

This drone was easy to fly. One button takeoff and landing really helps a novice flyer like myself. Was a little windy and drone flew well as the wind started to pick up. When the wind got a little to much for my skill level, one touch landing saved the day.

Controller:
The camera is not working on my controller. I will try it again on my second flight. The clasp that holds your phone could be better. My phone slipped out a couple times on my first flight.

I still need to try the follow me more, next flight. Overall, I am happy with my purchase. Flying was made easy with this drone. I have no experience in drone flying and after about 10 mins I was comfortable flying around a little on the beginner settings. The camera quality could be a little better 1080p etc but 720p video is still good. I would recommend this product to others.

Only 2 negatives I have are not being able to move camera up or down, and the blades are a pain to install.

Any advice on gimble dial troubles would be much appreciated.

Update:

First drone controller didn't charge and camera would not go up or down. I returned it no hassle and glad I bought another one. OMG this drone is so fun and easy to fly. I have no experience and was flying this well after 3 flights. My 12 yo daughter has flown it as well. She had a blast.

I tried using follow me mode and it actually worked. I expected this function not to work from YouTube vids and forums, but mine did. I just followed the instructions to the letter.

Watch wind speeds, any drone in this weight class I'm sure would have trouble in higher winds. I took it out for a flight one afternoon and the wind was calm. Half way through my flight winds picked up to 20mph and started pushing the drone around. I clicked home and it fought it's way back to me safely.

Fast shipping, great product, and easy for a beginner. If you are looking for a good beginner drone, this is it.

title: Difficult to remove battery.
text: I've had the HS100 for 2 weeks. This is my first drone. So far I have busted the landing gear by pushing the emergency stop button and watching it fall from 6'.  On second flight, I panicked thinking it was going to crash into the side of my house and pushed the ES button. Luckily, the drone comes with spare landing legs. That won't happen again. The battery takes some force and is crazy hard to remove. You have to be careful not to damage the machine or your finger nails removing it.

title: Works great
text: This is the best drone I've ever had; especially for the money. I've flown the higher end drones as well and the only difference is that this doesn't have the controllable gimbal camera. It's fixed straight ahead but the high def is great. It also tends to lose camera control but if you turn the video on before you launch then you get what you get.

title: Easy, great performance and control. Fun to fly!
text: Easy to understand instruction book, not too long, quick reference. Auto features allowed quick flying experience with intuitive control. 1080 camera excellent. Return to home & auto landing when battery is low is a great feature. GPS and wifi links worked reliably. Great product!

title: Excellent Product and Value
text: I‚Äôve provided pictures of the unboxing experience. Very nice box and packaging to protect the drone during shipping. The blades seemed to be missing, but they are stored on the underside of the protective styrofoam. Drone is constructed very well and feels solid. In comparison to my Syma X5C, this is like a Cadillac. The instructions are very clear and easy to read, unlike other drone manuals I‚Äôve seen. I highly recommend going on YouTube and watching quick demos which show how to set this up for the first time. I had trouble with calibration until I finally connected the app, which walks you through the process and makes it much more simple. The only other trouble I had was getting the screws into the caps for the blades. For some reason the screws sunk in far enough so that the caps slid on for the A sides, but coincidentally on the B sides the screws wouldn‚Äôt sink in far enough so I forced the caps on but the are a little uneven and wonky. That aside, I took it for a quick flight tonight since the drone had enough of a charge for a quick 5 minute flight. This thing flies like a dream, you press ‚Äútake off‚Äù and it just fired up the engines and then launches into a hover at about 3 feet. Very smooth operation, and I turned the variable speed all of the way down since I was in a small yard and it was dark. Excellent for beginners, but I can tell that there‚Äôs so much more to offer for the advanced drone enthusiast. All of the beginner features can be turned off, so I hope to slowly advance with this drone over time. A very good purchase and I highly recommend.

title: 1st one not working got a replacement, second one not working
text: The first drone, the camera, stopped tilting after very little use.  Figured it was just a fluke, so got a replacement.  The replacement was flown 3 short times and one of the motors stopped spinning.  Sending it back and getting a refund.

title: Easy to learn fun to fly
text: Easy to learn fun to fly!

title: Horrible, don't buy!
text: I'd trusted the reviews and ordered this but I was wrong. The drone is hard to control, when I took it off and lift 50 feet high, it doesn't listen to the remote any more, it raised up itself and flied away, I lose $280. I owned some other drones and know how to fly them. This is not a reliable drone than I expected. Also the material is cheap made, price should be lower than $100. Total waste of my money!

title: Nice, easy to fly
text:
Very nice drone. Easy set up &flys great. Actually a very good price point for this drone. All the features you could want in a beginner/ intermediate.
Thanks Holystone!

title: Service and courtesy.
text:
About a year ago I bought a Holy Stone HS 100 GPS drone.
Well the warranty had expired before I tried to fly it, what with having to apply and receive my FAA license and the hot AZ weather etc..
Long story, after scrupulously following the instructions, I lifted it off and with a big smile on my face, I toggled the forward command and off it went, and went, and went, never to be seen again.
Well after expressing my disappointment on Amazon, I got a message from the manufacturer, nice guy called Max, who said that in spite of the expired warranty, considering the circumstances, he would look into it. Last week I decided to give them a call back. Got a nice lady, Mila, who apologized for the inconvenience and would place an order for me....day before yesterday, brand new drone shows up.ü§óü§óü§ó
I would have to give a 10+++ for their service and business ethics. I cannot remark on the product quality as yet, but I have confidence that the first model must have been a fluke, a glitch or something as I haven't seen any complaints on line from other purchasers.
In any case my experience with HolyStone has been positive and I can vouch for the integrity of the company.
W. Williams

title: Excellent Beginner Quadcopter
text:
My fiance bought me the HS100 for my birthday knowing that I had been wanting a "hobby" drone for a while. I had a much smaller and cheaper Holy Stone that I flew around the house and basement so this was a logical step up. I've worked in a hobby shop and have quite extensive experience with RC cars, planes, and helicopters, but never had anything other than a small "toy" drone before the HS100.

I probably spent an hour assembling it, reviewing the manual, and watching a few YouTube videos while the drone battery and controller batteries charged. They're standard micro USB which makes it super convenient to charge on the go or in the car.

I took it outside in our front yard with a light breeze. I used the auto take-off and landing function a few times just to make sure everything worked. The first battery I never let the drone get more than ~50 feet from me just to familiarize myself with it and build up a level of trust and comfort. This thing is incredibly steady and easy to fly. I never expected a drone at this price point to fly so well.

The biggest downfall is the video can be a bit shaky since there's no image stabilization or true gimbal. However, at this price point, I can forgive that. Also, the Android app could use a little work and the LED indicators on the controller can be difficult to see in direct sunlight. None of these are major issues or would keep me from recommending the HS100 to a friend.

title: great bang for your buck.
text: its flight is pretty smooth and has great control.  it was difficult syncing the remote to the drone which created a low battery warning on device--although once synced(basic up/down movement on remote), had no troubles.  We are very happy with our purchase.  I would recommend all future buyers to read all the customer questions/answers, and the reviews that will answer all your questions.  It's a fun device!

title: Great product
text: The drone is great for the price.

title: Easy to fly and always returns on low power or loss of signal.
text: Very easy for beginner to fly right out of the box. Really appreciate the altitude hold function when recording videos. The return to home function really works so you should not fear losing the HS100. Great flying time of approx. 15 minutes. Provides for a great flying experience.

title: Great Drone to learn on!!
text: Really like this product, for the money it can't be beat!

title: Easy to use
text: This was a Christmas gift.  Found it easy to use right out of the box - not for first time users.  Is stable in windy conditions.  Good picture quality.  Like the GPS and return home feature

title: Great value
text: Lot of fun and the features are really nice: GPS, phone controls, return home and dead battery return are among my favorites.

title: Great customer service
text: I'm 65 years old and bought this to use to scout some cutover land that joins my property.  Im currently just leaning to fly the drone and am having a blast.  The packaging was perfect and the instructions were easy to follow taking about 15 minutes to put together.  It comes with spare landing base and 4 replacement propellers.  In a few more practice sessions I will be ready to take Ariel photos of the cutover land.  For the money it is the best I could find that would meet my needs.

title: The free battery that comes with it when you write a report
text: It is a great product I would suggest it to anyone holystone GPS kept RP CD drone HS 100

title: Great Product
text: This is my second Holy Stone drone. I also have the 70. I really like the GPS features of the drone to return home. It also has great distance that it goes. Only drawback is at those extreme distances it loses WiFi/camera function at times. Overall this is the best drone I have owned. Would buy another one for sure.

title: About HS100 drone
text: This is a very nice drone, it has all it is needed to have fun, currently using for business and it has been a hit, we can do marketing for my cousin's dealer and the video quality is awsome and pretty easy to work with. Definetively it worth the price and it is an excellent product. Will recommend for sure.

title: Great Buy
text: Bought for the husband and he is very happy with the drone. Flies very high. Has good quality photos.

title: This drone has it all!
text: This drone has the best features available to make sure that you have the best experience possible. This is the drone that matters and is worth every penny.

title: Great drone! Great fun!
text:
I purchased thus drone last June along with a spare battery. I have been flying it several times a week. It is absolutely the easiest Drone to use to fly. The beginner mode makes it very easy to launch, control and land the drone. Flight is stable and smooth. Movies it can record are fairly good quality. Even the wife enjoys flying it.
The only nit I had with it, was that the included battery would not charge beyond half way. My drone came with a card for a free battery, so I figured no real harm done. I would advise charging the battery BEFORE assembling the drone in case of an issue. The other battery and one I subsequently purchased have been fine.

title: A real drone not a toy
text: This is my fourth drone , actually I it‚Äôs my first the other I have had were toys. This is a real drone that is entry level into the drone world. Easy to fly, great pictures. Has a lot of the features of the more expensive models, but for the money you can‚Äôt beat it. I wish I didn‚Äôt waste my money üí¥ on previous toys. Good buy.

title: So far - Very Pleased.
text:
Excellent drone. Nicely packaged. Nicely presented. The assembly was fairly easy however the instructions left out a small detail about looking for a countersunk hole in a small black ring that you assemble to the prop shafts, so you might consider looking for an assembly video on Youtube.

Paired up nicely to my Samsung 8+. I have an Otterbox so I was worried about the phone fitting in the transmitter, but it did.

I don't have a lot of experience with it yet but I love it so far. Decent photos and videos that I'll add to my 'home movies'. I loved that, while of course it saves to the on-board chip, it also saves to your phone as it records.

title: For the price its good. I mean it tries hard to do a ...
text: For the price its good.  I mean it tries hard to do a washed down version of a another drone.  If you can spend 2.5x more you can go all the way.  It works and it flys, but for 2.5X more in money you can get 10x the features, quality, charging time, everything.  The return to home feature worked great.  Camera was eh.  Range for video was only wifi, but what do you expect for the price.  I changed my mind.... It's GREAT for the price.  The GPS was solid.

title: Great little gps capable drone for the price.
text: I recently bought this drone as a gift for someone new to drones/quadcopters. Assembly is quick and relatively painless. It‚Äôs easy to get it flying quickly and really stable in flight. The camera is good quality, although a little shakey at times. The only complaint seems to be battery life (10-15 minutes flight time). But overall seems like a great little drone for the price.

title: Great Drone - easy to operate and fun to fly!
text: I bought this drone for my husband's birthday.  He's wanted one forever.  It was very easy to put together and be ready for flight.  Controls were easy to use...so easy that our 10 year old daughter had no problems.  This is a very good starter drone.  It has one button take-off and land, the return home button and the videos and pictures that it takes look very good.  You get about 15 minutes of flight time on a full battery charge which, from what I read, is pretty good.  The only small knock is the time it takes to charge the battery - 3 to 6 hours.  This is solved by getting multiple batteries and just charge them all up the night before you go flying.  My husband and I highly recommend this drone!

title: Knowing I can get fast service with HolyStone‚Äôs service personnel
text: I‚Äôd like to thank Max @ Holy Stone for all the help he gave me....with HS 100 drone.....there was a problem with electronics on the drone. It couldn‚Äôt be fixed properly so Max sent me a replacement HS 100....now I‚Äôm a happy drone pilot again ....Merry Christmas

title: Good drone to start

title: Amazing gift
text: My husband love it so much.

title: Great Drone for new flyers
text:
Received my HS100 Monday and assembly was "by the book" and easy. Charged the battery (wish it was quicker). Watched many YouTube videos about first flight and read manual cover to cover , several times. Pairing, GPS setup and Android smartphone setup went "textbook".
Out to the yard and first careful flight was perfect. I have no previous drone experience but this drone made it easy. I'll be venturing into more distant flights with some of the other features soon.
I do recommend the HS100 to all new and in intermediate flyers.

text:
I have friends with really expensive drones. Some have paid as much as $2000. While the HS100 isn't quite as good as those drones (not as accurate with GPS, etc.) the HS100 does a fantastic job. I've only had it a short time and love how easy it is to fly. It's easy to figure out. It has a beginners mode that can be gradually increased to expert with sliders in various areas of functionality.

The auto-takeoff, return home and auto-land make everything a breeze!

title: Good quality,  ease of setup and use
text: Very nice quality drone. Easy to setup and use. It quickly acqire GNSS signal having both GPS and GLONASS reception capability.

title: nice drone
text: i am a beginner pilot new to flying drones and i can say this drone is quite easy to fly be sure to always use the gps mode as it returns home if you get the drone out of control like anything it takes practice to get the hang of it but follow the instructions and you'll be flying in no time i had a few questions syncing the camera to my phone and customer support was great! i was impressed with the time they took making sure everything was working properly i give 5 stars to holy stone!

text: Great drone for the price you pay.It has features that higher priced drones have..And the customer service is the BEST.Had a problem with my transmitter,called customer and within a week had a new one.No questions asked.

title: Great product, Excellent Customer Service
text: Out of the box, the drone worked great.  After 2 months, the camera stopped responding to commands and now only points straight down after a minuter or two of being in the air. Found the email address of customer service in the app and they have been most helpful. Sending out a new camera.  I would buy from them again.

title: A *Great* First Drone
text: This quadcopter (drone) is designed to be someone's first drone.  Given that goal it knocks the ball out of the park.  It is responsive, has a pretty good camera, and is a lot of fun to fly.  There are a few negatives, though, since this isn't a $4,000 drone.  The assembly instructions aren't quit right (the camera is already installed so those directions aren't needed; screws packaged as "extra" are needed for the initial assembly; etc.)  The tradeoff between battery weight and flight time gives it only about 20 minutes aloft before a recharge.  And it is a bit stubborn sometimes to pick up a GPS signal - which is required for the thing to fly.  However, the positives of price and overall quality make up for the negatives.  I recommend this as a first drone to see if you like the hobby, and for basic use.

title: Quality Drone, great price!
text: Awesome quality drone. Bought this for my husband and he absolutely loves it!!

title: Fun
text: Lots of fun and clear video.

title: Great drone for beginners
text:
This is a great beginner drone! I'm 67 years old and have absolutely no experience flying drones. My grandson got one for Christmas and after failing miserably to help him get it flying I decided to see if there were any easier drones to learn on. I read a lot of reviews and finally settled on the HS100. It's a good starter drone for me and although a bit more expensive it's still affordable. I'm impressed with how easy it was to get ready to fly. The only real issue I had was installing the screws that attached the props. Maybe Holy Stone will come up with a more user friendly way to do this but it doesn't detract from the overall satisfaction I have with the product.
First flight was amazing. I went to Holy Stones web site and viewed a couple videos to show how to set up and fly. After calibrating the compass and getting GPS acquired, I set the throttle to the lowest setting and pushed the button for take-off. It responded quickly but not fast enough to make me nervous. I tried out all the functions and they all performed perfectly.
If your looking for a great starter drone you should give this one a try.

title: Didnt lose this one first flight
text:
straight out of the box I had it up and running pretty quickly. My previous drone experience was to take a Christmas present outside after crashing it in the house too much. I launched it and watched it disappear as I was pushing buttons/dials/knobs to no avail.
Not a problem with this unit.
Still working with this unit practicing my technique. Looking forward to getting some great video and images.

title: Weak WiFi link
text:
This drone falls far short in many areas. Worst of which is the WiFi link drops when you are about 100ft away then you lose video feed on your tablet or VR goggles. The second major problem is that it is unstable in even a 5mph wind. If it's up when the wind starts, good luck getting it to land. It starts flying circles around the landing site because it hasn't the control for the GPS autopilot to land it. Eventually it hits the ground and tumbles to a stop.

Keep shopping.
