Awesome little drone! I love it.
It would be nice to have a couple more. :)

title: Best in price range. Best Support ever. Free Battery. GPS/Camera/App all work great, anywhere.
text:
[[VIDEOID:7e4d839804980bfb00cad091ea6d8ec5]] Ok, story time first...I had gotten a TRNDLabs Fader from the Marlboro Rewards program which is a cool little toy...if it worked. It refused to connect to any of my three phones, including a Galaxy S9, K7 (older), and a KeyONE through any app that should have allowed it, simply not in the WiFi list.

So no camera, support was terrible and I was impatient..well, my first real flight outdoors it flew off back to Hong Kong for all I know, with no camera and it just taking a stroll all by itself I will never be sure.

That was my first drone...talk about a hobby killer.

I decided to give this hobby one last shot, did tons of research and came across this little diamond in the rough, a little more expensive than the Fader, (both on sale at the time of this review), but with many more features such as GPS (a must for beginners who don't want to buy 7 drones in a month), return home, follow me, and an app that actually works!

Not only does it work and connect even in a packed signal zone, it confirms your GPS, the camera is great and it provides enough control to return and land your drone along with others features I haven't even tried to use yet.

I have no idea why it didn't have great ratings, I am a dev myself and I think it works flawlessly, although I can't speak for its full feature set, I can say it has enough to save your butt if your controller gives you an issue or your not using it at the time (I.E. You set the drone to follow you).

As you can guess, I was pretty pensive about bringing a drone to the great outdoors again for a first flight after that experience...well, i'm over that fear.

Not only is customer support fast and responsive, they are truly behind their products...even sent me out a crash pack after crashing indoors out of my own stupidity, since I was truly afraid to test it outside when I contacted them about one touch landing with the controller.

NOTE:

Give the drone a bit of time to reach the expected takeoff height or redo your calibration, that turned out to be the issue in my case.

With that out of the way, lets get down to the meat and bones of what I can say so far with the limited testing I have been doing while working with support over that.

Pros:

This is pretty long so for impatience sake, It does EVERYTHING it says it does, and I mean everything, without fail...and if it doesn't, customer support will handle it in a heatbeat.

But here is the long version anyways.

GPS, Camera, Controller, and App all function great, it had good signal even near a Wendy's and an ATM that were open, and a closed Dunkins which I have guest saved WiFi signal from saved on my phone. I still had perfect signal

Return home when I tried it (after my indoor crash) was a tad off the exact placement, but not enough to bother you unless you set up a landing pad with a bullseye on it...or your foolish enough to fly it off the edge a cliff lol.
That may have been because of my propellors at the time being banged up, even then it flew ten times better than my Fader did without any trimming (a more precise calibration) needed, and I did do the trimming on the Fader.

It truly hovers in place after the one button takeoff and it even has a beginner mode to prevent you from flying too far or too high (in the phone app settings) which you can later change for more advanced flight.

It will also return home itself if you go beyond that or if the battery on either the drone or controller gets dangerously low.

Did I mention its a toy that isn't a toy?

When I put this together like a 6 yr. olds Christmas gift I thought I got a new tonka truck and was quite disappointed at first.

It had an almost fully charged battery in the package, same with the controller, attach two landling legs with a twist and insert motion, attach the camera and twist to click (which has a protective cover on it that feels cheap, but does the job)...and you can literally start flying it on the spot. I charged the battery and controller fully personally, but it can be done if you wanted to test it right away.

Oh ya, the point of all this. As I said, I crashed indoors my first flight...those propellors can move something beautifully scary, the sound it made hitting the low table made me think I destroyed one of the two.
If I did, it was the table (meh, who cares)...because the drone still flies good enough to insult most others, even in reviews.

I'm gonna be frank, I can't drive a decently fast remote control car to save my life, I have only flown the Fader before this which was obviously defective...and I already have this spinning 360 degrees in a circle to catch myself on camera, tilting to the side in the air (so tempted to try a full flip), this has simple flight controls, 3 skill (speed) settings, and does exactly what you press when you press it.

It's easy to fly, but has enough options to make remembered all the buttons more of a process than flying itself due to all the options...it can be switched into headless mode (direction you press is the direction it goes...regardless which direction the drone is in)

A major plus, it has VR mode right on the app, still looking for a good headset right now...thats gonna be a blast. I have a wired Oculus Rift so I know how VR is in general, but flying in real life surroundings in VR...thats a whole new box of joy.

Cons:

Battery charging time for such a short flight time is a nightmare, along with the price of batteries...but I knew this when I purchased the drone, so to knock off stars for it would be unfair, and pretty ridiculous on my part.

The lower priced versions with less visual quality and no GPS on Amazon come with a spare AND a carrying case, both of which I need to get next.

I do suggest a few batteries for this one, charging time is 3+ hours, but I gotta say its worth it...The camera is beautiful even at night and GPS is a must for anyone new to the hobby who is flying near anything that could cause them to lose sight of the drone...or you risk a Fader fly away like what happened to my first drone heh.

As I said about others having a carrying case, this could use one, taking the legs off and on to put it in the box, which does have a carrying handle at least, would get annoying constantly especially if your walking 15 minutes with it to get about the same flight time on a single battery. Again, I was aware and its not a deal breaker...its worth investing a little extra for this one, it really is just that good.

Update:
Found alot of things mentioning a free battery, its true. Got one on the way, and I even found it under the gallery in the App (I do not know if it was a recent update).

the customer consideration/care/support from this company is beyond what people make it out to be. I can't recommend buying a drone anywhere else--and I have had mine approx. a month.

The Ugly:

The one thing the Fader had on this drone is the sleek design, this thing is a beast and not very pretty...but you don't see shrek getting stuck on a tiny tree branch either, so it has a plus side at the same time.

Conclusion:

Buy? Now.

Buying? Battery+++

Walking? Case.

Problem? Support.

Searching? Stop.

------------------
Am I Satisfied?
------------------

Beyond what I thought was possible after the first drone. Best Bang for your buck right here, without question...and the support is truly one of a kind, I got responses through the Amazon app at 1 AM and 4 AM at certain points during my takeoff concern since I was flying at night, I live in the city and my options are limited right now.

On a last note, this does require being registered, I don't see this as a pro or a con, since needing to do this means you have a big boys toy...but it is a minor annoyance in some peoples eyes.

title: For beginners and not for photo or video
text:
Cool GPS drone. This full size drone will perform great if you follow the instructions well. it's reliable and robust.
The box will have all you need and some cool extras to show how proud this people are for their product. Talking about that, I promise you that you will not find more dedicated people anywhere else. You might not need services, but if you do you will be amazed like I was.
I complained about the camera low quality, they didn't think twice, they heard us and have a better camera - The contacted me when I thought that was the end of it. they want to know if I am happy with the product and they will follow up till you are. Made me feel like a millionaire.
10 Starts for the company and people working there.

title: This is a nice drone, with great features
text: This is a very nice and well built drone, with great features. It was easy to set up. After I charged the batteries and followed the instructions so that my transmitter would communicate with my drone, I was up and flying very quickly. I‚Äôm delighted to be able to fly this drone even when there‚Äôs wind, which I couldn‚Äôt do with my previous drone. The screws for the fixed rings are tiny and were slightly challenging for me to get started (but hey, my vision is not what it once was). Bye.... I‚Äôve got to go fly...

title: This drone is so easy to fly
text: The drone is really fun to fly. It is so easy to fly with the help is altitude hold and has good stability. It has comparable features to the other higher end platforms, features like return home and lond range. I am not going to get into all the details, as other reviewers have done that quite nicely already. What I do want to convey is that the drone is fun, and takes really nice photos and video. I really enjoy flying it, and really like the controller, and the software. It does give nice long flight times which is 12 -15mins as advertised.

title: Excellent for beginners and intermediate dronies alike
text: This was actually a gift for me and when I opened the box I was pleasantly surprised with what I saw. The drone itself is a sleek black beauty with white and blue navigation lights for easy configuration and navigation. Setting it up was no problem either as there are plenty of spare parts and screw drivers to assemble the props. The camera is a 720p wide - angle that offers great views in FPV mode. My battery time was about 13 minutes. I didn't open her up as far as speed or put her through a full test yet, but what I see so far I like. I'll follow up after a few more flights.

title: Very nice for the price!
text: Very nice first drone. i am a true newbie. only having one drone before that i broke kinda quick. this Drone seems simple enough even for me. A big easy drone in the wind (I live near the water) Lots of cool features too! thumbs Up 100!

title: Quality from packaging on up
text: [[VIDEOID:e4496c6954d79901e6f3e9d71bc0370a]] I got this drone for my 11 year old son. Idk if it's the idea of an affordable drone with this many features or the fact that the company actually sends everything you would need that makes me happy I purchased this. It came with two tiny screwdrivers that you need and all the small parts plus extras. There's even a little flight log booklet/notepad. Flying it is so easy. The camera quality is pretty good. We were flying it near sunset and still got pretty good images. The landing is so smooth and now I have to buy my dad one. Lol.

title: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B074YYVXQH/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o02_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1
text:
A+.Just used it for few days. Good product. Love the simple instructions for assembling. Propellers are clearly marked.
Good for beginners and enthusiast. Has good range. Controller is amazing and decent app.
One thing lacking is ability to stream the video to youtube or facebook

title: OUTSTANDING
text: I have ZERO experience flying a drone and was a bit reluctant anticipating my soon to be experience. I was pleasantly surprised!! I did have one problem and it was not a product problem but a ME problem LOL. I reached out to their customer support and my email was answered quickly and got me back on track within minutes and I was off the ground!!! Great customer service experience. Overall OUTSTANDING! a ton of fun.  Quality wise ... Yes I crashed a few times  as expected and NO damage!! and back in the air!

title: High Quality, robust, precise flying and easy to learn
text:
I'm enjoying the drone a lot. It's features are really helpful: return to home, automatic take-off and landing... It is very stable, that is, if you let go the control joysticks, the drone will stop at the location where it is and remain at that place. This allows during the learning process to get all back in place when you lost control, and take a deep breath. Also, it is essential for taking photos or filming, where you need to concentrate on that rather than controlling the drone.

The drone is robust, operates pretty silently, and it is easy to control. I'm recommending it already to friends!

title: Read the manual" before flying"it was my first drone,and a great one for beginers!!
text: This drone was awesome! only took a minute or two do download app,pair up and had the camera working in a jiffy!in fact it was so easy that i was flying it before finishing reading the manual. and with that said", had a three good crashes, and its still working great!! "one crash into trees,one from the tree into a fire pit, and one straight into the side of my shop wall!  "never hit RETURN HOME button without proper altitude" I learned that the hard way" then read the manual twice. The remote, for some reason indicates that its low even having fully charged battery, but when you put it on charger, it charges on red for a couple minutes then just turns green for fully charged, but still had no problems flying it!!! "great drone" for the price$

title: This thing is amazing!
text: I had to say that I've been looking for a drone for a while and may that I looked at just didn't have the flight time or features that I was looking for. After searching for some time I came across the holy Stone drone and figured I would give it a shot. The price point was right and I wanted to get into something that I could use for some photography and videography. After receiving the Drone it took me about 20 minutes to set it up put the blades on and get it ready to fly. After going to the instructions it was very easy to set up and get it flying. I can honestly say I am overly impressed at the Quality how easy it is to fly in the image quality. I will be taking this thing Everywhere I Go super excited to show everyone this came with everything you could possibly need including the memory card, just super impressed!

title: Battery charge time/flight time
text: This drone was returned because the battery charge time is basically overnight for about 10 minutes flight time. This is frustrating when one is trying to become familiar with the flight characteristics. For the price the Holy Stone appears well constructed and video is ok though without a fully gimbaled camera jerks with rapid sideward flight. If Holy Stone would solve this battery charge/flight time issue this would be worth the money. As it is presently, it is an exercise in frustration.

title: Camera stopped working correctly.
text:
When the camera stopped working correctly I called them and they wouldn't do anything for me. They offered me a 20% discount to buy another one. I purchased this in July and now in January they think I should buy another one.
Beware of buying and Holy Stone products. It worked fine for a couple of months but then the camera would just move around ramdomly. I use it for work so I need a dependable drone. BEWARE.

title: Start learning in slow speed and with "headless" mode.
text:
I had very little confusion assembling. Just a little but the diagrams seem to be accurate. It took a couple of hours. I had to try it out without taking all the time to read all the info. It crashed a few times and broke the propeller guards. Luckily they include an extra couple so I had immediate repairs. I decided to find a place with more room which helped a lot. I finally got better at controlling. Don't move the controller stick too fast - small moves are best at first. Also I discovered it defaults to 2nd of 3 speeds so I put it in the lowest speed and that helped.

Another feature which helped was "headless" once I figured out the controller to make it go into that mode. The second day I took it slow and had watched several how to fly videos explaining the contoller and all the led lights. I did not crash once. The headless feature worked. The camera both photo and video worked. I might get it yet. My next big step is figuring out the app. I flew it and took pictures without seeing them on the app but maybe tomorrow it will become better after more research. One step land and takeoff works. Fun to watch it land itself - it is slow and almost lands and then goes up a bit and then finally lands. Motor sounds cool

The propellers took a major beating from the initial crashes. This drone is much heavier than my first one which was indestructible. But they kept working. One time I had to unbend them but the plastic is resilient. Now they are nicked up a bit but still work. Luckily, also, 4 extra propellers are included. I have not changed them yet.

Not too much trouble getting the controller paired with the drone. I don't know how you could fly this thing without headless mode, but I guess it must be possible LOL. I know I am going to have a lot of fun with this drone. I feel like it is easier to control than my previous lighter drone. I got it because of the increased flying time of the battery and the follow me feature which I have not tried yet. The battery does take several hours to charge. I did not keep perfect track but it seems like about 7 hours last night. Maybe I can track it closer this time. I have ordered another battery LOL

title: Holy Stone Drone Great Device at a Fraction of the Cost of the Phantom
text: We were looking for a drone for Christmas for my son and had been looking at a much more expensive brand when I ran across this device.  The sale was seamless, the device was as advertised, and with the cold weather where we live, flight time since Christmas has been limited.  The iPhone/SmartPhone interface was easy to install and configure and on Christmas Day we had our inaugural flight.  What a fun device, easy to fly, the camera is awesome and we have thoroughly enjoyed time with this device.  Battery flight time is about 20-30 minutes which is good.  The interface to have the device return to last known position is a welcome insurance policy.  Awesome toy!  Would certainly buy this device again!

title: Easy to learn for a beginner
text: Received this as a gift from my wife. Initial intro to operation was pretty straight forward and easy to grasp. The remote control is easy to learn and the single button functions simplify the guess work so I can spend more battery time on learning more about the system. The short battery life adds a slope to the learning curve but, I'm planning on getting a few more batteries. I'd like to use to it take shots and footage for jobs I'm working on. All in all, I'd say this is a pretty good drone to start out with.

title: This is an awesome drone and a tremendous value
text: This is an awesome drone and a tremendous value.  It flies very well.  Provides a very stable platform for the Tilt Camera.  Even though this is not a Gimble Mount, the video footage has very little jitter.  GPS and Altitude Hold work very well.  You can "park" the drone at a particullar spot and altitude - rotate the drone and tilt the camera to capture some incredible pictures or video.  The Controller is very simple and intuitive.  Rotating knobs for speed and camera tilt are especially convenient.  I would like to have seen a replacable battery for the controller - but, having it rechargable is a big benefit.  The drone comes with a spare set of blades, two extra blade guards and sufficient other extra parts just in case - very much appreciated.  You can't go wrong with this drone!!

title: 13 yr old birthday present, HE LOVES IT!
text: Bought this for my grandsons 13th birthday. He loves it!!! he says that it's easy to use Easy to maneuver, remote control is simple, videos is easy to make and to land it is easy.

title: Great for the price
text: The HS100 Holy Drone has worked great for my kids.  For the price, it is a great entry level drone.

title: Experience is the Best Teacher
text:
A nice and professional unit. Appears well built and becomes easier to operate each time it is used. I do not consider it a toy as I am trying to learn how to operate it. Since I am new to this, I have to take one step at a time and I am
fortunate to have a neighbor with drone experience to guide me. I recommend a novice to have someone with
experience to get them started with this unit!

title: Flying is like a dream!!!
text: Wow!  This drone is amazing!  The "follow me" feature works perfectly!  It goes where I go - just like a little puppy!  "Return to home" works every time.  When the battery in the drone OR the controller gets low, it returns "home" on it's own.  If you let go of both joysticks, the drone will hover at the altitude it is - really puts on the brakes!  Very nice feature!!!  I haven't found anything I don't like about this drone.  The camera pivots, the pics are clear and the video is stable.  The controller is comfortable to use and the battery life on both the drone and controller are wonderfully long!  Get the extra battery - you will want to fly this thing forever!!!  I did contact customer service to finish the pairing at first, and they were just as great as everyone says they are.

title: Liking it so far
text:
Gave this to my grown son for a birthday gift. He says this is going to be a good learning drone and so far ez to fly
Takes good picturees just need to learn how to control the position of the camera.then I will be happy

title: Very nice drone
text: Bought for husband for Christmas.  He loves it! Need a smart phone for the remote to see video and where you are going.

title: Never paired
text:
TEST YOUR DRONE IMMEDIATELY. My drone never paired. Holy Stone gave several iterations of ‚Äútry this‚Äù, ‚Äúsend this video‚Äù, ‚Äúwatch this video‚Äù. They sent a new camera, didn‚Äôt work. I didn‚Äôt chase this problem right away assuming my son and I are newbies and had to learn. I have a drone without video and HolyStone was not helpful.
**Edit: Amazon worked with me for a full refund! Amazing customer service by Bambie!

title: Love this drone!
text: Bought this drone for my son and he loves it.  The picture and video quality is good.  Very easy to fly!

title: Just right for beginners
text: Received the drone with no problems. Everything was in the package. Packaging was very well done as nothing was out of place or broken. Assembly was pretty straight forward. I ordered two extra batteries to give me more flying time. Drone works great. For beginners it is perfect. Even with a 720p camera it takes great pictures and video. I look forward to learning how to control the drone for taking videos.

title: Great first drone!
text: This is my first drone and I'd say this is a really good one to learn with. Just take a few minutes to read and re-read the instructions and you shouldn't have any problems! Lots of fun!

title: Great value for the money for a beginner drone enthusiast
text:
I'm still learning how to pilot this thing, but that's because I'm antediluvian, rather than being a problem with the actual drone. It's fantastic fun, being able to see my own head and roof! The controls are thoroughly explained, and the price point is such that it was a no-brainer to purchase it to see if more advanced drone aerial photography was up my alley. It just might be with some more airtime on this drone.
Have no qualms about purchasing this one, it's the perfect beginner drone.

title: Easy to use. Caught on very quickly.
text:
***UPDATE*** (4/5/2021) company reached out to me and offered solutions to non-working transmitter, so I‚Äôm upping my product review for good customer service. They gave me a list of things to try and have sent a couple of follow up emails. This is really a great beginner drone and I just want to be able to use it. Hopefully, these solutions will be the answer to my issue.

***UPDATE*** lowering my review. Transmitter won‚Äôt hold a charge so I can not use drone. Have only used it about 10 times.

I was so intimidated at first. I bought this for my daughter to use to capture wedding venues and to play with at the lake.. It was a Christmas present and so it's been months since we first put it together. I just dug it out to use at a wedding tomorrow. I thought I better practice so I can help her use this thing. If you read the directions carefully, and follow them exactly, you won't go wrong! It took just a few moments to get the hang of it but I was videoing in no time. The videos are so clear! I'm very impressed!

title: that it was ez to fly
text: I like ever thing

title: Great beginner drone
text: We bought this for our two young boys for Christmas. They are a little too young to use it by themselves right now, but we wanted something that was affordable and would last and grow with them.  This is also the perfect intro into drones for our family.

title: Fun Drone
text: This is my first real drone I bought other little toys but this thing is really fun still figuring out all the details but so far in all it's a great product.

title: Great drone FOR ONE FLIGHT SESSION Great CS
text:
UPDATE: Very receptive customer service. Changed from 1 star to 4 stars because of responsiveness of customer service. Very quick to respond to my problem. They tried to troubleshoot the problem with the controller, without much luck. But they were quick after that that to send a new one out to replace.

Love the drone. ONLY FLEW ONE SESSION. After that, the controller WOULD NOT CHARGE FOR TWO SEPARATE DAYS. When I contacted the US customer service, and I explained the problem; the solution was to BUY a new controller. IVE HAD THE DRONE FOR A WEEK. NO WAY should I be buying a controller out of my pocket. Hopefully posting this review will generate the company DOING THE RIGHT THING and resolve the issue. If it doesn‚Äôt get resolved; I would stay FAR AWAY from this product.

title: Awesome customer service for my experience .
text: This is a really nice drone.I had a problem with the battery life lasting 5-8 minutes when I got it.All the specs and reviews I had read said I would get 12-15 minutes per charge.I contacted Holy Stone just to find out if this was to be expected and I was completely surprised at the quick responses I received from them.They were fast in resolving my issue and went above and beyond.To be honest,I wasn‚Äôt expecting that.They replaced my battery and I couldn‚Äôt be more happy with the performance of this drone.

title: Great first drone!
text: This was our first drone, and after a little trouble shooting on getting the phone linked up (had to turn phone on airplane mode), we were up and running.  My only complaint is that sometimes at altitude it can be a little shaky when taking a video, but that may be something with all drones.  Otherwise, great quality pictures and very easy to fly.  It seemed like I got the advertised 18 minutes of flight time.  Highly recommended for your first drone.

title: Lots of fun
text: I use this for fun and it is.  It's super easy to use and works as described.

title: Great Drone
text: This is my 4th Holy Stone Drone. The Best by Far. Love the extra features

title: It's true...this is exactly the same drone as the Promark P70!
text: [[VIDEOID:348ff9e8029459e53af86fd777d7489e]] And the Promark brand is a much lower price and comes with VR googles.  I ended up purchasing this drone only to have the drone crash due to gps glitches.  Naysayers can blame the pilot all they want but the bottom line is HS's version hard lands without user intervention.  I got a second one after receiving credit from Amazon and gift card money from HS (I admit they did try) to purchase the second one.  It ultimately crashed as well with similar results causing me to fortunately use the insurance I bought to send it back in hopes of getting a refund.  I went an ordered the P70 online and picked up at Walmart.  This one just seems to act better.  They don't give you an SD card, but sd cards aren't $100.  And for those who gripe about parts for the P70...duh just buy the hs100 parts on Amazon....same freaking drone.

title: Great Customer Service and Easy to Use Product
text: I have ordered two of these drones before and have liked them! They are easy to use and a great product for beginners. It does everything needed for someone who is looking to have a drone with video, picture, and easy use. I encountered a few issues but Holy Stone got me back up and going, so no issues.

title: Haven‚Äôt tried yet bu, need to clarify wording on propeller packaging
text: The propellers aren‚Äôt exactly ‚Äòunderneath‚Äô the styrofoam box, they are inserted into a hole in the bottom. Empty the styrofoam box then flip it over. Propellers are under tape, you‚Äôll see. Took me a few minutes to find them, thought I‚Äôd share in hopes it saves you time lol. I‚Äôll do another performance based review once we get her in the air.

title: Fun and great follow up service!
text: Fun, just give yourself time to learn. Customer service is great and obviously cares about their customers. Highly recommended.

title: Great features at an affordable price.
text: First drone. Very affordable for the features included on the HolyStone 100. Easy assembly. Easy start up. Easy controls. Can‚Äôt wait to perfect my flying skills.

title: Wow ... Better than expected and so easy to learn!
text:
I received my Holy Stone (Holy Stone GPS FPV RC Drone HS100 ) drone a few days ago and have flown it three successful times since.
I flew it with no crashes or disasters and it is really easy to fly.
Simple to calibrate and the auto take off/land works great and is a wonderful feature.
I used the auto-return home feature today and it worked exactly like it was supposed to.
The video and picture quality is excellent. I was also impressed by how far my WiFi reached when flying the drone. The drone is quite stable in flight and today the wind picked up some and I was still able to fly it. I still have lots to learn but so far so good, I'm pleased with my purchase. I decided to purchase an extra battery because I have 2 sons and flying time is around 15 minutes for one battery. Now one son doesn't have to wait for the battery to charge. Best purchase I made this year!

title: This is about a hundred dollar drone
text: Battery life is only ten minutes

title: LOVE HAVING A DRONE WITH GOOD GPS WITHOUT SPENDING A TON OF MONEY
text:
Great drone for the money. Very fast shipping. Easy assembly. Flies great and the GPS is a nice feature without having to spen $800
The only reason I'm not going 5 star is the short flying time. Wish this drone took a normal lipo battery instead of the USB charger to charge faster. BUT they do give you a card to get an extra battery for free.

title: Very Cool!
text:
I ordered in the morning on Friday Feb 28th. and with Prime I got free same day delivery.
The battery was fully charged. The camera needed one extra turn and it snapped in. The landing legs needed snapping in. Pretty easy. It was dark by arrival but with pretty cool blinking lights I was able to try it out right away in the front drive.
First take off was pretty rocky. I went back inside and followed the calibration instructions and went back out and "bueno"!
make sure to place the drone, battery facing you... so that when you go to control side to side and forwards and backwards it's aligned with the remote. Overall, very cool toy. I recommend for everyone!

title: Purchase with confidence
text: I had a problem with the unit right out of the box, Holy Stone Customer service and Amazon resolved everything wonderfully.

title: Battery is the only question
text: We are working thru a battery/remote issue with the company at the moment, but overall really like this drone. We are excited to get past the small buggaboo we ran into so that we can get down to the business of taking nature photos with our drone! On a side note the company has been great on customer service and response times.

title: Customer service is great
text: Excellent purchase. Great customer service.

title: Stable, Easy to Fly and Good Camera Quality
text:
[[VIDEOID:dd83d8ca31c7b616683542864e2c8198]] The Holystone HS100 drone is an advanced drone jam packed with load of features. I have couple of other drones but neither of them is as good as this one.

The drone comes with very good transmission range, I took the drone to 116 meters in altitude and it was very much responsive, and in control; stability of the drone at that altitude was very impressive, it was holding its altitude pretty well which was very much visible in the video recordings. Video recordings at that level was smooth and stable. The features that makes me very comfortable while flying this drone is the Auto Return in case of signal drops or out of range or best, when the battery starts running low on power. I came across all the 3 scenarios and was happy to see that drone started coming back to its take-off location. Transmitter is powerful and reconnects on its own as soon as drone comes back in the range. This drone has a built in self monitoring system that keeps check on the battery charge and the distance its away from the take-off location, it starts Auto returning to the take off position as soon as it senses that the charge just enough to go back to the base.

Take-off and landing is super easy, it comes with one-key take-off and landing button on transmitter. While flying if you click land button, drone will auto land vertically down, controlling the speed on its own. This drone also comes with Smart Return to home option that means no matter wherever the drone is, on clicking Return To Home button, it will come back to the start location. It does not have obstacle avoidance so before hitting Return to Home button make sure it has clear path. The drone is also equipped with Follow Me mode, which is very cool. The follow me mode operates using Smart Phone GPS signal following you wherever you go; I used it while flying the drone and it worked pretty well. There is headless flying mode option in the drone too, this feature is very useful for beginners when you are learning flying a drone.

The drone comes with wide angle HD camera recording the videos in 720P; it can record the video or take the pictures in high definition. It comes with 90 degree Camera angle adjustment allowing you to record videos at multiple angle. While recording the video, transmitter keeps on continuously beeping, I really wish if there was a way to mute that. I recorded the videos from 116 Meters and the quality of the recording is very good. When connected to smart phone, drone is able to stream LIVE video‚Äôs. Camera comes with microSD card slot to store the recorded videos and pictures. Although when connected to smart phones, 2 minute videos are also recorded on the smart phone, while full videos are recorded and stored in attached microSD card. Since smart phone is connected over 2.4 ghz WIFI channel, the connectivity is limited and is lost after reaching certain altitude, definitely its not connected when flying at 100m altitude. I used their iOS app, it comes with lot of features including viewing live streaming in VR mode. The app also maintains the flying log showing the details like, Altitude, Distance and Speed per flight. The app also provides various flying status like ‚ÄúWaiting for GPS single‚Äù, ‚ÄúTransmitter not connected‚Äù and bunch of other details, helping first time flyer to get use to this Drone in no time. Talking about flying time, one full charge gives approximately 15 minutes of continuous fly time, which is pretty good. The only thing I think needs to be improved is the battery charging time, it take about 3-5 hours to get a full charge.

The drone comes with extra spare parts, starting from landing gears to propellers, propeller guards, blade caps to screws, almost all the spare parts except for extra battery. I really liked that they provide those extra spare parts, haven‚Äôt seen many other manufacturers doing that. It also comes with a User Guide providing assembling instructions plus guide on setup and various modes. I used the guide to learn all the modes it comes with.

title: Great drone!!!
text: My wife bought the HS100 as a gift. Never flown a drone before. This thing was great to learn with. The camera is better than I thought it would be too. I fly mine every chance I get. The Holy Stone customer service is excellent. This drone will just be the first one I get. I'll definitely be expanding the Holy Stone fleet

title: Great Drone, Buy it!
text:
[[VIDEOID:e6ea3d38456efadb70bd0703a004ef56]] After doing a fair amount of research, I decided to purchased the Holy Stone HS100 Drone from Amazon. This drone has all he features I was looking for and a few others as well. I definitely wanted GPS Navigation and a Return to Home functionality. It also comes with a ‚ÄúFollow me‚Äù Function, automatic take off and landing and you can fly manually without GPS if you wanted to; the altitude sensor will help keep the flight stable.
The removable Camera takes really nice pictures and the video is surprisingly clear and colorful in 720p HD. I was also sold on the overall size and look of this drone (not some mini thing) I think it looks really cool. The controller is easy to operate and feels very ergonomic.
I have seen some concerns from other reviews about how long it takes for the batteries to charge. I use my Samsung fast charger and it takes about 3 hours to charge, however I strongly suggest getting another battery as two batteries makes for a really nice time out flying.
You may also get a Free battery from Holy Stone if you post an Honest review. I can Honestly say I am having a lot of fun flying this Drone.
My first flight seemed short but after a couple of recharges the batteries are now lasting almost 15 minutes of flight time. I am very happy with my Purchase of this drone and I didn‚Äôt have to spend a Thousand Dollars just to have some fun and get some great videos.

title: Very underwhelming.
text: Well had I not owned a DJI prior to this one I probably would think this was great. However, the picture quality is poor even though it claims to be 1080p. The controls are clunky and this thing is big and loud!  The camera was supposed to move but it wouldn't.

title: First flight easier than I expected
text:
I got this as a birthday present; my wife bought it on Amazon. Setup was not hard, only the little screws for the four propellers were a bit tricky. The screwdrivers they supplied were just the right size and it was very nice to see that the package includes more than enough screws and such parts, in case you lose a few, as well as replacement propeller blades (I almost broke one the first time out) and other parts that might get damaged if you slam into a wall or a hard landing surface.

Making the connection between the controller and the drone was very easy as was the step to calibrate the internal compass. I connected my phone to the drone's wifi, attached it to the controller, and was surprised to see that the drone's camera was already on and sending the picture to my phone.

With a little trepidation, I set the drone on the grass out back and pressed the lift-off button. It rose and hovered about five feet above the ground, and stayed in place very well. The motion controls worked very naturally, and I could soon turn the drone and fly in any direction I wanted.

I suddenly realized that the yard has a lot of relatively low hanging branches, but could easily avoid them. This was really a lot easier than I expected.

Unfortunately, it then started to rain a little and I had to bring the drone down. It was at this point that I realized I didn't remember how to land it and turn it off, and the instructions were on a table some distance away. But the drone was hovering very stably and I was able to grab it from below and turn the power off manually. Next time, I'll be better prepared.

title: Nice Drone Reasonable Price
text: This was very easy to set up right out of the box. Flying was a breeze. App was easy to follow and had no issue connecting while flying. I highly recommend. This is a good unit for all.

title: Good product, does whats expected but battery life is limited.
text: Good product. I had no problem setting it up and flying it. I'm still getting used to the controls but it's fairly easy to cover the basics. The things I don't like most about this drone is that the battery doesn't last that long and the live feed you watch through your phone lags a bit. Then I'm not sure what direction I'm facing for a few seconds.

title: The TF card was not provided as stated
text: Very pleased with this purchase and the instructions are detailed and descriptive but my only complaint is the TF card was not inserted in the camera as stated.

title: Great purchase, quality drone
text: Christmas present for my son. He is very pleased with the performance. Easy to maneuver, speed is impressive. Camera is nice as well. Recommend, even for a beginner

title: ckaging and documentation are superior
text:
So far this drone is blowing my socks of. So I spent a month doing research. I won't bore you with all of the criteria other than it had too be under $500 and acceptable for use in all of the places I intend too travel.

I ended up purchasing this Holystone HS100, on Amazon for $270.24 and additional batteries for $77.82.

I was apprehensive at first, but I was pleasantly surprised. Packaging and documentation are superior, matching US quality I'd expect when spending a couple hundred bucks. Shipping said 3 weeks at the outside, but all got here is 4 days!

Ok, checking the parts. All included, securely packed and extra parts for the easily lost tiny screws and extra rotor blades for dummy's like me who crash into things while learning. I did this a few times and because of the included rotor gaurds for beginners and the auto shutdown when the blades get stuck, no damage to me or property was done, yeah!

title: Wish I had more free time I would fly everyday!!
text: This is one of the easiest drones I‚Äôve ever used. The controls are very gentle and respond effectively and not aggressively. The battery life is a little less than advertised but has a decent flight time. I am still learning more about the different ways to operate the drone, and look forward to more experiences with it.

title: Recommend this for other beginners!
text: Beginner here with a drone interest. Purchased the HS100 drone based on other reviews along with the price given the features included. Surprised me how simple the assembly and setup was‚Ä¶even though the propeller screws were a bit tiny to work with. I was finally able to use it for the first time on a weekend getaway after previously downloading the recommended app on my phone. Though initially worried about how hard it would be to control the drone, I found it easier than I expected. Still I opted to install the propeller guards just in case my fingers didn‚Äôt react quick enough on the controls. Impressed with the video quality for such an inexpensive drone and the ‚Äúhome‚Äù feature returned it to the exact spot I launched it from. I‚Äôd say the HS100 is an excellent choice for the novice drone enthusiast not looking to shell out a ton of money on their first drone.

title: Great drone for the price
text:
I bought this drone for my 12 year old son. He was able to pick it up fairly quickly. It‚Äôs easy to fly, and you get some pretty good distance and speed. Winds on my first flight were about 10mph, gusting to 15. I was shocked at how steady this thing stayed in those winds. There was a little movement at times, but for the most part it hovered relatively still even in these winds. I kept getting a warning that my transmitter voltage was low. But after some google searching I felt pretty stupid. When you turn the drone on, don‚Äôt forget to pair it by moving the left joystick up and down. The warning went away and I was good to go.

Cons: at this price point there‚Äôs bound to be some cons. First, after maybe 100-150 feet away, it seems like I lose the ability to fly using live view. The camera just freezes and doesn‚Äôt come back on until I move closer. I‚Äôm a little confused by this, as I see YouTube videos of people flying it further but maintaining a solid connection. There‚Äôs almost no existing troubleshooting documentation regarding troubleshooting the camera or connection issues. So I have no clue how to fix this. However, it doesn‚Äôt affect flight if you have a line of sight. You can still fly it without the camera.

RTH leaves something to be desired. It works, but it‚Äôs just not as accurate as other more expensive drones. It landed about 50 feet from the takeoff point. So my suggestion is make sure you‚Äôre in an open area when you take off and account for this accuracy.

Another con is the camera movement. When tilting the camera in flight, it appears to move very slowly (if at all). Another confusing issue with virtually no troubleshooting help.

The cons aren‚Äôt a huge deal to me, as you get what you pay for and doesn‚Äôt really affect the overall performance. But to some, it might be annoying. But with all things considered, it flys a lot better than what I honestly expected, and is a great beginning drone. I‚Äôd definitely purchase another for my other kids

title: User friendly.  Open area flying is best.

Tested RTH at loss of controller but flying out 100 ft and 50 ft up then turned off controller, drone returned as specified. Have flow with beginner mode disabled without any issues.

title: Excellent value
text: This is my second drone purchase. I wanted a drone that allowed me to take good quality photos and video with a camera that adjusts remotely in flight. I use a drone as a tool to analyze construction sites. While this camera doesn‚Äôt seem to have mechanical stabilization or shoot in RAW, I‚Äôm pleased with my results. It‚Äôs also very easy to fly and holds positions perfectly. I can‚Äôt seem to get the follow me function to work, but perhaps it doesn‚Äôt work on beginner mode? title: Superior Hobby-Level Drone
text:
Originally, I received a defective unit. However, the Holy Stone customer service division was incredibly helpful in helping me troubleshoot the unit. Eventually, they replaced the drone free of charge, and even let me keep the broken system to use for spare parts, which have since come in quite useful.

Any inconvenience I experienced to obtain a working drone was more than made up for by the quality of the system itself. GPS mode has proved a useful asset, helping the drone maintain the proper position in flight, and ensuring a safe descent from high-altitude flights. I personally recommend buying this product only if you are fluent with the controls of a quadcopter, simply to avoid crashing or losing this incredible piece of tech.

This is a hobby grade drone--neither amateur nor professional. Its balance is superior. Camera stills are excellent and video is fairly good. It does not have obstacle avoidance or an automatic gimbal, but other than that, it has all the bells and whistles of leading professional drones, so you get a great bang for your buck.

My flying experiences have revealed that the drone is easily controlled, even at altitudes of three hundred feet. It automatically senses and fights wind as well.

In short, this is a top-quality drone for those that are interested in the hobby, and have at least some experience. It is a very rewarding product.

title: Disappointed
text: After reading reviews on different drones, i decided to go with this one. 1 st flight, it dropped out of the sky from about 50 ft when we hit the return to home feature. It literally crashed to the ground like a ton of bricks. We have tried several flights, and this happens EVERY single time. Also for whatever reason, every time we turn it on, it has to go thru the whole entire calibration process again. We were happy it came with spare parts, as we have used most of them since it does not land gently on return to home. Battery usage is 'ok', but when it reaches a certain point, it drops really fast and does not always leave you enough warning and time to get the unit back to you with out the safety return to.home kicking in. Picture quality was great, maneuvered well, but do to the issue wirh the return to home feature, i can only give this 2 stars.

title: Great functionality for the price
text: This is my first UAV and I had done many hours of research to get just the right one. Price also being a factor the GPS, Follow, auto take off and land and Return functions are usually on much more expensive models. After reading the reviews and watching the videos I decided on the Holy Stone. What I like about it is the ability for a novice to get it up and flying. Down side is the battery charge rate(3 to 6 hours) versus the flying time per charge (12 to 15 min). The camera takes great pics and videos. Assembly for someone with patience is easy, there are very small screws that hold the props on if you are not patient or not very good with your small motor skills this might be difficult. The instructions could use some revamping, the light sequence doesn't seem to follow the instructions. Better to watch the assembly and test flight videos. Overall I am very happy with my purchase.

title: Great first drone
text:
This is my first drone so I needed something beginner friendly. When I saw this on prime day I couldn't resist.
The drone is exactly as advertised and I find the novice friendly features, such as follow-me very useful. I've only flown it in my back yard but it seems very stable and well built as it has survived several light crashes caused by me getting too close to trees. The camera quality is okay but expected at this price point, however it's easy to operate and pairs well with my S10.
My only complaint is that it takes some time getting it flight ready as it requires regular calibration, sometimes displays a weak GPS signal and the instructions aren't as clear as I'd like but once you get acclimated to the unit it works great. Very happy with my purchase.

title: Amazing product feature rich easy to fly grows with your skill
text:
Purchased with same day delivery. My work gave away a few at an event a couple weeks ago. Heard the winners talking about them then got the chance to try one. WOW. it was awesome, very easy to.use thanks to the ability to adjust controls like speed. Takes good video. Bought one. In less than an hour I had the biggest grin on my face. I love and will use this thing all the time. Only draw back are the screws sizes but that's because I have big fingers lol. I'll probably order another battery or two very soon. If you are looking for an entry drone packed with features this is the one.

Transmitter issues.

For all those that say they charge their transmitter only for the app to say that its low on battery.....try this. Turn on transmitter (after its charged), turn on drone and set down. Connect phone to drone wifi, turn off mobile data (very important) if you get the red warning about the transmitter battery then move the left joystick up then down......you're welcome.

title: Great Mid-Range RC Drone for the Money
text:
I held off a couple of months before writing this review. Just needed to see if there was anything that didn't make a positive impression.

The machine arrived on schedule. The packaging and machine was all in one piece. Except, though, the drone comes with a few pieces to install on the machine. So, I guess, it wasn't 'all' in one piece.

The installation instructions are easy for any to read and, carry out. (Read & Follow them.)

There are instructions for setting up the drone for flight and, the precautions needed to keep your drone in one piece and, in your possession. (You don't want to heed those instructions? OK, do as I did.)

When just starting to learn to fly this drone. Keep it close to you, minimum winds, not too high and away from the trees. That's what I SHOULD have done. About 50 feet up, a little bit of wind moved it over the top of 40 ft. trees, about 80 feet away, where, New Pilot Panic, set in and had the drone flying into the top of the trees.

Fortunately, after my three attempts to even try to spot the drone in the trees, my 'Eagle Eyed' wife, found it in the thorn infested forest, at the base of the tree, in the crux of a stump from a dead tree. No damage to the machine after a 40 foot fall and, hitting something hard. Not bad!

A suggestion you might wish to follow is; put your name and phone number on your drone. Also, you may wish to do what I did, (after the temporary loss), that being, attaching a small LED flasher, with Velcro, to the top of your drone. Turn it on, day or night, when flying. (Can't find your lost drone in the day? You'll find it at night.)

The only thing about the drone that wouldn't get 5-Stars is, the visual quality of the camera. It's not equal to what you would see from cameras on other more expensive drones. But then again, who would expect that? It is, clear and good enough to easily see where you're going, if you're using your cell phone screen or, a Pad.

text: Easy to control fun to play with and the camera works great!

title: Great pictures
text: I liked how it easy to use and comes out with clear pictures of what I want.

title: Very Stable
text: This drone is stable in the wind and the follow me mode is really cool.

title: Easy to get started, but still a very exciting drone!
text:
When you first unpack, be sure to look under the foam box - that's where you'll find the propellers! Mounting the propellers on the motors takes a steady hand and good eyesight, but the right tools are provided in the box. It's worth the time to read the instructions fully before taking your first flight ... not just the flight controls (up, down, left, right, forward, backward, ...), but the extra goodies like speed control, camera control, follow me, and calibrations. Then go out and have a blast.

The GPS return to home is very accurate based on my experience, as is the automatic return if power is low. This went a LONG way to reducing my anxiety about losing or crashing my drone on the first flight. Also, their customer service is excellent. I had a question about the camera control, and they answered within 1 day.

I would suggest getting a second battery to double your enjoyment

title: Easy to control
text:
Love easy it is to control. Don't like the blind return, if it goes outside the set perimeter. Follows a direct path back, instead of taking the route it was flown in, came close to crashing into multiple posts & trees, it just flown back to me at full speed. If I wouldn't have shut the autopilot down, the drone would probably be toast. Other than the autopilot issue, it has been great, flown it all over, some of the areas I have flown, I wouldn't suggest unles you have a decent amount of experience.
Maneuvers really well, around trees, over & around fencing. Don't let buildings get between you & the drone, if you are using the camera to visually guide the drone. That will generally disconnect your phone from the drone, until you can get the drone within the line of sight of your phone.

title: Customer support was needed to sort out specific directions that ...
text: Customer support was needed to sort out specific directions that were a little hinky in the manual. The order of syncing and app usage were not allowing me lift off. A little q&a in relatively short wait on hold and i was in the air.

title: Nice Picture and Stable Flying
text:
My son asked Santa for a large drone for Christmas and this is what he brought. We've only had small indoor drones, so this is the first large drone for us.

We haven't flown it extensively, but over 3-4 flights its been very stable and easy for my 7yo son to fly. It's more intimidating for him because of the size and the noise but he really likes the FPV view on the phone. It is really cool to be able to see a different perspective of the neighborhood via the drone. I alsoI like that it automatically holds position and altitude which makes it really nice for him. It has good runtimes (10+ minutes) considering the size.

I was pleasantly surprised with the amount of spare parts it comes with: landing legs, blade guards, props, and hardware. As an avid RC hobbyist this is really appreciated since spares are sometimes hard to come by and nobody likes breaking and waiting days to run again.

Overall very happy with the drone since it has high end features and performance for a value price.

title: Great for beginners
text: Great product easy to learn and fun to fly

title: Great drone with most drone features at an affordable price.
text: This drone is awesome.  I couldn‚Äôt be happier had the smaller holy stone drone previously and it is the best upgrade I could‚Äôve made.

title: Favorite drone so far!
text: Just took the maiden flight. This drone is awesome and powerful!!  Great camera and easy to fly

title: No propellers in package
text: Propellers are placed inside a cutout on the underside of the styrofoam box. Don‚Äôt look inside the styrofoam box where all the other parts are located, you won‚Äôt find the propellers there.

title: It's a good entry level drone
text:
Ive had this drone for over a year. It was $279 when I purchased it in July 2018.

I use this drone for scouting remote camping spots in the wilderness and to get Arial footage of my current camping spot.

It is easy to use, and in general a decent drone. My only complaint is that it seems to have a mind of its own. It has a tendency to take off in some random direction, which is frequently the direction of a tree or the ground. I can't count the number of times this thing was hovering then all of a sudden slammed itself right into the ground. It just I have to be super cautious when using it...

On the up side, the pieces that break are easily to replace. I've replaced all of the legs and propeller guards numerous times. The frame of my drone is cracked as well, but it is still flying.. sort of! Haha

Just be weary of its location, fly it safely and keep in mind it could, at any moment, decide to do what ever it wants.

I'll also add that Holystone customer support is 5 star!

title: Easy to fly. Camera and video quality is good for the price point.
text: My wife bought this for as an early Christmas present. It works great. Easy to learn to fly and when I first started I thought I had lost it but it returned "home" to the starting point on its own. Video and camera quality is good for the price.

title: Wanted to like it but turned out to be JUNK!
text: This drone is supposed to be able to do a lot of things.  Well... I wouldn't know because I was not even able to get started.  First, I was unable to connect to the drone's wifi which made it useless.  I called customer support but they didn't know anything more than what was in the manual.  Second, the battery got stuck inside the drone and would not come out.  So even if I was able to get connected to the drone's wifi, it would have been good for just 15 minutes of use.  $150 for 15 minutes of flight.  I don't know about you but that seems awfully expensive.  Looks like Holy Stone needs to work on their quality control.  Needless to say, I'm returning it today.

title: Fun for beginners.
text: I‚Äôm new to drones so as a beginner this drone satisfied all my needs. Very easy to assemble. In no time I was able to take my first flight. Being a newbie I took things really slow and didn‚Äôt let the drone go too far away from me. The controls are very easy and having a view from the camera really helped.  So far I‚Äôm really impressed with this drone.

title: Easy to fly and extremely fun!
text: Great product!  We took it out earlier after charging everything up and reading the instructions.  Easy to fly especially since this our first drone.  Highly recommend this for beginners.  I was able to hand the controls to my 10 year old and he did great.  Easy buttons for land and return home point if you get into trouble.  Recommend the longer battery pack and possibly extra batteries for longer flight times.

title: HS100 1080p GPS - Flew once and never again. It's just a dead drone....
text:
[[VIDEOID:f181077df7c401f8e903573689ba685]] This review is for the HS100 1080p GPS model

Pros:
- The manual was helpful in setting up the drone and fairly straightforward to follow. There were lots of good pictures and examples.
- The camera is excellent and has a great picture.

Cons:
- After the first flight, I charged the drone and the remote in the garage. Full charge on both. I attempted to start it up and was unable. I would calibrate it, it would show ready, then fail. No matter how many times I calibrated it, it won't actually take off. So it's pretty useless now.
- Support is non-existent for this product. Try searching for "HS100 troubleshooting" and there isn't any. No videos, articles, etc. You're out of luck.
- The app is also super unhelpful at telling you what's wrong. It's as if they never anticipated any problems with the drone and how to solve them.

Overall:
I really, really wanted to like this drone, but its complete lack of support and, duh, inability to fly make it a terrible choice. I wish I had saved my money for something else.

title: Bought another one
text: My first HS100 crashed but I like it so much that I bought another.  Very reliable and easy to operate.  I also fly it around the house to reduce woodpecker attacks on my roof!

title: Pay just a bit more.
text: I‚Äôve been a avid drone flyer for about 5 years, and thought I‚Äôd spice things up and get a drone that‚Äôs finally above 100$ - but this was not the move, the ‚Äú2k‚Äù camera shots never seem to be above 1080p, the battery life had never exceeded 11 minutes, and the range is alright, but definitely less than advertised. In addition, the drone is quite loud, so discreet takeoffs in public become impossible. The drone has a very obvious ‚Äúcheap‚Äù feeling to it, with easily breakable plastic being used, and constant malfunctions with the return home feature. I never EVER let this thing go below 1 for of battery, for fear it takes off in the other direction. It‚Äôs an upgrade from a toy, but doesn‚Äôt have a professional feel.

title: Super happy with the HS100
text: Recently, I crashed my HS110 into the lake behind my house. As I needed a suggestion as to what model drone to purchase next, I called Holy Stone customer support and spoke with Libby. She suggested the HS100! This turned out to be a great suggestion. I LOVE this drone! It flies just as promised. Highlights include auto take off and land, super hovering, and the camera - WOW!! Love the gamble control and the resolution is outstanding. Holy Stone ROCKS!

title: Very easy to control and fly
text: My daughter got this for her bday and it is awesome!!!

title: Best BANG for your $$$ BUCK! 5 STARS!
text: This drone is by far one of the best I have owned. The packaging all the way up to the operation of the drone was smooth. Easy to put together and the battery just slides in and out with no problems charging. The flight time for this size of a drone is fairly decent (12-15 mins avg.) It does require the app to operate the drone which I am not too fond of but getting used to. From the prospective of a pilot that has flown toy drones all the way up to high end drones this one hits the mark for the $$. It handles very well and the GPS technology that went into the thought of this drone takes the cake. The (RTH) return to home key brings the drone back to where you took off from, SUPER impressive! The camera is pretty good but has a very minimal lag to the app and takes some great shots because of the drones stability. You can literally set the controller down and it will stay in one spot, then if the battery starts to die the drone (tells) itself will bring it back to your takeoff spot. My apologize for such a lengthy review but when you have a nice product you want people to know that they are getting QUALITY and what their hard earned $$ paid for. Not to mention, all the other features that I left out about that would be listed in the product description. As an frequent flyer this model (HS100) is the best bang for your buck for sure. Holy Stone still making great product and will handle any questions you have. Holy Stone really takes pride in their product and their customers!!

title: Worked on first try!
text: Impressed. Didn't want anything to basic, and based on product info and prior reviews, the HS100 seemed like a good alternative. First time drone flyer, and not always "lucky" with getting things working, but this performed as advertised - flew the first time! Also appreciate that extra screws and piece were included. Tiny pieces, lost one, but had plenty.

title: Capable Drone.  For around 200 dollars- it‚Äôs hard to beat!
text:
This is my second drone. The other one is much smaller and less capable. Bottom line - I wanted a larger more capable drone, but didn‚Äôt want to spend a ton of money on something that is really a toy. Taking photos of your house is very cool- but not 700 dollar cool for me personally. Like everyone else- did my research and decided on this. Overall- has met most expectations. I am still surprised when you can buy something like this for a couple hundred dollars- It has GPS for crying out loud. That gives you the ability to do a ton. It will auto return if needed- like if you push the panic button, or it looses comm with the controller, or battery power gets low. Great feature on more expensive drones. The camera is not bad either- wish the photos were a little higher MB- but pics and video comes out nice. The drone stores the better res photos on the memory card on the drone- it also downloads compressed photo/video to your phone. I thought the photos on my phone after the flight were what it was capable of- but after looking at the memory card I‚Äôm satisfied with the results. Expectation has to be tempered just a bit- this is a ton of stuff on a drone that you can fly pretty high- higher really than I need, except to go ‚Äúdang- that‚Äôs cool- wife, check out how night that is.‚Äù Some other features that are nice = the controller lets you swivel that camera up and down- you can choose from three speeds as it is flying- you can choose a distance and height restriction of the fight on the app (great for first couple flights) - follow me feature- and once again the return home. I‚Äôm also impressed at how the GPS will keep it hovering in one spot and not drift with the wind. You can see it start to drift- then the GPS kicks in and will correct it. One issue I‚Äôve had is sometimes when the drone gets out of sight (like flying it to the front of the house while I ‚Äòm in the back) I loose The video feed and have to get back in line of sight to recapture the feed. The drone though will do a great job of hovering without drifting if you stop putting in control commands. Battery takes a long time to charge- but I ordered a second one after the first week. Two flights is about enough for me before charging again. They also give a ton of spare parts.
Overall- hard to beat.. and its a ton of fun to fly.

title: ... and even with winds close to 20mph it was easy to control and drone recovered well when hit with ...

title: Piece of useless junk

title: As a beginner, this was pretty easy
text: 1st flight went well , 2nd, a bit touchy, LOL! My dog was way too interested in it and I wound up crashing it. Thankfully, it survived unscathed. Still have a lot to learn, but it‚Äôs going well! I can see me taking this on a lot of my outings.

title: ... the drone just to get to this piece and waste well over an hour
text:
I was sent a drone with a defective propeller shaft and was instructed by customer support to disassemble most of the drone just to get to this piece and waste well over an hour. This was given to me as a birthday present to fly around, not sit in a room for hours messing with tiny screws and fragile motors.
Update after 2 weeks of returning the defective drone and having to repurchase a new one. I was ready to finally fly until I opened the box to the new drone. the tape holding the box closed had been cut. I removed the drone only to realize the bags holding the screws and things had been opened already too. So the screws are littered all over the bottom of the box, who knows if they are all there. Next the propellers were out of the plastic, covered in scratches and dents. Along with all this stuff gone wrong, important pieces are missing, like the charger to charge the battery, the screw driver, two propeller fenders and who knows what else I would find to be missing if I attempted to put this what appeared to be used drone together.
All and all I would love to change my review but amazon requires me to put at least would star other wise it would be a zero out of 5
Finally got a working drone, and really do like the product so if you do decide to risk getting a defect it is sort of worth it. the mean reason and only reason I changed the stars on the review is due to the customer service. They were really helpful and did everything they could do to get me a working drone, they also responded extremely fast to an emails i sent them.

title: Great beginner drone
text: Received as a gift and fell in love with the drone. Camera images are sharp and clear but videos lack stabilizing features of more expensive drones. Controller is very easy to use and has a surprisingly good feature set for an entry level drone.  Solid construction and workmanship. Highly recommend the HS100 for the fun of flying !

title: Great Mid-Priced Drone
text:
This is my 3rd drone. I started with an inexpensive Cheerwing that I basically gave up on. I upgraded to a Holy Stone HS200 with an Amazon Lightning Buy. I learned to fly with that drone. Feeling I was ready for a more sophisticated drone I bought the HS100 (with an extra battery). Wow, what a great aircraft for the price!! There are so many features for the price. It is relatively easy to fly and the return to home features lessen the risk of losing it. The video quality is good and I love that the camera can be rotated 90 degrees. I look forward to many successful flights with this drone.

While I haven't had any issues with this drone, the camera on my HS200 never functioned properly. I contacted customer service and Jolin arranged to have a replacement camera sent to me. Customer service is prompt and top notch!

title: Transmitter battery
text: I bought two of these late last year. The first one had issues with the camera, but likely from crashes! However, the second one, while it worked ok, the transmitter would only charge up for 4 minutes max. I noted that another purchaser had the same problem with his two purchases. I don't want to spend another $30 for a transmitter, since this one is virtually new (never flown!) Very frustrating. I wish there were someway to replace a defective battery in the transmitter.

title: ABSOLUTELY INCREDIBLE!!!
text: Absolutely incredible product! I feel in love with Holy Stone products after purchasing the HS160 Shadow drone a few months back and experiencing the incredible customer service. This drone just arrived this morning and I was already able to get it up for the first test flight. Calibration takes a minute or 2 to learn to do properly- just follow the directions on the app and user manual. I was very pleasantly surprised at how nice the video and photos came out and how steady this remained even in beginner mode with GPS. I purchased this as I wanted something I could utilize for higher quality aerial photos at an increased distance and this does it all.  Easily comparable to a DJI Phantom line that I've had the privilege of experiencing, but this one provides a huge bang for the buck!

title: Easy to Fly
text: Very nice beginner drone. Well built and easy to fly. Although I am not a fan of the small controller, it works very well. Worries about flying in the wind? The HS100 handles it extremely well.  Well worth the money!  Nice job Holy Stone.

title: Cheaply made and amateur
text: I returned this drone. Where do I start? The instructions and video are poorly created. Download the app before purchasing and see for yourself. Took forever to get the drone working and synched with the app and remote. Once it was finally synched up, the GPS function did not work at all. The follow me function is the primary reason I purchased it. They might as well call it the 'herding cats' function but that would an insult to the task of herding cats which would be far easier to do than flying this drone. The drone shot straight up and was uncontrollable as I attempted to land it. If you want to waste your time putting together a drone only to have it wreak havoc in the sky as your kids run away fearing it might crash down on them, this is the drone for you. Perfect gift for an ex-spouse.

title: Easy to fly.

After reading reviews I decided on this one.  I felt like I was taking a chance because it wasn‚Äôt expensive.  He LOVES it and is outside with it every spare moment.  He had no idea what I paid. title: Great Beginner's Drone
text: My wife bought this for me as a gift.  After wading through the manual and watching a very help video, we were off in no time.  By 10 year old daughter picked it up quickly as well.

title: I never had the time to learn to be an RC pilot.
text: I came at this drone as if it was one of the helicopters that I crashed trying to learn years ago, but am simply amazed at how well made and smart this HS100 drone is. I still don't have a lot of time, but I didn't want to spend a bunch of money on replacing broken parts from crashing, so I came at it slowly, which was good because it gave me some experience with basic operation before I tried altitude, maneuvering and now taking pictures and videos. I think this is more than a beginner's vehicle, it could be the one I use for quite a long time. Of course, skill on my part has been washed away by technology, but as I said, I don't have the necessary time to attain those skills, so I'll take it. Fun!

It flys exactly as said with the calibration which is simple. I love this drone. I was thinking about the optional 1080 camera. Guess I'll get a little more time in before I buy. Purchase is my thought.

title: Enjoying the Drone, but the WiFi connection is unreliable
text: Assembling the propellers to this drone was a bit tricky, as the screws and nuts were SO SMALL compared to my fingers, but I managed.  Everything assembled just as the instruction said, and the directions for pairing the remote to the drone, calibrating the drone, and then flying the drone all worked just as written.  I've enjoyed flying this, and the remote control works well.  What has been frustrating is the poor connection between the wifi (generated by the drone's camera) and my iPhone X, the newest version of the iPhone running the most recent iOS.  I rarely get live video, and the connection is inconsistent on viewing the status of the drone.  Additionally, even when using the remote control buttons, the camera has not been consistently listening to commands.  I've only gotten it to record video 50% of the time, and the same with still photos.  My best video footage came up unrecorded so far.  That has been my only disappointment with the drone.  Flying it has been fun - but part of the fun comes from viewing what the drone "sees", and I'm not getting solid results there yet.

title: It's a great drone for the money!
text: It's a great drone for the cost. It has a lot of advanced features. My problem is using my phone for the navigation screen. It's a Google phone and doesn't work well in natural lighting.

title: Nice value for the money, with plenty of features.

The only drawback I can see is the battery life is a bit short but overall this is an excellent product.

title: Do yourself a favor and sort reviews by ‚ÄúCritical‚Äù
text: This is definitely no good. I purchased this for Christmas for my 21 year old daughter who is obtaining her real estate license. We have used it a total of FOUR times, due to the weather, each time anywhere from 5-10 minutes‚Ä¶just to familiarize herself. The last time she used it, it crashed..just ‚Äúfell out they sky‚Äù. It was just past the rooftop to our two story home; there was no damage. She came in upset and put it on the charger. Today, we go out to try and get the sunset, and we don‚Äôt get that far. It did have a sketchy start and didn‚Äôt lift off that well, but then it seemed to continue on just fine‚Ä¶again, it just falls out of the sky, this time I witnessed it myself, and a propeller broke off, I‚Äôm guessing because it was higher, so more force? I came in here to look at the return policy and of course there is no recourse. Perhaps they can send a new propeller..until this happens again? We shall see. Anyways, save your money. The reviews and photos are stellar, and while it does take great photos, you will see that it tends to fall out of the sky for LOTS of other consumers. I feel bamboozled and this company clearly sucks. Spend even more money and find something better. Wish I would have filtered the reviews. Holy Stone‚Ä¶you‚Äôre welcome for my cash contribution.

title: Good buy
