title: Great Beginner Drone
text: This is an easy to use, simple, and functional drone that is great for those just getting into drone flying.  The altitude and position hold features work flawlessly, while the return to home works just as well. This is not a drone for film making as it does not have 3 axis gimbals  or a super high quality camera. That aside, it is still a great first drone.

title: Easy to set up and get flying!
text:
I bought this as a replacement to an earlier version that I had for 2 years.
I have only had this one on one flight, but I have to report I am very enthusiastic about how well made and easy to fly this model is! The camera is great, with good color and detail rendering, and less curvature distortion than the older model.
The only thing I can say as a caution is to make certain you do all the preflight things in the instructions, and be well away from structures or trees when you initiate the flight. First flights can be a little unpredictable on take off, and mine was. But take off after that were predictable and easy.
Very happy with purchase!

title: Great starter drone
text:
[[VIDEOID:63b6474db0e31318a4c49b44de38c16c]] I really enjoy this drone. I‚Äôm a beginner and it definitely gives you confidence. The gps one key return is fantastic especially while practicing if you lose your bearings. Same goes for the one key take-off and land. Because of all the features there is still a bit of a learning curve, but it‚Äôs amazing to have them all for this price. Seeing how this is targeting beginners I would have liked propeller guards included.

Overall I think this is punching way above its weight in terms of value. Perfect first drone that should last quite a while before needing an upgrade.

Pros: GPS, auto take-off/land, remote camera angle control, good weight for stability in windy conditions, and value.

Cons: could use propeller guards, handset barely fits iPhone 11 with a slim case. Larger phones will not fit.

title: Great product
text: Easy to setup and fly.

title: Updated review after having issues.
text:
I just got the HS-100 today, and assembled it, which was very easy, used only the charge that it had out of the box for a quick test to make sure there were no manufacturing malfunctions that would show immediately. This isn't my first UAS, so I was somewhat used to the method. The aircraft is very nice, seems to be well built and sturdy. I went though some of the basic features during the test flight. It flew very nicely, responded to my commands, and took clear vids and pics. Has lots of power. Note: before looking too long for the propellers, turn the Styrofoam box over to find them. :)
Looking forward to many fun times, flying my new toy.

After 3 months, this thing fell out of the sky. I‚Äôve read that the same happened to many.

Customer service came through for me after my trouble with the drone. They stepped up and did the right thing. Very grateful that they have wonderful customer service, willing to help out if problems occur.

title: So many features
text: This was my first drone that I have owned. I am pretty good at flying it and only took a few hours to learn well. It takes around 30 minutes to assemble and so far it is definitely worth it. It has a good camera and flies very fast when you want it to and slow when you want it to. It has many great features such as automated take off and landing. You can press a button and it flies in the air at around five feet. Whenever the drone is about to die it flies back to the starting position for worry free flying. If you crash it, which I did once when I first started, one of the propeller protects falls off and the system senses it and stops flight. Overall it is a good quality drone with many great features and a good camera that takes pictures and videos. Amazing purchase!

title: Totally awesome drone for someone like myself
text: Totally awesome drone for someone like myself. Limited experience flying. The most difficult part of flying if takeoff and landing. The HS100 does that for you and if you feel like you are loosing control. Just touch the home button and it comes back to where it lifted off and lands itself. Highly recommend this drone. A small hub has to be installed with an even smaller screw to hold the prop on motor shaft. Easier to start screw into hub, then slid hub onto motor shaft and install screw. Prevents dropping tiny screw and then trying to find it.

title: Great product for good price!
text: Easy to use (since I'm a beginner) and great quality for the money! Definitely would recommend to my friends. Connects well to phone as well and video quality is good.

title: Easy to fly and reliable.
text:
Following the instructions (pretty straightforward) the drone was in the air in no time. Worked as described, the images are good.
Some cool function, like back home, and automatic landing...just pay attention the drone does not avoid obstacles automatically. I Love it.

title: Best inexpensive drone ever!
text: This drone is amazing its easy to learn easy to fly its just all simpleness. It comes with more than it advertises, a notebook, accessorize case and i just amazing for the price i totally recommend this drone even if your a kid.

title: Mulfunction
text: At first this item really impressed me looked sturdy And worth every penny then it just stopped functioning properly. It does not charge up even when kept plugged in overnight and does not communicate with the remote exactly 6 weeks after buying it which makes it after my return window... very sad cause my grandson really loves it

title: Only drawback is 720p video resolution everything else is great
text:
This is my first drone so having essentially zero experience at piloting I have been very surprised at how easy the HS100 is to fly.
Just release the controls to neutral and the thing just hovers where ever it is and you can gradually begin to fly it where
you want it to go. It is then your job to get smoother with the controls because a smooth flight means nicer video can be shot by the
720p video camera. One thing to consider is the video camera though. In this era of jitter correcting Go-Pros that have 1080p or better
the camera on the HS 100 is the only weak point of this drone. And by weak I only mean is 720p going to be good enough video
quality for you and what you want to film with this machine. I wish the resolution was better but this is my first drone and for 279.00
I believe it is a great deal to get your start at owning and piloting a hobby drone.

There is a small amount of "some assembly required " when you get this drone out of the box and that is to attach the propellers.
The 4 screws that you must use (one to each propeller) are quite small and it is a fiddly bit of kit to get tiny screws into tiny holes
but have patience and good light and you can get it done. When I went to start charging up the battery's I found that the drone
battery charged nicely but the controller was DOA right out of the box. It would not charge up and only 1 light was lit on it's panel.

I called Holy Stone cust serv and talked to a guy named Salmon who was very helpful and after we got over a small language barrier
He told me that they were sending me another drone package with a good controller and maybe I will get lucky and the drone in the
box will be good too. He was right. The controller that came worked perfectly and the drone in the box worked just fine too. So now I
have 2 good drones for the price of 1 and I have ordered a second controller for 30 bucks from amazon.

I intend to give the second drone and controller to a good friend of mine who has expressed interest in shall we say
droning around.

title: Five Stars
text: Drone worked great out of the box. Expensive features at a great price!

title: Great Product and Excellent Customer Service!
text: I got this drone for Christmas and didn‚Äôt use it until well after the Amazon return period expired (like an idiot). title: I love this drone!!
text: First of all, the price was awesome compared to other drones I've looked at. Getting the camera's WiFi to work with my android phone has been impossible. I had to steal my wife's I phone 5 in order to see the camera shots. I'm hoping that this issue can be resolved. I haven't flown it for long periods as of yet, due to weather, but for what time I have flown it, it seems to respond VERY well to my commands so far. Overall, I think that this is going to be an excellent addition to my business, and I look forward to shoot MANY videos with it.

title: No internet means no maps
text:
Meh. Flies just fine, but the Google Maps aspect of the app is completely useless. Since the app takes over the networking, and WiFi always takes precedence over cellular data, Maps doesn't show anything but a blank screen.

If I'd known that ahead of time I wouldn't have bothered with this drone. But I'll try to use it even though the most useful feature (to me) is unavailable

title: Big Drone and no cases available that fit unless you disassemble it each time.
text: The stone is very fun to fly but there are no cases out there that will fit this Drone. It is bigger than any other cases out there. It's even too big for the car that says it was made for this Drone.

title: It will drive you crazy.
text:
This product has received mostly positive marks any where you look. It has great features for such a low price. But here's what bugged me. I've been trying to learn how to fly it. Never flown a drone before. Knew it was going to take a while to learn. I'm OK with that. But every time I crashed and was going to try again it wanted to be calibrated. Every single time! Pick it up, rotate 360, then stand on it's end and rotate again. then upside down, and rotate again. Every. Single. Time. So instead of crashing it, I pounded it into smithereens. Completely. Nothing left but a few large pieces
and a lot of tiny ones. And now I'm buying another one. So if you've got a short temper, don't buy this thing. It'll drive you crazy.
Got another one. Tried to fly it. First I had to calibrate it 10 times before it was satisfied and I could fly. Then it took off sideways, flew off somewhere I can't see, and is now lost. During it's short flight, I had no control over it.
So, one star. Can I give it none?

title: Very good for new drone users
text: I am new to the world drones.  I wanted to get a drone with functionality, but didn't know what to expect.  After reviewing several drones online, I decided on the HS 100.  It was difficult to get started right away as it was always windy and cold out.  On a warmer day I took the drone out and tested it.  It took a little bit of learning to get the drone sync'd up with my phone, but we eventually got it.  The instructions for this aren't the clearest, but now I can do it fairly quickly.  We have taken the drone out several times now and my kids love chasing it around our yard.  It takes pretty good videos and pictures.  The range was a lot shorter than I thought, but still good enough for us.  The auto take-off/landing makes things real easy.  All things considered, I am happy with the drone.

title: Great Drone for Beginners
text:
This is my second drone--the first one being the HS181--so this one is much larger. But it is so much fun! I find it much more responsive, and the ability to fly in windy conditions (<22MPH) makes a BIG difference.
I have yet to test ALL of the features, but the GPS mode/iPhone makes it a completely different experience! I am still experimenting with flying with the joysticks alone and with the camera/GPS.
The RTH (Return to Home) and Headless mode work very nicely. It is especially nice to have a live camera feed.
My biggest issue? Where to fly!! I want to do it away from "populated" areas.

title: Didnt work
text: Unfortunately tried two of these drones and controller would say it was fully charged but when trying to fly the app would say remote control low and not fly. Plus each time before flight had to recalibrate drone.

title: Easy to Learn to fly
text: Received as a gift in 2018 and did not have a chance to fly it until today.  What fun it was to fly.  Went to the lake and found a field that was cleared of objects.  Made the settings for beginners and with the help of the app, my flight was scary at first but during the time I flew, it was exciting.  The beginner mode was extremely helpful to learn take offs and landing in the same area.  The flight distance and height was preset and I didn't have to worry about a runaway or crash and burn.  After a few more practice flights, will try without the beginner mode turned on.  Although my flight time was short today, mainly due to the wind picking up and causing the drone to use up the battery time to maintain excellent control of the drone and not forcing it to crash.  Looking forward to the next flight. Did have an audience while flying as you can see a coyote was watching.

title: Good drone and easy to fly

text: This is a great drone especially for beginners. I've had other stunt and racing drones this is my first bigger drone with a camera and I love it the camera is great it controls very well just try to stay out of the trees if you hit one it looks like a weed wacker is up there LOL

title: Best Drone - Easy to Fly - Worth the price
text: After looking at many different models online, I decided to get this drone as a gift for my boyfriend's 35th birthday. I wanted a mid-range priced aircraft which was easy to fly, but not a kid's toy. This drone was more than I expected. It came with a screwdriver and was easy to assemble. He was outside testing it out in about 20 mins. The "beginner" function makes it easy to learn how to fly without crashing - once you get comfortable, you can expand your peramiters and really go nuts. He had no problem operating the "follow me" feature and enjoyed how it kept up with him. The camera takes beautiful, crisp video and pictures once you get the hang of it and can keep it steady. He loves the lights at night; and I think it's pretty sleek-looking all around. Awesome product for the price. 10/10 would buy again with all the fun my lad is having with this.

title: Perfect price, Easy to learn

Perfect price, Easy to learn, started right off flying great. Picture and video are good quality.
Good device to begin on.

title: Durable drone for beginners.
text: [[VIDEOID:e7057bbdaac1c10fb7aac39901888c18]] Im a pretty big fan of this drone. Im a drone beginner and this seemed like a good product for that. The startup procedure with calibration is fairly simple and you can start flying fairly quickly. Do NOT ever fly this drone indoors. I had several hard crashes into trees amd telephone poles my first few days of flying. This drone responds very abruptly so dont try to fly in in close spaces. It can fly fairly fast and has a decent range for the wifi. Realistically about 300 meters or so. The altitide hold and stabilization works very well, as does the return to home feature. I was pleasantly surprised how well it returns to the exact spot of takeoff. It holds up well through crashes so far. The only thing that broke very quickly for me was the landing gear's twist to lock function. I recommend setting up and leaving the landing gear on. I think it broke my 3rd or 4th time of removal and reinstall. I super glued it and just left it on. The blades are flexible and tough, having survived numerous crashes. I wish the camera had a zoom function, but the 90 degree rotation up and down works well. Very pleased with our drone!

title: Its like playing a real life video game!
text:
This Drone was my 3rd attempt at owning one and like the saying goes, "3rd time is the charm"! I couldn't be happier. From right out of the box I was easily able to assemble, charge, install app, and FLY. It seems easy, but as I stated this was my 3rd time trying different Drones. The Holy Stone worked just as it stated, and did even better than I was expecting.

Ok, aside from the excitement about finally getting to fly, let me tell you about my experience with this Drone. First off, there are some really great videos online that make it easy to see how to operate. Not only that, but once you do start flying the system is very stable and extremely responsive. It has some great features (not all of which Ive tested yet) like the take off and land function. That feature alone will save you from replacing blades. The manual states in bold print DOES NOT HAVE OBSTACLE AVOIDANCE, so you have to be a bit careful. I haven't had a problem especially since you have a live view from the camera being displayed on your phone attached to the controller!!! Yeah, its a lot like playing a real life video game. However I bought it with the purpose of mapping property I own in the mountains. Lots and Lots of trees, but she is still flying like a champ. The videos and photos have allowed me to plan installations as well as find some hidden treasures on the property we had never noticed before. I would highly recommend this Drone, especially if you're a beginner like I was!

title: A solid product ‚Äî- continued
text:
The product came very well packaged. The instruction booklet is clear enough to make assembly relatively easy (even for a senior citizen, such as myself). The battery already had about 75% of its charge. Pieces snapped into place the way they were supposed to. The pairing of the controller and copter was straightforward. The calibration of the compass a little less so but was accomplished in a few minutes. Connecting with app on the phone was also straightforward. In fifteen minutes total I had the unit doing its basic flying (five feet up in the air, steady, and then coming down slowly). Ready to play with this with my grandson now.

After a few days the wifi connection between iPhone and drone began to fail. I tried everything suggested by Customer Support (which is very good), but could not solve this problem. Finally I found that the camera was not firmly attached to the drone (was not fully screwed in clockwise). After proper tightening everything worked perfectly. I am new at this but learning fast. This is an excellent product for beginners.

title: A decent drone for beginners.  Outstanding customer service
text:
I bought this drone for a newly formed Drone Club at the middle school I work at. We had purchased several other drones to get the kids started and to learn some basic principles of flight. After graduating up past two other drone models, we started on this one. After receiving it, I put everything together and flew it in my back yard just to test things out. Satisfied, I brought it to school and presented it to the drone club. I was embarrassed when I could not get it to complete the GPS calibration. After many tries, we gave up, made a video of how we were trying to get it to calibrate. I had contacted Holy Stone support and after they watched the video, they sent me a replacement. Because it appeared the first one was defective, they told me to keep it for parts. When the new one arrived, I again tested it in my back yard and all seemed good. No GPS connection issues and it flew as expected. On the next Drone Club day, I had one of the kids go through the set up process and GPS calibration. No problems were encountered and it flew fine. One the next attempt to fly, I set it up, moved to a new location and tried the GPS calibration. If failed. Nothing I did would make it calibrate successfully. One of the kids tried it again and to my surprise, it calibrated without any problems. To make a long story shorter, I discovered that the malfunctioning GPS calibration was my fault. When I tested each drone at my house, I was wearing causal clothes. When I was trying to fly it at the school, I was wearing a uniform. Part of that uniform was a body cam attached to the chest area. The body cam is held in place with a strong magnet under the uniform shirt. The magnet was causing the drone calibration to malfunction. It was completely my fault, not the drone or equipment. To add to my ongoing embarrassment, I tried calibrating the first drone without the body cam and it worked flawlessly. So to be fair, I contacted Holy Stone and told them what happened and I offered to send the replacement drone back. Surprisingly, they told me to keep both! That my friends is great customer service! It wasn't even their problem but they took care of the client, me!

So now about the drone. It is an easy drone to fly. the controller is larger than most but it fit snug and comfortable in my hands. The camera controls were easy to use and the photos and videos were very good. I got about 20 minutes of flight time on a fully charged battery in calm winds. Shorter battery life when it was a bit breezy. I leave the prop guard on because the kids are still learning. I haven't seen that the prop guards have any adverse effect on the performance. There are still a few features we haven't used (follow me, return to home, etc) so I can't comment on them. But overall, I like the performance of the drone and would recommend it for a beginner or intermediate user.

Thank you Holy Stone for your support and understanding!

title: Excellent choice for beginner
text: I have wanted to purchased a drone for recreational use for quite some time.  Until I found the reviews for  the Holy  Stone HS100 I didn't think I would find a drone with a good camera and good navigation that also had beginner failsafe options.  I've had the drone for a few days and have flown four times.  My first flight was a bit of a letdown as I had trouble controlling the direction of flight.  Then I realized the problems I was encountering were of my own making.  Reading other reviews and watching videos had given me a lot of good information and pointers but I had missed one important point.  The right hand joystick controls forward, backward, right, left flight.  What I had missed, however, that the direction the camera is pointing is relevant.  If the camera is pointing away from you then the joystick movements mirror the directions the drone will fly.  Pull the joystick left and the drone will fly left, etc.  If you camera is facing you however, then the drone will fly in the opposite direction of the joystick control.  In other words, the camera's face will lead the drone to go left, right, forward or backwards as you direct it with the joystick.  Once I understood that then controlling the movement of the drone was a breeze.  I have been very pleased with the "go home" feature and as a beginner it's reassuring to know that it will return home automatically when the battery charge gets too low for safe flight.  All in all, I'm glad I waited for this drone to make my purchase and anticipate many happy hours of flight.

title: Features and Functionality
text: I selected the HS100 drone from Holy Stone because it offered the features and functionality in which I was interested. It offered ease-of-use right out of the box as well as the power and stability for which I was hoping. The camera while being 720p takes relatively good quality pictures and the 90 degree adjustable tilt is an excellent feature.  The battery life is between 10 and 15 minutes, which is sufficient for my needs; I purchased additional batteries to extend flight time as needed. A draw-back is the recharge time for the batteries - 3-6 hours. Another short coming are the user instructions.  They are lacking in many areas.  One in particular is the assembly of the propellers; it does not go in to sufficient detail on securing the locking hub.  Fortunately there are You-Tube videos that cover all aspects of the assembly.  If the instructions pointed the user to the videos that would be a great start.  Even with the short comings, I am very satisfied with my purchase and would recommend this drone to others.

title: Great starter drone
text: You wont find a better drone for the money and the customer support is amazing. I crashed mine and it was damaged and they sent replacement parts no questions asked!

title: ver ever ever from this company or person! You have to be good.
text: Easy to fly. Good reaction. Took a few tries to get the app to show up, but it finally did. After that, no complaints so far. It's very stable in the wind.

title: Great
text: Great for beginners this drone is easy to fly and great customer service

title: It was great that the kit came almost completely assembled and with ...
text: It was great that the kit came almost completely assembled and with the tools to assemble the rotors! It also came with spare legs and an an extra set of propellers! I took some video 10ft from the edge of a waterfall onto the provided 8GB SD Card it was quite amazing. I'm really happy with the product. What a great first drone. Thanks Holy Stone!

title: Great customer service
text: Fast and great customer service. I highly recommend. They stand behind their product.

title: The BEST drone I have flown!
text:
[[VIDEOID:2677bfc958e4818dc85d00101d558f36]] I have the HS180, HS110, and HS200 drones and had great experiences with them and customer support. So based on my past experience, I decided to step up to the HS100 and I am certainly happy I did. This thing is the most fun I have had flying drones so far. GPS sure makes a great difference!

You will see my first flight video here from take-off to landing. I was a little nervous, so please forgive some jerkiness. The day was overcast and there was a breeze. Even with the breeze, the drone held position excellently while hovering due to the GPS. Even when the drone was caught by a gust of wind, it would reposition back to the original hover point by itself. You will notice I used the camera to demonstrate moving it up and down as well.

The assembly was very straight forward and easy to understand. It only involved assembling the propellers and propeller guards. Unfortunately for me, I have large fingers and the assembly uses very small screws. This presented a real challenge for me, but I was able to get it done.

The camera is cool too. While the drone is in the air, you can adjust the camera up or down to get the shot you want. You can take pictures or videos by using the transmitter control or your iPhone. iPad, or other capable devices. The photos and/or videos can be stored on the included TF card (micro SD) or on your phone or tablet.

The size of the drone is larger than any of my previous drones. Assembled, it is aproximately 19.5 inches wide, 19.5 inches long, and 7 inches high. The motors seem to be more powerful than my other drones as well. Additionally, the battery is much larger providing up to 15 minutes, almost double the flying time of my other drones.

Can you tell I REALLY like it?

title: Solid. great performance. And best of all
text: I loved the ease of putting this wonderful drone together in anticipation of its first flight. After reading instructions fully charging batty..... Off into the air went the maiden flight of his holystone. Responded perfectly no issues. Have been recommending to every one. Truly a best best buy.

title: Outstanding Customer Service
text: I recent had a problem with my Holy stone Drone Wings that came off. When I contacted contacted their customer service for assistance I received and email immediately from Barry their Customer Service Representative who was helpful, knowledgeable and totally professional during our entire encounter. I most certainly will buy more of their products!!

title: Great drone for a great price!
text:
This drone is honestly very good. It is easy to fly and easy to learn. The automatic take off/landing makes this almost foolproof.

PROS:
1) Easy to learn how to fly
2) Fantastic video
3) GPS hold and return to home make this more enjoyable in windy conditions
4) Follow-Me feature is very cool - a bit unstable, but it does work.
5) The compact controller folds up nicely

My biggest gripes about this are so small, they are barely worth mentioning. However, to keep this honest, here they are.
CONS:
1) The cellphone holder is too small for most newer phones. I tried it with a Galaxy Note 9 (too small) and a Galaxy S10 Plus (barely fits).
2) The battery takes about 3-4 hours to charge for only about 15 minutes of flight time. I understand that LiPo batteries can take a while to charge, but I feel like a spare battery should be included for the price you pay.
3) I wish that it had better angle control on the camera.

Overall, I think that this is worth it for the price. It really is a lot of fun to fly!

title: My first Drone
text:
I selected this drone due to the many positive reviews. Its a nice drone and was easy to assemble and learn to fly. Delivery was fast with Amazon Prime. It flies well and is fun but disappointed that the camera picture quality is not that great. Pictures are not crisp and areas of the pictures are washed out.

Follow up comments - contacted Holy Stone about camera issue - I followed all of the recommendations they suggested with no success. They offered to send a replacement part kit on 4/7 and a replacement camera on 4/17. To date I have not received either! I'm nearing the point of returning this product. The drone itself is very good but if you can't take a decent picture with it it defeats my purpose for having it.

Follow up 4/30. After e-mail discussion with June at Holy Stone she sent me a part kit and replacement camera. The picture quality is much better with the new camera installed. Happy with my purchase now :) I must say Holy stone stands behind their product!

title: Easy to use and high quality
text: This drone is loads of fun. It is capable of flying to high elevations and taking quality photos and videos. The application on your phone is also very helpful as it will notify you when your drone is low on battery etc. I recommend purchasing this affordable drone to capture events and beautiful scenery, from a birds eye view. I am looking forward to using this drone for years to come!

title: Great picture quality! Fun to fly!
text: I bought this for my husbands birthday and he just flew it for the first time. He has never flown a drone before this one and it was so easy to learn even for being a beginner! Also really impressed with the picture quality! Very happy with this purchase!

title: Holy Stone HS100. Get one yourself!
text: Awesome purchase! It arrived quickly and well packaged. If you cannot find the propellers, they are hidden underneath the styrofoam insert. In fact, the seller emailed me about this personally. The manual is pretty straightforward and easy to understand. I took my time perusing it as I didn't want to crash the drone straight away. The remote controller easily holds my Galaxy S9 and is very solid. In fact, I was pleasantly surprised by the overall good quality of the parts. Definitely a lot of bang for the buck. I just love how easy this drone to fly is. It is also surprisingly quiet. I look forward to having a lot of fun with this drone!

title: Absolute beginner! I love my drone!

My favorite feature is of course being able to take good quality pictures and videos.

title: Nicely packed

title: Five Stars

title: The BEST drone for beginners
text:
I bought this drone back in October 2018 and it was waiting in the box for its time for 4 long months, as I was abroad.
In the 1st week of March 2019, I finally was back and could give it a try.
As a complete newbie to drones (it's my 1st drone), I was quite worried of crushing it right during the 1st flight.
However, Holy Stone HS100 proved all its positive reviews here and was very easy to fly and control.
I can not explain in words the joy I felt during the 1st flight. It was just awesome! You must feel it!
The 1st flight lasted about 14-15 mins, the 2nd and 3rd ones a bit shorter, 11-13 mins, as it has been a bit windy here recently.
I also checked the HS100's app's VR mode and it not only works, but gives you a feeling of being a pilot or a bird up in the sky.
Overall, my score is 10 out of 10. Will buy it again as a gift for friends/family. Keep it up Holy Stone!

title: there is no way to control unless you have the smart phone app running and you press RTH button on ...
text: Be careful; if controller runs out of battery power while drone is in flight; there is no way to control unless you have the smart phone app running and you press RTH button on smart phone before drone gets out of range.

title: Great drone!  Buy one.
text:
Wow this is a great product. Please note that the rotors are in a compartment in the bottom of the Styrofoam box. We opened ours on Christmas day and assembled it the instructions were clear and it took around 30 minutes. Make sure to have very thin Philips head screwdrivers to attach the legs.

The app is very good and has instructions to calibrate the compass which are accurate but I still misread them a couple of times. Luckily I had a 12 year old around to tell me I was wrong;) On our maiden flight the drone worked well and responded to the controls effectively. The camera was pretty cool and we got some good footage.

Unfortunately I crashed the drown when the wind caught it and broke a part. I was able to order a replacement part from a very helpful tech support team. Great experience all around aside from my crummy piloting.

title: does almost everything an $800+ drone does, just nowhere near as well.
text:
Was able to return this, their customer support was really helpful! Got this as fathers day gift. We flew it 3 times no problem on Sunday, at an open field (in between the 6+ hr recharge times). The next day we take it out, fly for less than 5 min when one of the props stop spinning and it barrel rolls into the ground snapping an arm on the drone.

It does almost everything an $800+ drone does (GPS, FPV, Recording, Gyroscope, camera gimbal), just not as well. Was a lot of fun on the first day but we quickly found problems with the...
1) .AVI files on the SD card, couldn't open any file over 10MB.
2) the first person view through WIFI, was really spotty.
3) Control precision, the joy sticks have a big dead zone and a small interval range from really slow to really fast. (The cheapo drone I was replacing had more control than this)

title: Read All of the Directions
text: Love my drone, till it got away from me and flew deep in the trees. I must admit I only read half of the directions; the gps was turned off, other wise I could called it back. I‚Äôll order another one.

title: Great first drone when moving from 'toy' drones
text:
I purchased this after not crashing a few 30-50 dollar quad drones. The first thing that struck me was the size. It's big... and it has some weight to it which is a plus when flying in light gusts of wind. After getting GPS dialed in (which took about 30 seconds) it was airborne. The flight time is impressive. I'm guessing around 10-12 minutes depending on conditions and how hard your flying it. Order an extra battery if you buy this. Flying for 10-15 then waiting a few hours to fly again wasn't happening for me.

Return Home is amazing. I've just flown it full throttle nearly out of site and when it loses comms with the remote... it waits a moment or two then cruises back.

Pros:
-Batteries has a charge meter built in to them
-Solidly built
-GPS - return home feature is awesome
-pan / tilt on the camera a really nice feature
Cons:
-Not super portable
-720p camera isn't very impressive but works well nonetheless
-need to be sure to STOP recording before powering drone off and removing sd card, otherwise the video can become corrupt

Overall, I really like this drone. Only after flying others with better camera's I became a little picky about the stock camera quality.
Camera aside, the drone flying experience itself has been a solid 10/10.

title: Easy to fly for beginners
text: Great product highly recommend very easy to use high quality video

title: Easy to learn and fly
text: I bought this for my 13 year old to replace a cheap drone that was terrible to control and fly. This was easy to operate and right out of the box quick and easy to put together.

title: A decent step up from a Sub $100 Drone
text:
Looking for a step up from a Target/Walmart $70 drone but don't want to drop over $1k on a DJI? Just starting out and want something with more features than a sub $100 drone? This is probably the drone for you.

First of all, be realistic. This is a sub $500 drone. You're not going to get 4k video or a camera on a gimbal. You're going to get an "OK" drone.

Flight: This drone handles pretty well. I spent a good hour zooming around the yard and taking it up to max FAA allowed altitude (400 ft). It handles much better than cheaper drones, which is what I expected. The dial on the left hand side of the controller adjusts your speed, which is great for beginners. You can start out slow until you get the feel for flying it and then increase the speed as your comfortable. I was able to quickly do figure 8's in a fairly quick and controlled manner. The controls are responsive enough that you can inch in and hover close to an object (as long as you keep visual line of sight, more on this in a bit). If you lose your orientation on the drone releasing both sticks halts the drone pretty quickly so you can get your bearings again. Overall, a very easy to fly drone.

You'll need to register your drone with the FAA and and put your registration number on the drone, so budget in another $5 and skip the value meal at McDonalds.

Battery life: I was getting between 10-15 minutes per battery (I have three), which is again, exactly what I expected given the specs from the manufacturer and the conditions I was flying in.

Camera: The camera is 780p. It's not going to be crisp or clean like a 1080 or a 4k. The dial on the right hand side of the controller is used to tilt the camera up or down. No side to side panning is available. However, I noticed that at times the camera wouldn't respond to the controller signal to tilt. This seemed to happen the further the drone got away from the controller, which is a shame.

The App: This is where points get lost. The app seems ok at first. If you're looking to do FPV flying, this is NOT the drone you're looking for. As I started flying the video on the app (On my iPhone 7+) was just ok. Several times I lost connection with the drone totally or the video would just freeze. At first I thought this was due to distance, but even in a small radius of under 100 feet, the app would lose connection to the drone. For the price of the drone, I would have expected the app to function better. Because of this, flying FPV is at your own risk, best to have a spotter with you.

Overall: As the title says, if you're looking to step up from sub $100 drones to something a bit more full featured, you'll be happy with this drone. Easy to fly and responsive. The lower end camera is a bit of a disappointment, but this falls in to the realm of "getting what you pay for." The app needs some serious work to make this drone ready for FPV, which is advertised.

title: Great Value Drone - Easy Operation
text: First Drone.  I waited until the prices dropped from the super expensive units, to more reasonably priced units.  I was not disappointed with this purchase.  The limited assembly required my eye glass readers to get the small screws in the pre drilled holes, but that was the only hurdle for me.  The booklet supplemented by the video at their website made for an easy setup and first flight.  I will be using the beginner mode until I get the hang of it, but all in all it was simple simple simple to operate.  Hooking up to my android phone with their app was easy once connected to the HS100 wifi.  Camera worked well.  Assisted take off and landing was excellent.  I look forward to expanding my capabilities and using this drone as an additional hobby.  I am very satisfied to date - Oh, and I will be asking for an additional battery.  It is amazing how quickly 12 minutes goes by which is the flight time per battery!

title: Easy to fly!
text: Great product, very stable and easy to fly.  I like this drone!

title: Fun, but take your time to learn if you're new
text:
I purchased this a couple of years ago because I received a gift card and I always wanted to have a drone. After getting it I flew it a couple of times to try learning it and crashed it quite a few times.

Now with the pandemic and being at home more, plus fair weather I decided to take the drone back out after reading the instructions and watching videos and I have to say this time it is a dramatically different experience. I'm still learning but after changing flight modes to something that worked better for me as a gamer.

After getting over this learning curve I have been able to use the drone to survey the roof of my house, as well as a couple of other family members, and have fun "chasing" my niece/nephew and dog around the yard. With as much fun that I'm having I wish I took the time to learn how to use it better much sooner.

My original battery that I barely used failed to a point of not recharging, but it was easy to find and order additional batteries, which also makes it easier to enjoy being able to fly more and while different batteries recharge. Would recommend getting extras.

title: Fun to Fly
text:
First off, you should not expect to just take this out of the box and go. You need to assemble it somewhat for one, and you need to calibrate it once it is built to fly in a new location. It may seem complicated but just get the app and it will step you through what to do.

Pro: It is fun and fairly easy to fly. I have crashed it a few times and it seems to have not taken damage. Return to home function is very nice, gets fairly close when I have tried it.

Con: You have to find an old charger than has very low amps according to the directions. The pictures arent super sharp but they are fine for the price. Again, getting started can be a bit daunting.

I do recommend!

title: Excellent, excellent, excellent!!!!
text:
Really good drone, easy to learn , easy to fly.
I don‚Äôt think it gets any better for the money.
Highly recommend it!!

title: Great Drone, Great Price, Great Customer Service
text: The HS 100 is a great drone.  I had a bit of trouble syncing the controller with the drone at first as the manual doesn't explain it too well.  Customer service was very responsive and happy to assist.  After watching the video it was much easier to get flying. Battery life is only 10-15 minutes so i'd recommend buying extra batteries. I do get more flight time now that I am getting more familiar with the whole start up procedure.

title: very loose connection between remote and drone
text: This is a pretty costly drone. Its performs OK as long as it stays connected to the remote.  Pictures and video qualoty just OK. The wi-fi connection between the drone and remote is very unreliable too. It had lost connection few times but used to return to home... once it lost the connection with remote and flew away and was never found..what a loss... not worth this price at all...never recommend to anyone!!

title: Best Drone under 300
text:
Wow what a great drone. I think this is the best drone under 300 on the market right now. Starting from GPS/GLONASS connection and all the way to autonomous flight modes such as follow me, this camera bird has them all. On top of all that, you also have access to altitude hold and return to home, both of which work via GPS/GLONASS reception. Last but not least, headless mode is present as well, making sure beginners are not left out with this one.
Holy Stone HS100 can achieve approximately 10 to 15 minutes of flight time (depending on the payload) and go as far as 500 meters away from its stylish controller.
What else do you want with less than 300 dollars. If you want more like 1080p camera and and sensors anti collision you need to expend between 500 and 1000 dollars if not this is your best option, I guarantee you!!

title: Alright Product

title: This is our first drone but so far seems like an excellent buy
text: This is our first drone but so far seems like an excellent buy, great product for the price. Can‚Äôt wait to try it out with my nephew.

title: Great Company and a Great Product
text: I really like this Holy Stone drone, I was able to pull it out of the box, put the blades on and fly it without any issues, very user friendly and works as designed.  I am impressed with how simple this is to fly even in windy conditions.  My last drone was way too hard to fly when it was windy.  I like the camera, and the VR view, I am able to fly with my headset on. Sure it's not a racing drone but it still is really awesome. title: Great starter drone

text: I have flown RC planes and helicopters for over 30 years and I am really impressed with the quality of this drone.  Pictures and videos are very clear.  Definitely need an extra battery since flying time is about 15 minutes.  Otherwise, this is a great drone that I would recommend to others

title: Holy Stone drone.
text: I had a rough start. I order the HS100 drone on a lighting deal. It show up in two days. I opened the package and the security seal on the box was broke open. Inside the package was a drone that had been tampered with.  There were missing parts, screws laying at the bottom of the box, no extra blades, no manual, and I not sure what else was missing. I was surprised that it showed up this way. I called Amazon customer service and they were great. They told me to order another one and they would refund my money on that one when they received it back. The next day, the new drone was delivered. I was surprised when the security tabs were opened on that box also. I opened it and it appeared untouched. I found out that the charge cable was missing. I received an E-mail from Holy stone thanking me about my purchase. I emailed holy stone back and they responded right away. They sent me a charge cable and kept in touch until everything was right. Amazon stepped up and took care of me also. My first flight of the drone was amazing. It's easy to fly. It takes pretty good pictures and had a  fairly stable platform. I love the drone and the customer service from Holy Stone and Amazon. It's a lot of drone for the money.

title: Holy Stone Customer Service is OUTSTANDING!
text: Excellent Cuatomer Support with all of it's products. Purchased 2 drones so far and considering a third.

title: Fun Drone, AMAZING SUPPORT, (still reviewing)
text:
(Update: 7/8/19)
Finally had a day to test. Did a head to head test with drone A (replacement drone sent by support) vs drone B (Original Drone received). I was correct, drone B does have issues; Home still does send the drone to the skies until disengaged (today, however, was the 1st day that descend worked properly after disengaging Home), but drone A worked great with Home. I was able to try both drones several times and each time, same scenario, drone A flew right back to home, drone B just went straight up.
Thank you to Holy Stone for your amazing support. You backed your product and that goes a long way.

(update: 7/4/19)
Holy Stone's support has been great! I can certainly say that, as another drone has been sent out / received (MUCH APPRECIATED!). UNFORTUNATELY I've only had one day to test - we've been pretty windy the last couple days, so I've flown one day. Here's what I can take from that process:
For some reason, I'm not sure if it was me or not, but the new drone went together flawlessly. The 1st one had problems with the caps on top of the rudders, only one would fit correctly, the other three seemed to have a slight gap. Drone 2, the rudder caps went on perfect, smooth, easy, and super flush.
My only flight seemed okay. I didn't go too crazy, but one VERY important thing seemed to work correctly, descend, however, I only tried Home once, but disengaged function to fly a bit more.
I'll definitely update as I fly and use the Home function - just too windy lately to safely fly without waking up at 6am.
I'm updating my score a point for the great support from Holy Stone and how smoothly setup went - however, I will update as I have the opportunity to fly more - hopefully another point (to 5) as my confidence hopefully grows wt the 2nd drone.
(Side note: bought a Holy Stone micro drone and LOVE IT!)

(Initial review)
Stable flight, decent camera though very slow to change viewing angle. Most everything about this drone is solid but one important function, 'Home'. When my drone is 50'+ away from me, the Home sends the drone straight up. I can hit Home a 2nd time and the operation will stop as will the drone's assention. But when I hit Home again.... straight up again! I have noticed that Home will work within a 15' to 30' range - everthing else will work as well BUT when this error happens, the descend doesn't work properly either.
Due to my experiences, I don't trust this drone to come back when the Home button is pressed nor do I with a low battery. I will follow the FAA protocol and NEVER let this drone out of my line of site, although when I first experienced the Home issue, that drone just kept going up and up, so high I could barely see it. At that time I discovered something else. The descend (left joystick down) doesn't work well either in conjunction with the home issue. Instead of holding the left joystick down, i have to toggle from center to down, and come down about 15, 20 feet at a time.
The support sent me new remote but that didn't fix the problem. So for me, I won't ever use Home, it seems to mess the drone up. I told my support agent that it's still happening but as long as I know what to expect, I'll deal with it as it is a lower cost, medium sized drone. I'm not going to claim I'm satisfied with it, but who knows, perhaps it's the park I'm going to? Will revise my review if my experience improves.

title: Great drone that wont break the bank
text: Bought this Drone for for a Birthday present for my Dad 50th . Few propellers to install and up and running . This is the first drone we have ever flew and I must say it is very easy to fly . Love the Easy landing and gps feature . Might want to get yourself a spare battery due to the 12-15 fly time . Overall I would highly recommend this product especially to beginners due to its price and its very simple to fly  .

title: Disappointed with battery quality and customer service
text:
I received this drone for a Christmas 2018 and flew it once after getting it. It then sat in storage until Memorial Day 2019 when I tried to charge the battery it would not charge, only showing the indicator lights shown in the attached photo. I called Holy Stone customer service only to be informed that the drone was out of warranty and that I must have overcharged the battery. I explained that I only used the drone once within a month of purchase and I was careful about charging the battery. The customer service agent said I could not prove I had only flown it once. I offered to send him the flight log from my Holy Stone app showing only one flight in December and he said it wouldn‚Äôt help because it was out of warranty and told me to buy another battery from Holy Stone.

I‚Äôm very disappointed that the battery went bad after one flight and that after all the positive reviews left on Amazon about Holy Stone customer service they were not willing to be helpful.

Based on my experience I will not buy another HS product and recommend if you are considering an HS that you look elsewhere, probably DJI.

title: Easier to use and more sophisticated than I expected
text: My family got me the HS 100 GPS for my birthday.  This may be a toy, but a very sophisticated toy and a riot to use!  The automatic take off and landing, and return to home features really shorten the learning curve, and the compass, GPS, and gyroscope make flying a breeze.  Just take it easy when you first start.  Don't make your first flight where there are lots of things to run into.  The toughest thing is probably keeping the joystick controls straight.  It's not difficult, just takes some getting used to.  The pictures it takes are surprisingly clear and sharp.  This drone exceeded my expectations in all ways but one: the battery life.  You get about 20 minutes of flight from a full battery.  Right now the company is offering a free spare battery if you leave a review on Amazon.  Buying additional batteries is expensive, but you will have so much fun with this drone you may find them to be a good investment.

title: Having lots of fun learning to fly my new hs100gps
text: Having lots of fun learning to fly my new hs100gps. I'm new to this and only have one battery that it was shipped with. So I have lots of down time waiting for charging. so far I'm pleased with it's performance. Can't wait for the spare battery to get here so I have more flight time.

title: Great

title: Holy Stone GPS Drone is exceptional a must order!! Completely Satisfied.

title: So far I'm very pleased with this drone
text: So far I'm very pleased with this drone.  Built well, instructions are easy to read and understand and flies well.

title: Excellent adventure drone for family use
text:
Bottom line: I'd buy this again today if I didn't already own it.

It's fairly easy to learn, though there is a clear learning process similar to flying any drone. It seems durable so far, as we've definitely crashed it a few times but without any noticeable side effects. The only critique I've found so far is a fairly short battery life (GET EXTRAS!) and the connection w/phone for operational control isn't always 100%.

title: This is THE ONE for beginners or old pros!!!
text: This Drone is absolutely a "Dream Machine"....it is easy to learn on yet is a professional quality product that can be used for roaming our farm property and shooting great pictures.  We are very happy with it.  It took us awhile to get to fly it as our weather has been so bad here.  But it gave us time to learn all about it from the company videos and ones that others had posted on YouTube...we were pleased by the available customer support if needed and the caring attitude of the Company---the little "Gifts" were appreciated too.

title: Novice
text: New to the flying of drones. This one was easy to get up and guide it. Love the pictures

title: Great real drone! Not a cheaply made toy.
text: I've only had experience with smaller drones with my son. This drone was fairly easy to operate and set up.I think with a second battery this drone will be awesome. I will be recommending it to my friends and family. I will also probably be sticking with your company for my drone experiences.

title: So annoying. Would I by it again hmmmm
text: I do home inspections the drone is priced right but the performance mediocre. Does not hover well in one spot even when there is no breeze. Forget about flying in anything stronger than 10MPH.  I find it very difficult to move it in the right spot and hold it to take my picture. Battery life is below average and the remote control battery life is unacceptably short. Not to mention 4 to 6 hours to recharge the flight batteries. The following comment is probably user error but, I cannot figure out how to stop the camera from taking pictures upside down. So annoying. Would I by it again hmmmm. Three stars because of the price and free battery. If i get one after this review:)

title: And the HS100 is the best drone, I have ever flew
text:
This is my Holystone 4th drone. And the HS100 is the best drone, I have ever flew.
I flew it outside in windy condition, the drone was incredibly stable.
Love the way it rules the sky, also I love the new controller.
First of all, this looks like a premium drone and it is wonderful to get it at this price.
The set up was really easy. You just need to get used to the mobile app for FPV videos.
It is very easy to operate. GPS is a great plus, never worry about
loosing this drone. And surprisingly, this comes with Follow me mode, which basically follows you around as you move
and you need not control it while it takes your videos.
The controller is a great enhancement from previous holy stone controllers.
It is made up of very high grade material and has a very expensive look and feel.
I liked it so much, I even made an unboxing video, may be can add that later here.

With this price range, I would say that this drone is one of the best drones you can find.

Pros:-

1. Great camera with FPV.
2. Awesome battery.
3. Absolutely worth the price.
4. Amazingly powerful motors.
5. Very easy to set up and fly. Nice App.
6. GPS mode is a great plus, never loose your drone again.
7. Great controller. Premium quality built for drone and controller.
8. Follow me mode.
9. Looks stunning

Cons:-

1. Takes some time to get the battery completely charged.
2. Storage

title: One awesome brand
text: This drone is awesome  easy to use and excellent tech support .had a motor quit ,they sent another motor but still did not work .they than sent replacement  drone . Only thing I didn't care for is the tiny screws for the blades .not easy task putting them in.

title: Met most of my expectations
text:
This drone is my first experience with drones and so far I have been pleased with the HS 100. I have learned that a beginner like me needs a lot of open space unless you like to climb trees to retrieve your drone.

I have attached two photographs that I recently took with the drone and I think the clarity of the photograph is very good for the price of the drone.

My only objection is the lack of clear instructions and assistance with the drone. The instructions with the drone give you basic information, and I have learned from groups on Facebook and other websites, but I expected more from the instructions in the box, especially for a drone at what seems to be entry level.

title: Great Drone for newbies!
text: Cool little drone! Works great and comes with extra pieces in case you break it!

title: Five Stars
text: great beginners drone. Boyfriend loves it. The camera is pretty decent for the price of the drone.

title: Purchased for my husband. He loves it. It ...
text: Purchased for my husband.  He loves it.  It has all the features and capabilities of a high end expensive drone without the price tag.  One suggestion would be to have a flight time of X amount hours or so before being allowed to remove from beginner mode (Some sort of configuration on the backend to disable advanced mode until they have used it for a bit)

title: Responsive
text: This is my third drone and by far the best one yet.  The drone responds very well.  The headless mode works very well.  A great feature is the return home button; especially if you lose the drone in the sun as I did.  Battery life as described is accurate; about 12-15 minutes, and charging has taken 5-6 hours if needing to fully recharge. Drone is solid, nice amount of spare parts.  Blade guards are well worth putting on.  Rechargeable controller is nice, and the charge lasts a long time. I am very pleased so far!

title: A complete piece of‚Ä¶
text: To say that this drone is awful is an understatement. Terrible quality. Pathetic flight. China at its worst. Pay more and get a DJI drone‚Ä¶ China - better.

title: A hun and sturdy drone.
text:
A Gun and sturdy drone for the beginner pilot. Though are the battery life on both drone and remote somewhat short (15 min. max).
Also the screws to assemble the rotors are very, very tiny for a grown mand's singers to hold.

title: Very capable drone at a great price!!!!
text:
[[ASIN:B074YYVXQH Holy Stone GPS FPV RC Drone HS100 with Camera Live Video and GPS Return Home Quadcopter with Adjustable Wide-Angle 720P HD WIFI Camera- Follow Me, Altitude Hold, Intelligent Battery Long Control Range]]

Just purchased the HS 100 Drone and took it out for its Maiden Flight. What an awesome drone! For its price point it is truly amazing and feature packed. It was easy to calibrate and flying it is very easy.The HS GPS PRO app is very good and allows drone control right from the app. The app even records your flights and allows you to set up your drones flight parameters for distance and altitude, Starts out in beginner mode that can be easily turned off. The on board camera comes attached with a 90 degree up/down gimbal. The camera can be detached and is photo and video capable of good quality. The included Instruction Manual is very good but when attaching the props pay close attention to make sure the screw heads are properly orientated. They should be outboard and inserted into the holes with the larger opening so they are recessed into the Fixed Ring prop retainer. This drone flies very well and is fun to fly! This is a great choice for the Beginner and Advanced alike. At this price point you are getting a lot for your money!!!

title: Good product for the money
text: Drones vary so much in quality and price, I feel this one has been good for the price.  My son flew it into a tree, but only the blade protector broke (which they send you extras of).  Also, it lands on snow and can lift off from snow as well.  It's holding up to a 12 year old boy, so that's got to be pretty good quality!

title: Love this drone
text: Amazing drone NOT FOR KIDS THOUGH.

title: Awesome drone!!!
text: I got this drone for Christmas from my wife and it‚Äôs awesome. I flew a couple of times and never had any problem with it, it was my first drone as well and for me it was very easy to set up and to control, it‚Äôs very stable in the air. For the price it‚Äôs a great drone, battery doesn‚Äôt last very long, about 7 minute, but as I research that‚Äôs about all the other drones last as well.

title: Five Stars
text: Truly the best drone you can get for the price hands down! Awesome sky high pictures as well

title: A great drone to start flying
text: This Drone is sturdy, easy to set up, and easy to fly.  It is a great way to get into drones and not break the bank.  I am very happy with this purchase for my son.  Don't forget to register your Drone with the FAA.  $5 and you will be good to go.  There is no gyro stabilizer for the camera, but you are not going to get that option unless you pay more.  The photos are good and the camera is great quality.  It is a great purchase for beginners.

title: Great first drone
text: The easiest part of the directions was flying the drone. once youy get past the set up, calabration, and sync your good to go.  This is the first drone I have flown and the controls are easy to use.  The directions for the joysticks would be beneficial if printed on the hand held station.  Take the directional booklet with you on your early flights to reference bake to.  The battery life was true to about 15 minutes.

title: First flight was awesome! At first I had some difficult calibrating the ...
text: [[VIDEOID:1d66532e726f82360f3ad40e0f98063d]] First flight was awesome!  At first I had some difficult calibrating the drone/camera, but after this, it was smooth sailing. When battery was low the drone returned to starting point and landed smoothly. The" follow me" option worked great and very easy to control. Only disappointment was with the battery life, wish it lasted longer. Other then than this, this drone is great,  We had a great time flying it! I will definitely buy another battery for extended flying time.

title: Video feed cuts out of further than 30m.
text: The big problem is the WiFi signal will cut out if you fly to far(more than the safety limit 30m) on the app the camera will go out and I had to go out of my backyard to find it by listening to it. Takes a bit learning to figure out the controls very durable I crashed it about 5 times within 30mins still flys fine just drifts away a lil bit (side to side and in circles)

title: Great drone for the price point!
text: This drone is very good for the money. I am new to the drone hobby but have enjoyed it greatly.  I have a Yuneec Breeze and a Force 1 F100 Ghost. The Yuneec is great as a "selfie drone"that has gps but not much fun other wise. It is slow and not challenging to fly (Good or bad). The Force1 F100 is a fun drone with no gps.  It us powerful and very challenging to fly, especially when there is wind. Fun but nerve wracking!  This HS 100 is a great balance between the two. It has the power of the F100 (even more) and the GPS capability of the Breeze. At this price point it is an awesome drone that can make a user feel confident that they will not lose it due to the GPS capability. Minus 1 star for SLIGHTLY difficult to install blades, camera image quality, and long charging time for battery.  However overall very happy with this purchase!

title: Might as well get a dj phantom.
text: For this price might as well she'll out $200 more and get a dj phantom. Why do drones have Auto takeoff and Landing auto return home GPS satellite positioning it's because you need computer assistance to fly them (fly by wire).  So don't waste your money on any drone that doesn't at least have all of these features. That's my opinion.  I've wasted alot of money on cheap drones.

title: Love it!
text: Entertaining to watch my kid use this. Took her a bit to sort out but relatively easy. Goes a fair distance and takes some decent hits without breaking if it falls.

title: Decent drone with good features for the $$
text:
This is a good drone with plenty of power and ~15 minutes of flight time. The 720p camera leaves something to be desired in this day and age of digital photography. The gimbal control is decent and is goodfor getting the proper video angle. Press and HOLD the button to move the camera up and down the gimbal. The 1080p camera upgrade is worth it if you're into photography and video. FPV is... a... BLAST! Fly the drone while someone else wears the FPV for a VR experience... or wear it yourself for the perfect photo/video shot.

This is a great drone unless you plan to fly it over water (I live lakeside). I have found a scenario that will put the drone into a direct descent that cannot be aborted until it hits the ground (or in my case the water). Fortunately the drone bounces right back up (believe it or not on both land and water) and is immediately controllable. The battery is decent with a good LED level indicator. It only comes with 1 battery and replacements are not cheap.

Range is limited if using a phone connected to the drone via WiFi. I have not tested the range without the phone connected as it is difficult to calibrate the drone without the phone and if you're taking video or pictures, the phone is essential otherwise you're shooting in the blind.

I have stuck with Holy Stone for my intermediate drone purchases (as well as a couple of others) for their durability (it bounced off the lake and made it to shore!), cost, features, and customer support (Camille is awesome and responds pretty much the same day with a smile that shows through email. They even offered to replace a drone that I sunk in the lake but it was honestly my fault and I couldn't in good conscious let them do that. I'm moving to DJI for my personal hobby drone but that is apples compared to oranges. I have 3 boys ages 9-12 and will purchase Holy Stone drones for them for several models to come

title: great!
text:
awsome drone - well made and easy to fly
I bought a second one

title: Good quality pictures!
text: I am a first time drone flyer and now have had a chance to fly my drone a handful of times and really enjoy it.  Love being able to take pictures of good quality.  The drone handles the light breezes we often have here in central florida.  On a couple of occasions the drone does seem to have a mind of it's own, but I still believe I have a little more to learn about controlling it. The drone seems to be well made and I would recommend this product to anyone, you just have to take the time to learn the start up procedures to insure your flight experience is a good one.  The only drawback so far is the short flight time.  I believe I'm getting 10 minutes or less on a charge, an extra battery(ies) would be very helpful.

title: instructions were easy to read
text: Everything came as ordered, instructions were easy to read, and drone was easy to operate.. The only thing I do not like is that you have to calibrate the drone each time you use it.. there must me a feature that saves that info.. but outside of that I love it. The HD quality on my phone is amazing, and it records so you can see everything the drone sees.. Really love this Drone..

title: It comes back to you if it is getting low on battery.

title: Pretty cool drone
text: This is a pretty sweet drone. I have flown it a while now. It is easy to control and the GPS brings it right back to the spot and height I set it still. I wouldn't mind putting a 4k camera on it, but it does great for the aerial video and pictures. It stays steady. You do have to register it for the FAA but that is simple and online.

title: Caution.
text: Hello Coronavirus.  Just charged the batteries and remote. Flew it for only the third time since purchasing December 2018. Once airborne and flying, remote flashed red warning that it was low on voltage and drone flew away, never to be seen again. Unbelievable. Caution.

title: AMAZING
text: First off let me say that their customer service isn't the best. Not horrible but could be better. As far as the drone goes for the price this thing is a smoking deal! You get all the bells and whistles that you would get with a 1,000$ drone except your only paying a fraction of the price. The only negative is the flight time off the battery is only around 15 minutes. Make sure you buy extra batteries if you are using this for a project or something.

title: Its definately worth the money
text: Holy Stone you have done it again...crushed it with this hs100 what a beauty,a gem, a real winner from the excellent packaging to the little flight book(inc) after complete charge to the batteries im out for my first flight more reviews to come but for first time flight with this drone it was nothing but smiles ear to ear. I was pleasantly surprised with its response in the wind.This is the heaviest of all my drones and the most fun. It flys high and fast camera is very easy to operate as well as all functions. Talked to customer service which by the way is the best in the business by far special shout out to Jolin for your experience and true care to customer satisfaction..... they will have replacement parts in stock soon like extra battery. Holy Stone you have my future business... fellow pilots happy and safe flying to you all  Steve

title: Having GPS makes it so easy to scan the horizon
text: This drone is a bargain. I bought it mostly for taking aerial photos and videos. I have four other drones without GPS and/or altitude hold. Having GPS makes it so easy to scan the horizon. I wish it had a gimbal for better stability, but it does take great pictures on a calm day.

title: Great pictures and fun flying it

title: Decent
text: Drone is decent. Has to fight hard in only 15mph winds to get back to home. It's kind of misleading that the drone comes with a 720p camera (that's actually not very good). It almost seems worse than the camera that comes with the HS110D. You have to make an expensive upgrade to 1080p.  One thing I liked about the HS110D is that it showed you what speed setting you were on but with the HS100 you have to sort of guess.

title: The first two were the micro which are a blast to fly and now the large HS100 which I also like a lot
text: This was the third drone I have purchased from Holy Stone. The first two were the micro which are a blast to fly and now the large HS100 which I also like a lot. I read most of the reviews and watched several videos on how to operate this drone safely before flying.  It did not take long and have enjoyed flying three times with no issues.  I like the take off and landing button and figured out how to correct the landing if its off a few feet from where it started.  I just pushed the landing button again to manually correct the drone where I want it to land and then hit the landing button once more for a smooth touchdown.  The only negative IS the battery charging time as some have commented...I will get a backup to give me some extra flight time.  Good video and even with the wind gusts we had today It is a very stable drone.  The size and weight along with the powerful motors keep it stable.  Have not tried the follow along feature or the bring it home since there are a lot of trees in the area but will try when I fly in a open field.  Overall... A great drone for the money and I took some decent video!

title: Everything I expected!
text: I read the reviews on the Holystone HS100 and it sounded like just what I wanted. I had a bad experience with another drone that cost about the same.  I got my HS100 yesterday. I read the book last night, charged it up this morning and took it our for a maiden flight this afternoon. It is very easy to control. The videos I took were incredible.  And, unlike with my first drone, it returned home with no damage. It is very durable. I recommend the HS100.

title: Extremely satisfied!
text: Arrived quickly.  Had in up in the air in minutes.  Has great newbie features such as auto-take off.  Lifts it up in the air ~5'.and stays stationary.  Also has auto-land button that brings her back home and lands and you don't have to do anything.  Camera takes great pics and videos.  very sharp.  Was pleasantly surprised.  Would recommend getting a second battery or two since they last 15-20 min depending on how hard you are flying her.  Extremely happy with this purchase and would recommend to others.

title: Lied about free battery!!! Update
text:
I purchased this as a bday gift to myself. Arrived earlier than expected. Couldn‚Äôt wait to try it. Yes the set up is tedious but the result I had were wonderful. Was a windy day but I couldn‚Äôt wait. This thing held position like a champ. Video was choppy but what can I expect on a windy day? Loved my first flight, looking forward to many more.
Pro
Seems easy so far to fly, camera is clear, auto hover and stop are amazing, so many more features to explore. Priced great considering features.

Con
Lengthy charge time, battery appears difficult to remove, set up is a little long as well

Overall I‚Äôm extremely pleased so far!

Update long overdue..
I did make two attempts to contact Holystone, after the second attempt they sent out the free battery. I am pleased with the performance of the drone, a great value for the features you get! If you are interested in a high end drone but are just starting out, this is a perfect intermediate drone! Very surprised at the stability in a decent wind.
Changed to 5 stars as their customer service came through a long time ago, and just checked back to follow up.

title: It still would be a great deal.
text: I bought this as a next quad copter. For my son. I truly wish I had bought this as a first. It's so much nicer, and a lot easier to fly. Than his first one. It's light years ahead in features that most at this price level don't have. I just wish it was a little heavier with bigger moters to support that extra weight. So it would be a little more stable in the wind. Even if they had to price it a little more. It still would be a great deal.

title: Awesome flyer
text: Flies like a gem, easy to use and works perfectly! Satisfied customer

title: Great starter drone if you are on the fence.
text:
This thing is amazing for the price! Got it on a lightning deal. I was looking at toy drones for sometime now, but they always fall short no gps or gyro.

When I saw the specs on this thing GPS, gyro, compass, auto takeoff / landing, and long flight time I had to pull the trigger.

I was expecting it to be a joke but after flying this thing around I would say it delivered. The unit flys stable and stays put with only slight drift when you take your hands off the controls. The battery life delivers 15-20mins of fly time. I have flown it in 15mph wind and was able to control it. Auto take off and landing works every time.

I also crashed it into a 4x4 wood post due to wind sheer and it kept flying no damage (was flying with no prop gard). No damage at all.

Now for the two things that I don‚Äôt care about (also knew about when I purchased). But if you are looking for this it maybe a deal breaker. The camera isn‚Äôt that good from what I have seen with day and night tests. The second thing is battery charging takes some time due to usb cable charging only. Takes me about 4 hours at 2amps.

title: Decent beginner drone
text: I received this drone as a gift. So far it seems like a pretty good beginner drone (which appropriate for me). I have had some trouble rotating the camera but other wise it seems to fly pretty well.

title: This drone is not difficult to operate and was design for beginner like me. I use it with ease
text: I am new to drone. This drone is not difficult to operate and was design for beginner like me. I use it with ease. I wish the drone came with 2 batteries for more flying time.

title: Easy Assembly, setup and flying.
text: Absolutely LOVE IT! I'm a novice and got this for my birthday. Very easy to set up and begin flying. I look forward to coming home from work and getting it airborne!

title: I like it
text:

Learning to fly was easy and even got my daughter to fly the drone.
Take your time follow the instructions watch the utube videos go slow and steady with quite hands and you will be having fun in no time.

title: Affordable, great drone, and honestly the best customer service I've seen in sometime!
text: I got this Christmas morning! I was unable to locate the props, called the help line. It's answer machine states look behind the box. I hang up put my drone together phone rings it's holy stone customer service returning my call! I've since had a few other questions and holy stone has jumped right on them.

title: Fast and fun
text: This is a fast drone which is easy to use. Takes decent pictures.

title: Original Batteries didn't fit right.  Almost impossible to remove and replace with bare hands.
text: The 3500 mAh batteries that came with my drone in 2020 bulge out on the sides, and are too tight to remove with bare hands. I have to rip them out with channel locks, damaging the plastic a little more each time.  Seems like a poor design or some communication problem with the battery supplier.  After a year one of my 3500 mAh batteries no longer holds a charge, so I bought two 2500 mAh batteries (only thing I could find) that fit perfectly and are easy to pull out and replace with a fresh battery.  I tried for a year to figure out why I couldn't remove the battery with my bare hands.  Very frustrating.  Otherwise its a pretty good drone and fun to fly.

title: Great outdoor drone for beginners
text:
This is the first drone I purchase above the $100 price range and for a beginners outdoors drone it is amazing, it is very stable, the take off and landing feature is very easy to operate, and the gps positioning and return home also work very well, but bear in mind you need unobstructed path back to you take off position as the drone doesn't divert from obstacles such as tree branches.
It is a bit challenging to fly it on windy days, it is easy to get it to a distance where you may start to confuse front and back, I wish instead of just the color if the positioning lights it could have colored engine fixtures to make it easier to identify the front and back from a distance, but other than that I highly recommend it for beginners, and I also suggest purchasing one or two spare batteries to enhance your flying time between charges.
