title: Awesome for beginners
text: My oldest (12) just recently got this and has had blast flying this around the neighborhood. It does work in winds but it's still not recommended (high winds). Still trying to play around with settings and stuff but for those of you who are looking to get a fairly inexpensive drone to test things out, this is the way to go.

title: Best for the price!
text: As most of the reviews, this is great for the beginner. After buying this, I did a deeper research and found that some many feel so god about this drone. Nothing but great thangs to say about it. My grandson even enjoys it.

title: The technology that is in this drone for the price is amazing!
text: [[VIDEOID:edfef78336ed838269f6b16997814255]] This is a great drone! The technology that is in this drone for the price is amazing. I really like the return home function especially if you loose site of your drone. Hit return home and it will ascend to the predetermined altitude you set in the app and come right back to where you took off from. Another great feature is the return home on low battery or loss of controller signal. NOTE: The drone will take the most direct route back to its take off spot when it returns for low battery, so if there are obstacles in the way, I suggest if you get the low battery warning hit the return home button. It will then rise to the predetermined altitude. The only negative I can say is it takes about four hours to charge the battery. I bought several extras to increase my daily flying times. I highly recommend you buying this drone. [[ASIN:B074YYVXQH Holy Stone GPS FPV RC Drone HS100 with Camera Live Video and GPS Return Home Quadcopter with Adjustable Wide-Angle 720P HD WIFI Camera- Follow Me, Altitude Hold, Intelligent Battery Long Control Range]]

title: Perfect Drone!
text: I have had other drones in the past but this HS100 is by far the best I've had! The drone is sturdy, well built and is absolutely perfect! I would definitely recommend this drone to anyone who is looking to purchase one.

title: did not work

title: Good drone with great customer service!
text:
If you are new to flying drones and are curious about getting into them this is a good starting place. Understand, their are three things you need to know with this drone; 1) it is a drone that requires an FAA registration 2) there is a lot of good you tube videos out there describe a lot of basics on the drone as well as actual footage 3) if you do have a problem, you also have a great support group from the Holy Stone Customer Group.

I am getting into flying of drones as a new hobby, after some technical difficulties, which Holy Stone actively engaged me to find the issue and to address it, I have now had the opportunity to take this thing out for a couple of flights and I have to say that I am amazed at its capabilities. I like the fact that it starts out on a slower pace, but that it does not take a whole lot of effort on the control or in the app to be able to bump up the capabilities.

I am using an iOS device, a 6s, and while it takes a minute to get it synced it has been painlless. I have been impressed with the HS100‚Äôs range for broadcasting live video back to my phone and photo‚Äôs and video are at an acceptable quality for 720p video. Looking forward to having more time with this set up.

title: Another great Holy Stone drone
text:
Another quality product from Holy Stone. I already have the F181W and was looking for to step up to a drone with GPS that also has FPV, and this is perfect. The HS100 with its GPS really keeps it stable and this is a somewhat big drone. I have had no problems with the controller or wifi. Everything connects up as expected. The camera has pretty decent photo/video quality and the fact it is adjustable is a big plus. The calibrations are easy to do, just follow the instructions in the app. and you will be up and flying in no time. I get about 12 minutes per battery which is pretty good. The overall wifi range is amazing. VR goggles would be a great addition to flying this drone.
Overall great drone. Lots of cool features and fun to fly. And it‚Äôs a Holy Stone, so you know the customer supports is the best. Some reviews state that when you use Return To Home, the drone takes off and climbs in altitude. This setting can be adjusted within the app GPS limits.
Cons
3-6 hours to charge the batteries, boarder-line unacceptable. Make sure you have a few.
When recording video the controller will constantly beep. A bit annoying, If you start the video via the app, the controller will not beep

This is a fast drone and very powerful. The blades push down quite a bit of air. The drone is very durable. I crashed it into the house, the ground, and the trees and it still flies.
My only objection is the battery life. It takes 3 to 4 hours to charge. For only 10 to 12 minutes of flight time, that‚Äôs a long time to charge.
Overall, I really like the drone. I really want more flight time out of it. I recommend this drone to beginners. It is easy to learn and control.

title: Submerged and still works.
text: Get this, I accidentally hit a tree branch with my drone. The drone fell from the sky and hit a rail on a dock and then into the water. The drone was submerged in about three feet of water for about a minute. After retrieving the drone, we immediately removed the battery shook the water out.  We disassembled the major components of the drone and let it dry for about 2 days. We then attempted to fly it and to our surprise, it flew. Everything but one of the bottom navigation lights worked. It is a tough machine although I don‚Äôt recommend it for underwater photography.

title: Had issue but customer service is outstanding.

title: Very nice Drone well made and impressive features

title: What a great support Team as well as product
text: I purchase the HS 100 drone and I must say that I have had an exceptional experience with both drone and support team.  I received my drone for my birthday and went through the easy to follow instructions.  Starting on Beginner Mode you are limited as to the distance you can fly.  After a few weeks and many camping trips, as I am retired, I used the Beginner mode for quite a while.  Without realizing it, and frankly, not using the drone much, I tried to move it from Beginner Mode to Pro Mode allowing for more range of flight.  I am not using this drone for commercial purposes but really hobby.  I tried and tried to move it from Beginner to Pro with no results and it would always default to Beginner.  I called up Support and and received some of the best instruction from several different people.  All were very helpful but alas, no solution could be found.  After 6 attempts on one flight the drone went nuts and flew into a tree, I had been using the "Follow me" feature at the time.  One of the agents for Holy Stone had contacted me to get more info and I informed the agent that the drone was no more and I expected to be dropped like a hot potato but to my surprise the agent passed my information along to the Techs but also up the chain.  The result astounded me as the company contacted me and had decided to send me a new drone even though it was 1 month out of warranty.  Even there follow up since has been great and I am a Holy Stone fan as they are people of their word.  Thank you Holy Stone from San Antonio, TX and this household.

title: and got the hang of how it works I was very satisfied. Everything works like tree description indicates and good ...
text: I was honestly a little skeptical at first about the quality of this drone because of the price, being that it was under $300.  My skepticism came in because of all the features it was supposed to have such as remote adjustable camera,  gps, return to home, and the failsafe features. Once I got it,  and got the hang of how it works I was very satisfied. Everything works like tree description indicates and good thing for the failsafe. It activated on me yesterday.  Very dense clouds and a weak gps signal and I had it so far away I couldn't tell what the thing was doing.... then the app said transmitter signal failure. Uh oh!  Couple seconds later the app said returning to home. Whew!  This thing is a blast.  Easy enough to fly that my five year old fly's it well.  I'm very satisfied and recommend this drone.

title: Holy Stone is popular in my house
text: This is really a good solid drone.  For your money, this drone is where you should start if you are just considering picking up and flying a drone.  I never heard of Holy Stone drones and have bought a couple cheapo's before deciding to take this pass time a little more seriously.  I am so glad i decided to go with the HS100.  Flown it at least twice a day during my spare time and work from home conditions we're in to blow off some steam.  Every time i fly i get a new experience and a new level of confidence out of a good 15 minute fly time.  Only thing i didnt expect was how steady the video is as well as photography.  I am definitely looking forward to my upgrade with Holy Stone in the near future.  I absolutely feel i made a great buy.  Note: transmitter on first, then drone, set wifi on your device, open your APP, a quick calibration with your drone and you are flying.  Enjoy :) also you have to register this with the FAA (registration is 3 years and my fee paid was like $5) again - so happy with this buy!

title: Pretty Cool
text:
Melissa Jacob <mellie2880@gmail.com>

Sun, Aug 26, 1:21 PM (3 days ago)

Total Drone newbie. Wanted to get one to oversee construction of new home from above. Overall, this is a really neat device. If you are TOTALLY new to drones and have never used one and have no help from anyone that has used one, just know to be patient in some parts of the assembly and setup. Read instructions and seek out YouTube videos for help. It is well worth it when you are done with setup. But here are some things I learned:

First step - Charge your controller and your drone battery. Do this FIRST. Both use USB cord provided, but only one is provided, so you will need two. My battery came ~3/4 charged and my controller was fully charged.

Second step is drone assembly: 1) putting on propellers. This is the most difficult part. The screws provided - those in the same bag as the black fixed ring) are quite small. It took me a good half an hour to do all four propellers, but you get better as you go along (screwdriver provided is magnetic and does help with attaching screws. Just be patient and make sure you have something to catch the screw because it will fall before you finally get it screwed in, and you don't want it to bounce. They do provide extra screws, but just make sure you work with something under you to catch the screw. The rest of the assembly is easy (2) propeller guards, 3) push in CHARGED battery). 4) Landing gear comes already assembled as does SD card.

Third step is pairing with your phone (I haven't yet tried it without phone). I have iPhone 7.
1) Download the Holy Stone app on your phone - free
2) Turn on the controller
3) Turn on the battery on the drone - the lights on the battery will indicate charge level - 4 lights is fully charged; the lights on the drone will flash white and pink/red before successful pairing and calibration
4) In your phone settings, go to your WIFI and select the Holy Stone WIFI signal
5) Open the Holy Stone app and click the enter device button in the center of the opening page of the app
6) CALIBRATE THE DRONE - this part did not work for me a couple of times, but it was MY fault. I was rotating the drone the wrong way. Make sure you watch the Holy Stone You Tube videos to get this part right)

Calibrate step #1: With the drone sitting on the ground normally, rotate the drone counterclockwise in this plane - stand over it and look down on it aerially, and rotate it as it stands on the ground counterclockwise like you are turning off a faucet. Two of the lights on the drone should stop blinking and turn blue when this is successful.

Calibrate Step #2: This is where I messed up---- rotate the drone with the propeller guards perpendicular to the ground (turn the drone 90 degrees as if it is on its side) and rotate the drone with the propeller guards rotating in a plane parallel to the ground - do not rotate the drone as if you are turning a car steering wheel which is what I did. Watch the video and it is clear. Once you rotate the drone successfully the second time, the second two lights stop blinking and turn white. So you have all 4 lights on the drone not blinking; two of them are white and two of them are blue.

If you are inside (which I don't recommend unless it is a big space) you have to turn off the GPS button (button with compass picture on it on the controller on the left side) as you don't get GPS inside. Just go outside to an area that is free of trees, phone/electrical lines, etc.

You are ready to fly. Get familiar with the controls (up and down, left and right, rotate). This part was actually the easiest. The Follow me function worked great! Really neat and actually a little creepy.... The video and picture buttons also worked fine - in fight, press the video or picture button to record the flight (video needs to be off to take a picture). These videos and pictures went directly to my iPhone camera Roll.

The battery life was about 15 min. This is typical. Go get extra batteries. I have also learned the rotating part to calibrate is also typical of drones. But once you have done it once, it is super easy to do it again. All of these instructions are probably unnecessary for those that have used a drone at least once before in their life. These are meant for those that have NEVER touched a drone. And you should only need these instructions once...

I recommend planning your fight a little before you start as battery life is precious, The drone lights will start blinking red when the battery is low, and if you are using your phone, the drone and controller battery life is shown in the app.

So very happy with my purchase. Seems like a good mid-range drone for a hobbyist, Can't wait to see the videos from our construction.

title: Easy to use, connects to your phone via WiFi
text:
I've always wanted a drone, and this one is really easy to use. The only small problem with the documentation is that you need to connect your phone to use it, and the connection is via WiFi not Bluetooth (and that documentation comes after the set-up instructions). However, once that hurdle was overcome, the whole thing is really easy to use, and a lot of fun!

I practiced in the park where I could make softer landings as I learned, but soon I will be flying around my house to inspect the gutters and roof! And that saves me money from asking a roofer to do that for me!

title: High quality drone for the price
text:
We have been very happy with this drone purchase. Assembling the drone was pretty easy though the instructions could have been a bit clearer. They were not bad but could easily been improved with some feedback from people who actually used them. This is true for the operational instructions as well. I think they tried to keep things simple, but in doing so, some context has been left out. Please keep in mind, this is our first drone so we are very new at this. I'm sure an experienced drone operator would find the instructions very easy to understand.

We found the drone easy to fly even when it is fairly windy. The drone has a lot of very nice features, like Return to Home, auto takeoff and land, etc. The camera takes high quality stills and video. The mobile phone app is a very nice feature as well.

Overall, very pleased.

title: OK toy, but lacks features and app compatibility.
text:
Our initial unit had a bad remote. At 1st it seemed to connect, but we did not make it through the calibration before it lost connection and nothing worked to get them synced up again. The remote would make its beeps and light up as if connected, but the drone's lights stayed red and the app said low battery on the remote. We tried recharging multiple times and even with other chargers and it was always the same. The 1st reply from Holy Stone was a form letter with the instructions from the manual. Then they asked for video of the issues to arrange a return. At that point we just setup a return with Amazon. Once we told HS about the return they were suddenly interested in helping resolve the issue and offered to send a new remote, and if that did not work a new drone. I had already disassembled everything and boxed it up, but went ahead and cancelled the Amazon return to give them a chance to fix things. The new remote arrived and it did connect, so I reassembled everything and tried it out. It was able to fly and seemed an OK toy. The video connection was spotty, and I did not have it up that high, but in range it looked decent. My biggest issue is that I recently moved and was planning to use this to help mark a straight property line through some trees using the advertised "GPS assisted flight: Provides you with accurate positioning details of your drone." (1st bullet point in the description at the time of this review). After I got the drone connected and working I looked at the flight log and found it only had very basic info that looked to be the average altitude, speed and the flight time of each flight. The was no positioning data at all. I contacted them again to ask about this and was told only 700 models had that functionality and that no other Android apps were compatible with their drones. After quoting the description they said they would contact the main office and let me know. After almost a week I decided that this had been enough hassle and requested a refund. They said to just do so through Amazon. My main reason for not waiting longer was to ensure I could do a refund through Amazon and that they were not trying to drag things out past the return window.

In summary, the drone is not great and I would suggest going with DJI or similar (which is what we will be doing) and support can be good depending on who you get, but overall I cannot recommend buying from Holy Stone.

title: Great drone for the price!
text: Great beginner drone.  The camera comes with a 720, and I upgraded to a 1080 camera.  Instructions and app are easy to use.  You get roughly 15 minutes of flight time per battery.  The drone is durable and can travel both high and far.  I am extremely happy with my purchase.  I mainly use it to take pictures of our new house being built and scan over 5 acres of land.  It is awesome!

title: The ease of use is greatly appreciated. This drone is a blast to fly
text: This drone is amazing! Easy to fly easy to learn and very responsive!  Makes a novice like me look like a skilled pilot! And I‚Äôve already recommended it to one of my friends. The ease of use is greatly appreciated. This drone is a blast to fly

title: Easy to Use, Fun to Fly
text: I was initially a little bit nervous that it would be difficult for me to be able to control a drone. I'm not very good with the multiple joy sticks on modern video games, so I was concerned that was a bad sign for how's I'd do flying a drone. But this drone was amazingly easy to figure out. It pretty much can take off and land on its own & I was able to acclimate myself to the controls quickly. I really enjoy using this drone and I have recommended it to my friends and family.

title: Five Stars
text: Great drone. Easy to fly for a beginner.

title: Easy for beginners like me
text: I am a first-time drone user, so I do not have a point of reference for comparison.  But overall I have been very satisfied with the drone.  The instructions are clear and assembly was easy.  So far, the drone functions seem to behave as advertised.  The GPS functions work well.  In my usage to date I have found only a few issues that I can comment on.  First is image quality.  The images and movies, even on the on-board SD card, are highly compressed, so the still picture quality is not what it could be.  Also, for the videos especially, the colors do not seem to be as vivid as they should be.  Perhaps there is an adjustment somewhere to modify the record quality of the video and images, but I could not find it.  Second, the stored video format and codec for the movies do not allow them to be imported into iMovie.  I will need to download a video converter to convert the video to a compatible format in order to make video clips with image stabilization.  Overall, the price point and quality of the HS-100 is pretty remarkable given its features.  Lastly, the battery life seems to be as advertised, but the recharge time is 4-5 hours, also as advertised.  This drone was a gift, had I ordered it myself I would have purchased an extra battery, because 10-15 min of fly time is generally not adequate for me to get a filming session just right.  The extra battery is a must in my opinion, and I will be ordering the two-pack that is available for this drone.

title: Quality at a fair price
text: The Drone is super well-built. It has quality written all over it. Comes with Lots of spare parts and customer service that can't be beat. I. I own 5 holy Stone and have had 10 to 15 other drones in the past and nothing surpasses the quality of these holy Stone drones. I got the hs100 because I mix videos and produce and wanted angles  that were rare and hard to get. This drone is perfect for those tasks and more

title: Very fun!
text: This is my first grownup drone and I just completed two flights, the first on beginner mode and the second with limits increased. I find it extremely easy and fun to fly! The little indoor toy drones are much more difficult to control compared to a real drone. Oh, and pay attention when inserting the SD card into the camera. It's possible to insert in the space above the slot and it will fall into the body of the camera!

text: The holy Stone is a blast to fly. Perfect for the first timer. The GPS system is awesome. When you practice a little bit you can shut the GPS off and just go nuts. Wonderful device.

title: Less than 6 minutes of flight time
text: Flight time is less than 6 minutes and the camera doesn‚Äôt tilt.

title: Highly recommend this drone for new drone pilots!
text:
I've had three drones now, the Holy Stone being the third. The first two were total busts and not a great entry for me into the world of flying drones. The Holy Stone however was a totally different experience. It flies very nicely, very stable under automatic GPS control, yet easy to maneuver when not. I had it up in the mountains once and between the wind and peaks there was no GPS and it was being buffeted all over the place. Despite this I was able to fly it accurately w/out running into any of the trees that surrounded us. I love the video that it takes and the integration with my iPhone 7. It's a great little app that runs it and it's very communicative letting you know what's going on with the drone through the video feed and the scroll at the bottom that gives the current drone status. The battery takes a little longer to charge up than the other two did but it also runs about 5 minutes longer which is appreciated.
Overall it's been a great drone and I'm having a great time with it. It's reliable and so easy to fly even my wife is wanting to fly it - and being able to do so w/out any difficulty.

title: ... more expensive drones but thought this would be a good one to get started
text: I was looking at more expensive drones but thought this would be a good one to get started. It turned out to be all I really need. It has some great functions and is easy and fun to use. I am totally happy with it and would recommend it to anyone.

title: Perfect for beginner drone!
text: Very easy to assemble and fly.  I thought I would buy a lesser expensive drone to learn and this one is great for that.  Easy to fly and cheap training for when or if you decide to level up to a more expensive drone.

title: Great drone with great support
text: This is a great starter drone. Very easy to get going and really stable. I‚Äôve owned a few drones, but this is my first with GPS. The GPS makes it really easy to fly, even for a total novice like my 6 year old neighbor. It‚Äôs incredibly sturdy for how light it is. It doesn‚Äôt have all the features of the more expensive drones, most notably obstacle avoidance, but you really can‚Äôt expect that at anywhere near the price. And support is amazing, I had an issue with the camera I admitted was probably my fault (see previous comment on obstacle avoidance), and asked about buying a new one. They sent a new one absolutely free, no questions asked. I highly recommend it.

title: GREAT DRONE and less than $300
text: I bought this drone for my son, so far we have lost a few drones and so far this one has not disappointed!  Instructions were clear and easy to follow, therefore easy to get this up and flying!!  My son was super pumped when he saw how big this one was and how awesome the camera was.  We have only flown this three times(which outlasted our other two, and we cannot wait to get out and make some awesome videos.  If you are looking for a drone and do not want to break the bank, this is the one!!  We are two happy customers!  I also have to give a positive nod to customer service, I called to ask their opinion on the most reliable drone in my price point. They were very good to deal with and followed up with emails.

title: Smooth and easy
text:
This drone is my 3rd one and works smooth and easy. I liked that it had a rotating camera. It also had lots of features. I also liked that you could connect it to your phone. One thing I didn't like about it though, was that it was hard to assemble. It had a LOT of small parts, so I was worried that it might get lost or something. Also, you have to calibrate it every time you turn it on. the battery runs out fairly quickly, but it took FOREVER to recharge. However, I still like the fact that they gave us a card in the package saying to write a review on amazon for extra batteries for free. (which is why I am writing this review)
overall I rate it 5 stars because of it's amazing costumer service and height. i do not recommend this to beginners, but to people who have a little experience with drones.

title: Good beginners Drone
text: Stable easy to fly drone great for beginners. Have tried other makes and for various reasons drones lost due to complexity of use, poor communication with remote, short control range all of which this drone seems to address. Would highly recommend.

title: Best budget drone for beginners
text:
Before buying the HS100 I did my research on what is the best drone out there. The things I was look were easy to fly durable and must have a great camera. The HS100 has all of this things. Right from beginning I calibrated the drone and found how easy and fast it took to setup and fly it took at least 5 minutes in total to get up in the air (it may take you less time I just needed to make sure I did it correctly). The second thing that impressed me about the HS100 is the durability. While starting up my drone for the first I got my drone stuck on a tree. I managed to bring it but it took a nasty fall. I thought that was it since it was a cheap Chinese drone but that was not the case. To my surprise The HS100 took that fall like a champ and still worked normally. The final thing that impressed me was the camera. Although 2k the camera shows really great quality photos and videos the stability can be improved on but this is old drone so I didn‚Äôt expect much of it and for the price it was met many of expectations.

Recently I needed a part for my drone so I hit up holy stone directly and got a very quick response. I see many reviews about how holy stone has the worst customer service but I am here to put all that to rest. Holy stone customer service went above and beyond for me to find the part that I needed for my HS100. Overall a great experience with holy stone and will be buying another drone from them in the future

title: Easy to fly. Customer support is superb!
text:
Updated review. July 24, 2019

March 8, 2019. Read reviews, and comments help with assembly. Start flying low and slow. I played with it in the driveway, clear of trees. It is pretty amazing for the price! Return and Auto Land really work. Lots of fun. I emailed Holy Stone with quesions early on while learning how to fly, and had very good support.

July 11, 2019. After about 8 hours of flying, and hundreds of movies, while flying around a soccer goal post the drone stopped flying and fell about 7 feet to the ground. The camera popped off, but worse, one of the wires from the camera connector pulled out. Impossible to repair. I emailed Holy Stone. After exchanging several emails, they offered to send me a replacement (720p vs the 1080p) camera - I thought. I was surprised when a box with a NEW HS100 (780p) arrived!!! That demonstrates the dedication Holy Stone has to support the customer. This is an easy to fly, gps assisted (return/auto land, etc) drone for a low entry cost. The customer support adds significantly to its value.

title: Holystone great product
text: Great drone really like the GPS had issue with the motor bracket contacted holystone there customer service representative was very helpful in getting me what I need to get my drone flying again I would strongly recommend holystone product they stand behind what they sell and a special thanks to Andy at ca@holystone.vom

title: Awesome drone!
text: Awesome drone for the money you spend. Lots of useful features as well. Easy to fly with gps mode. Mobile app (iOS) looks stable too. Flight time could have been better. I‚Äôm waiting for 2 extra batteries so I can extend flight time to 35-40 minutes. I recommend this drone for beginners!

title: ***stay tuned***
text:
*****NEW UPDATE***** Holy Stone reaches out to me and decided that they would replace my lost drone on good faith!!! After emailing back and forth, I got a new one!!!!! Thanks to a great company!!!! So simple to use, absolutely an enjoyable experience from takeoff! ****UPDATE‚Äî I was flying my drone one morning at about 20-30 ft altitude, not more than 40-50 ft away from me, when for some reason the drone gained enough altitude to get into the winds of a storm front that had passed through hours earlier. Long story short, I was attempting to get it back to me and it was laboring and making minimal progress. I didn‚Äôt want to dump it, so instead of that, I decided to hit ‚Äú return to home‚Äù. Immediately, my drone gained altitude WAY beyond the limits I set of 40 ft return, made it to 100+ ft altitude and quit resisting the winds, instead it appeared to take on a mind of its own and go with the winds. I chased after it trying feverishly to dump the remote and make it crash land all to no avail. As it went out of sight, I couldn‚Äôt help wonder why it didnt have better fail safes in place to prevent loss of product.

HOLY STONE‚Äî make it right with me. Help me get back to flying drones, Holy Stone products. Otherwise I will look elsewhere to find a much safer, trustworthy brand.

title: After 6 months review
text: [[VIDEOID:c4bf0a41b4371680c6a18638f25f322d]] I have now had this RC Drone for six months. title: Great beginner drone
text:
Update: 30 June 2020 - Got it working and after multiple attempts it seems to be agreeing with my phone. Had to go through the steps and got a wifi not safe warning but just pressed OK. Anyway took it up and it handled the windy day decently. The degree of set up trial and error is frustrating but I think it may be working now. Overall if you want to learn then this may be an option not overly costly and will make your flying skills work hard. Any other more expensive drone would then be a dream to fly. Good luck and have a great flight.
Update June 4, 2020: Received a Free replacement drone. This one does record on the micro SD card. However the remote to my phone still says the battery on the drone is empty even though it is fully charged. It does fly for about 15 minutes. Overall an inexpensive drone to learn with but the connections are not the best via the Android phone. 64 bit phone with 64 gig card and wifi connected. Motoforce 2Z phone. I will see how the new MAVIC Mini does compared to the HolystoneEasy to set up and have fun with my kids learning to operate and fly a drone. I may look into a more advanced drone once we get things figured out on our skills of operation. Update: Returned the drone for a refund. I have bought a Mavic instead. I have had a change for the worse. The camera would not record any video no matter what card I put in it 2g, 4g, 8g , 16 g etc. All the cards were formatted and worked in dashcams, video cameras and my phone. Still no video. The wife connection was nearly impossible to achieve after the first flight. The remote would show low battery voltage and not connect to the phone. The phone is a motoforce 2z 64bit with Android 7.1.1 and has all the requirements to operate. Of course the good reviews may be deemed from the fact that they offer free batteries for reviews. I never got a battery as they said it would take up to a month to get it to me from CHINA and they had batteries in stock on amazon ready in less then 3-4 days. Not sure what is going on with this Holy Stone company but this has been my experience.

title: HOLY STONE HS100 A  BUNCH OF FUN
text:
The HS100 is so much fun, It is easy to set up and even easier to fly. I bought it to replace a HOLY STONE HS160 that I crashed into the river, It is probably in the Chesapeake Bay by now It holds a hover while flying in a pretty good breeze and will move back to it's position when the breeze moves it. The FOLLOW ME mode does just that! RETURN TO HOME is very accurate. My only issue is the camera positioning. The camera will not move up or down using the wheel on the controller. The motor hums and it makes a clicking
noise like a gear is out of line. I haven't been able to fix this.
UPDATE 04/25/19 I received a new camera From Holy Stone, installed it and everything is working perfectly now. I just cannot say enough about this support that Holy Stone provides for their customers and product.

title: Great beginner drone!
text: This product shipped fast, was easy to calibrate, ( you must do this every flight in order to set GPS) and easy to fly for a first timer.  I would suggest flying in an open area to get used to the controls.  When using the app on your phone, you have a live view of flying your drone as you fly.  The auto-takeoff and return to home feature are fantastic for new users.  I‚Äôve especially liked it in those moments when I‚Äôve panicked the first few flights.  (Watch out for the wind, it will affect the GPS on your return to home landing). I‚Äôve had so much fun flying my first drone so far! The 15 minute flight time and 3-6 hour charge time are pretty accurate so spend the money and get a few backup batteries.

title: Best drone for the price.
text: This thing is awesome.  I bought it for my 11 year old son and I to use.  The drone has amazing range.  We flew it above our city, took some awesome video and pictures.  The follow me mode is cool for taking video of of walks.  Love the return to home button.  Easy to pop out and charge the batteries.  I recommend a couple of spares to increase your flying time and fun.  I cant wait to fly it again.

title: Great features for the price range.
text: Like that it's easy to use and can hover without any input from the controls.  Also that it automatically returns to its launch point when the battery gets low.  Wish the battery would last longer but understand that that's the state of the art right now.  Have used it to take pictures of my house and of groups of friends.

title: Easy to set up and get flying quickly.
text:
I will definitely say that this drone was very easy to set up and get into the air. Got home from work tonight, my 12 year old and I worked on it while the wife was making dinner. Battery for drone was fully charged, had to charge the remote for about 10 minutes.

Once dinner was over, my son and I took it outside and had it in the air in a few minutes after we did the quick calibration. We actually got it caught in a tree but after we got it down, we got it right back into the air.

I flew it for the first minute or so and handed it to my son and he flew it until the battery died. In all, I think we got 10-12 minutes of flying time.

For the money, I would definitely recommend this drone. This is our first drone and I would agree that it is fairly simple to fly. We are keeping it in beginner mode until we become more reliable pilots.

title: Perfect for Beginners - Features you can only find in much more expensive drones
text: I was EXTREMELY surprised by this drone. It was so easy to use. My 6 year old can fly it with no issues and without the worry of losing it or wrecking it. Setup was simple. Connection to controller and phone were instant. Features like easy takeoff and landing, GPS return and beginners mode made it super easy to learn how to use the drone and slowly work up to more advanced flying. Camera quality was also surprisingly good. Very pleased with this purchase and would HIGHLY recommend if you are looking for a drone to get started with.

title: Sold
text:
First drone I have ever owned and honestly this is perfect! First flight I went to high and the wind grabbed it - I lost it 1000%. When the battery got low it started to head back and landed itself! I am still learning how to fly in beginner mode but it is a great quality drone for the price point. Very happy.

I bought extra batteries so I get more fly time but I have gotten this drone to around 390ft up and am so happy with the picture quality.

Hands down just buy this drone or anything from Holy stone this is mint.

title: Ease of flight
text: Great starter drone nearly perfect right out of the box. Attaching propellers and guards is easy and self explanatory. A thorough read of the instructions makes getting the drone ready exciting and easy. The only thing I would have liked was some accident avoidance as I forgot about the rookie mode and when the drone tried to go home it ran right into a tree. Lol

title: Very nice
text: It was a perfect Christmas gift!

title: My first drone
text:
Very happy with the drone.
Take go pictures and video.

title: Fun easy to fly mid level drone
text: Fun mid level drone that is fun and easy to fly. I started with the husband mini drones and those were a lot of fun, this was a perfect step up from those.  Follow feature is nice. Only co.pplaint is the lengthy battery charge time

title: Great Xmas Present
text: [[VIDEOID:15cef3eeee481671665c76785d2f8f4d]] Thanks, Dad, for this amazing drone!  Managed to get great footage from the first try, drone is stable though the battery only lasted for about 12 minutes fly time but can‚Äôt wait to get this great offer of a free battery for writing this review.

title: FAT BOY
text: A HS120 on steroids. Nice drone to start with if you like the bigger drones. Neon lights to see battery life. All functions worked good. RTH works good but comes home at altitude iy is at when called home. Doesn't rise up and then come home. It turns toward home and comes.  A little louder cause of not having brushless motors. I enjoy flying it.

title: Good quality for the price
text: For the price, this drone is great. Fly time is as advertised and the instruction booklet is very helpful. Follow me mode and the HS app work well. The drone generally stabilizes well but has some up and down movement (1-2 feet) as it tries to hold altitude (I believe this is to be expected for the price). The one thing that is disappointing is I believed it was advertised as having a way-point mode, but it doesn't appear to (or at least I can't seem to find it).

title: Looking for a Done.  This is the One you want!!!!
text: What an amazing Drone.  I had some brain farts and these kids did so much to help me figure it out.  And even sent me an extra battery.  So I get more flight time.  Would recommend totally !!!!

title: You won‚Äôt be disappointed. Stop looking and buy this one.
text: Purchased this drone a couple years back, paid $280 for it. Which I now see the price has dropped a lot. Very surprising to me, because this is an awesome drone. If you‚Äôre a beginner or more advanced this drone will make you happy and you will have a fun time with it. Very easy to set up. Very easy to fly. Also takes great pictures. Has a fly home feature when the battery is getting low, so you won‚Äôt loose the drone. Also has a follow me feature. I have done this before while my daughter And I were riding our bikes. Made a fun video out of it. If you‚Äôre looking into getting a drone, I definitely recommend this one. Also not sure about other reviews on here about customer service, but my experience with them has been superb.

title: Great Amount of Drone Capability and Features for the Money.
text:
So far so good. I bought this as a gift for my husband. It was easy to set up and configure and the first few flights went as planned. Based on a previous Holy Stone model, F181, Holy Stone has given excellent customer service and I have no reason to doubt they have changed. That is the main reason we upgraded to this model from this company.

I was also offered a free battery upon giving a review. There is no understanding that the review has to be positive. They just want you to prove you gave a review. I imagine this offer still exists to all that purchase this drone. This is a $45 value at the time of this post.

I will provide an update on the drones performance in the future.

title: Can fly immediately with no previous experience.
text: My first drone experience and I was able to fly it immediately using auto take off and land feature. Extra parts provided came in handy the first few days. Everything about this drone works as advertised and I'm very happy with it.

title: Don't buy
text: Useless product

title: Don't buy
text: Useless product

title: Love this drone!  Can't believe I waited so long to buy one!
text:
I bought this drone for my girlfriends birthday and one of these days I'll let her try it. I simply love this drone! It was very easy to assemble following the instruction booklet. I charged the battery and downloaded the app to my phone and it was ready to fly. This is my first experience with a drone and I'm still learning to use it, but this has been so much fun. I'm like a kid with a new toy, learning and developing my skills. The drone is very responsive and the auto return gives me a confidence I won't lose it. We live near a wetland and the camera provides a view not available except from the air.

I've found the controller easy to use with a little practice. I looked on YouTube for pointers and found lots of help.

title: First Drone
text: For my first drone experience, the HS100 seems to fare very well.  Camera takes good enough pictures and videos, the take off and land button is a great feature.  After a dozen or so flights, with only a minor tree interference, everything works as expected.  Learning curve was quick

title: Great For Novice and Beginners, needs better software
text:
My dad bought me this drone for my birthday, it is the first drone I have ever owned or operated. My dad owns several and he was impressed with the quality and the packaging that came with this model. Easy to assemble, and looks great.

We ran into problems pairing the controller with the drone. Only when I downloaded the Holystone app to my phone were we able to get the software to pair. From there, the experience was really fun. I was impressed with how clear the camera images were and how easy it was to fly. My dad commented that this drone was by far the easiest to fly compared to other brands he had previously bought.

My only complaint is the software. The pairing never quite worked well until I downloaded the manufacturer's app. And even after that, when closing the app and reloading it, could never get the camera to reset. The manual lacks detail about how to use the app. Also, the bracket on the controller is nice but I have a Samsung S9 and it presses on the power and Bixby buttons.

title: Go with  Another product
text: Terrible product. Only flew one then the app would no longer calibrate with drone!

title: Really cool drone!
text: First drone and purchased it to follow me around on my boat and some aerial photos of the lake house. Have used it in the backyard  playing with the follow me mode and appears to work well. Once I get more experienced, I will use it over the water. Installation instructions are well written. It was a little difficult for these "old eyes" to get the screws into the propellers, but that was more a function of age rather than difficulty. Battery has good life and cannot wait to venture out to more flights over the water.

title: Exactly what I needed
text: I was primarily interested in a drone I could use in my real estate business. I needed the ability to do aerial video and photography to help market properties. I would suggest watching a couple of quick tutorials on youtube to learn how to calibrate the drone and use the remote. Once you have that down, it's very easy to use and the quality of the pics and videos is great for my needs.

title: Fun to fly
text: Easy to fly but battery recharge time way to long.

title: Great product!
text: Fantastic! Super easy to learn. My kids 11 &13 love it!

title: It is everything i expected, and a couple features ...
text: It is everything i expected,and a couple features i didn't, such as their well designed app which makes the drone much easier to fly. The 720p Camera that was included was also higher quality than i expected and has survived a moderate crash.

title: Buy extra batteries because the flying time is only about 10 minutes and it takes several hours to change one battery.
text: Very easy to fly right out of the box.  Great for beginners and intermediate drone flying.  The extra blades and landing feet is nice added touch. The camera take clear pictures and videos for the money. It takes a long time to charge the battery so having a backup is nice if you want to fly for extended periods.  Flying time is not great only about 10 minutes on a change.

title: Great to learn with
text: Very easy to operate, the app works great, i was filming video right out of the box

title: Great beginner drone very well made reasonably priced
text:
This is one of the best beginner drones I've seen. Very reasonably priced has functions that more advanced drones have that cost 3 to 4 times what this one does. The only draw back is I haven't found a way to update firmware if there is one. It's a great drone to start out with and learn on before moving on to that high dollar drone you don't want to destroy. I've had mine for a year and still fly it with my other drones.
June is the best she will help resolve your problems.

title: This is a GREAT Drone !
text: [[VIDEOID:114090f04a1431bae309b89b62aec12d]] I took this drone out on a few test runs this week and I really, really enjoyed it. I consider myself a novice drone user so I was looking for something somewhere in the $200 range to start off with just to get familiar with general operation. I came across this one on Amazon, it was only $135 with the coupon! I read some good reviews on the HS 100 and decided to give it a shot. I am glad I did. When I took it out of the box, I was impressed by the quality. It looks and feels well made, and sturdy. This drone was easy for a beginner to set up and use Within 45 minutes, I read through the instructions and set the whole thing up.  Day one I was up and flying in an open space by my house. The app that you can download is easy and fun to use. The 2k camera takes good pictures and video as well. I still have some learning to do with maneuvering and videography piece, but that is half of the fun for me.  Stay tuned, you may see  post some cool pics and video from this baby on YouTube one day!

title: Rechargeable remote sucks!
text:
The drone is great and flies well even in moderate wind. I recited the first one and it dead a bad motor they changed it out without hassle and was great.
The problem is the rechargeable remote, it goes dead just sitting there turned off it seems cause several times now when I get it out to fly the drone battery is charged and great but the damn remote is dead. I need it to check roofs of travel trailers when I pick them up to haul them cross country and several times now it‚Äôs let me down and haven‚Äôt been able to check them. I will consider getting the better model only if it has a battery remote otherwise the whole drone is useless.

title: The drone is one of their larger models and is easy to handle
text:
[[VIDEOID:86c5cefcf1bb15550648686c23099223]] So I recently bought the HS100 drone, and Holy Stone continues to live up to their reputation for bringing out quality products. The drone is one of their larger models and is easy to handle. This is not like some of the other ones I bought for friends and family that had a more sports like the design. This is excellent for flying around, taking nice pictures and videos to enjoy. I live near the woods, so it is nice taking pictures of nature around my house. The GPS feature is pretty cool because it will follow you around if that mode is on. Hovers well in place and is responsive to whatever you do. The one feature I love is how the controller now can be charged and no longer need AA batteries. My wife was getting annoyed with how many batteries I was buying for all the toys I buy on Amazon, and this a lone was an excellent addition.

Read the directions for the drone and make sure you take your time learning how it operates before you go crazy. I am becoming more and more experienced with different drones I play with, and I still take my time and make mistakes (the video just shows I am still a bit choppy with my hand controls). Overall, an excellent product that I recommend to everyone who wants a fun toy for the holiday season.

title: Five Stars
text: Lots of fun! Very pleased with my buy, flying is easy, camera is great quality.

title: Great beginner drone!
text: The only thing I dislike about this product is the short battery life. Other than that, this is great for a beginner like me!!!

The propellers were hard to find at first, but they ended up being on the bottom of the box, and after found easy setup , easy fly. Fun to fly and records well.

title: Hs100 is a blast

title: HS100 Drone
text:
Great looking drone, slick design and pretty good camera. Easy to fly especially with the one button take off, gps returning and landing.
It is my first drone but I am amazed, how easy it was to set up and fly , a great add to your collection in of toys, especially for that price. Would strongly recommend

title: Glitchy, no help to fix it
text: Great product, helpful customer service! Very responsive and the drone is fun

title: Great drone for the money!
text: Has very clear live video. Easy to use. Great for beginners. Would recommend.

title: Glitchy software and terrible customer support
text:
The remote on my drone stop holding a charge after the 3rd use. I contacted Holy Stone to get a replacement. They sent me a replacement remote which would not pair with the drone and insisted I was doing something wrong when I couldn't get it to work. After the 10th email they finally realized they sent me the wrong remote and told me they couldn't send the correct replacement because they discontinued the remote for my drone. They told me to try to buy a second hand one and there was nothing else they could do to help me. I got so fed up that I returned it. Then they tried to charge me a restocking fee.

I bought this drone because of the high ratings. I have since discovered that the reason there are so many high ratings if because Holy Stone offers people a free second battery if they write a good review on Amazon.

title: Using to check gutters for leaves!
text: The drone is great and very stable. I want to use it to check my gutters for leaves rather than go up on a ladder.  Having 1 problem getting camera to pan up and down from remote but the resolution is great!

title: My husband says it all!
text: I've tried a number of different remote control aircrafts (planes, drones, etc.).  I was surprised when my wife bought the HS100 for me, knowing my track record with crashes.  The assembly process, flying instructions, an app were surprisingly easy to complete.  Flying the HS100 was even easier.  I couldn't believe how responsive and easy it was to fly successfully.  I was ecstatic with being able to fly the HS100 without crashing it.  There were a few harry moments, close to panic, but I was able to hit the "home" option and the craft came right back to where it took off from.  Know that this fail-safe option really worked so well, made it easier for me to push myself to try and really have fun with the drone.  I LOVE IT.  Photos are more than acceptable too. The only sown side was the battery life, about 20 minutes.  But that two batteries does the trick.  Thank you, holystone, for the 2nd battery.

title: Worth the money
text: Bought this for my 13 yr old son for Christmas. It works great. Easy to use and takes good photos. Just wish the battery life was longer.

title: Operated better than anticipated
text: I bought a  H S 100 drone . Got it timely  . Operated better than anticipated . Camera gave great pictures. Larry

title: Easy
text: We have never flown a drone before.  This has been easy and painless so far.

title: Started to send it back
text: I bought this drone and a HS700D. This one to learn on and the HS700D to fly. This one is sooo easy to fly I decided to keep it. The HS700D had a noisy motor and had to be sent back ,but I ordered another one to replace it. I would not hesitate to buy one of these.

title: Got this as My Early Christmas Present
text: I got this as my early christmas present. It took a while to setup but after that flying it in the air was amazing. Great price for camera & video quality though compare to other drones. Great thing it comes with the guards to protect the propellers I crash twice accidentally just being honest. The fight time isn't the best if you want to fly it for a longer time, but getting extra battery would be great. Don't get fool by the photo quality from your phone, check it on your computer you may spot a bit of difference. By taking out the sd card and insert it into the usb.

title: My first real drone and I am impressed
text: My first real drone. It's been amazing. Had a crash into a tree at 100 feet (not recommended by the way) and it tumbled to the ground while I stood in horror. Yep, it's been back up a number of time since!

title: Very disappointed
text:
Only flew the drone 2x Each time I had to take about 30 minutes to re-calibrate it. Even then it kept telling me that I was out of battery power in the remote when in fact it charged all night,

Had called the mfg and they said that it was calibrated when it left the mfg in China. I had not bothered calling them back telling them about the charg8ng issue, Was upset with this. Returned it with no problem.

Will be looking at other manufactures.

title: Nice first drone!!
text: Carefull presentation. Many spare parts included nice follow up!! Too many batteries need to be charged to use it: drone, remote and phone. Other than that really excellent first deone

title: Sturdy entry level camera drone!
text:
First, I have to mention that this is my first camera style drone. I have played around with the little $30 mini drones but never one with these features and capabilities. I have had this drone for 2 days so far and taken it up 4 different times so far.

When I got the drone I found the assembly was easy (once I realized the prop blades were on the underside of the box). The box included a bunch of spare parts, including a second full set of props and a second set of landing skids. The written instructions on how to pair the drone, app, and controller were not detailed enough for me but there were a ton of youtube videos that demonstrated this. After watching one I was able to get the drone flying easily. The cell phone clamp will just barely hold my samsung galaxy s9+ with a otterbox defender case. I am REALLY impressed with this drones durability. The first time I took this drone up I did not pay attention to how low the battery had gotten and I started to lose power before I could land. The drone made a VERY rough landing on its skids from about 15 feet and the drone took it like a champ. Since then I have kept a MUCH closer eye on my battery indicator and have not had any additional mishaps since then. The battery life seems fairly accurate from the description and I am getting between 12 and 15 minutes of flight time per charge. The battery seems to charge from drained to full in about 4 hrs using the included cable and a standard cell phone USB wall charger. I am planning on purchasing additional batteries since they are really easy to swap on the fly. The camera, while not the best, does a reasonable job of taking pictures and video. One complaint I do have is that when you are recording video the app beeps every 2-4 seconds as a reminder. While on short video clips this doesn‚Äôt bother me to much, when recording longer video clips I find it can be distracting. Another thing I have noticed is that I can look at pictures taken by the drone on my cell phone but I usually have to pull the drones SD card to watch the videos. Again, since 99% of what I do with this drone is take photos this is not a big deal but I feel it does need to be mentioned. The flight controls are really easy and I am more than comfortable with the range of the drone. I have taken it up to an altitude of 60 meters and flown it a distance of 30 meters away. I might get comfortable enough to fly it where I can‚Äôt see it but I am not willing to do that yet.

Over all I have been enjoying this drone very much. I feel this is a great beginner camera drone especially with how tough it is and am looking forward to getting a ton more use out of it.

title: Never really performed well
text: First time out, drone failed to hover properly. After a few seconds, the drone would drift into an everwidening circle, becoming increasingly unstable, and only responded when checked repeatedly with the controls. After about 40 days (ten days after the warranty expired), one of the motors failed. I ordered a replacement motor and began a laborious and eventually fuitless effort to fix the unit. I think there was something wrong with the unit at the outset, but I didn't know enough to recognize it.  My lesson learned is that you get what you pay for. I was disapointed that my first drone experience turned out so negatively. Would not buy again from Holy Stone.

text: My boyfriend was beyond excited when he opened his drone on Christmas, before I knew it he had set it up and was ready to fly. This is a great beginner drone. The price was fair and the smile on his face priceless! Putting it together was quick and easy and he's now on week 2 learning to control and flying looks good so far.

title: Set up a little tricky
text: Husband loves it! A little tricky to learn how operate it, but overall nice. He‚Äôs happy with it so I am hay

title: The key functionalities of this drone can be learned much faster than other drone.
text: I bought this drone because the Holy Stone brand is given high praise and stellar reviews from several drone /tech sites and also larger well known tech sites. The HS100 drone is very easy to learn to fly and is larger and more stable than any drone in its price range. The selling point of the HS100 is its GPS, follow me function, 15 minute flight time, and headless mode. All of these characteristics in this drone are amazing features that go well beyond the given price range. Honestly spending more would probably get you a better camera (1080P), but you would not get a drone that has a better flying experience and ease of use in this range....totally worth buying the Holy Stone HS100 Drone, money well spent.

title: Arrived unusable
text:
Drone arrived with 1 of the Motor drive shafts pushed back through the motor.
Unusable on the day. it then took a few emails and eventually got a email with a video link of how to repair it myself (yeah thanks exactly what you expect from your newly purchased drone salesman).
Had to take the done apart to repair. It flew afterwards however it is still damaged internally.
Its the packaging that totally lets it down and reading reviews that is still going on.
I tried writing a review at the time but got a msg saying you cannot review this product.
So another "Yeah thanks" comment. Drone was fun to fly but it's a bit lightweight, easily breakable, and the GPS isn't great.
it gets 2 stars because i did get some enjoyment from it

title: Very easy to fly.
text:
I am seventy five years old. My coordination and reflexes are not what they used to be therefore I was reluctant to try a Drone.
I finally decided to give the Holy Stone HS100 a try. I have flown it eight times without a crash or any problems.

The manual is very good at explaining everything. I would recommend the HS100 to any of my friends.

William Blain

title: Love it
text: I love it

title: BEST DRONE FOR THE PRICE.
text: This is the best drone for the price. Loaded with all the features. Wifi is easy to hookup to connect to my phone. GPS for fail safe flight so cant lose it. Follow me anywhere is super cool. Auto take off & land really works. We had it flying out of the box in 15 min.  Extra body & propeller pieces are bonus in case you crash it. (Hard to do with how easy it is to control) Even battery lasted for about 18 min. Of flight.  Highly recomend for your first drone or second or even thrid drone like me!!! Gotta go FPV fly some more. Love it!

title: Amazing drone with excellent features
text: Drone was easy to assemble and the app has great features to access photos, videos, daily logs nd more. The easy altitude hold, take off, land, return home and follow me work perfect. The camera is easy to use with good quality too. Only negative is amount of time to recharge the battery, about 4-5 hours.

title: AMAZING! Especially for the price!
text:
This is a great drone especially for the price. All the extra features that come with this package will cost you an arm and a leg if it was through another company. I haven't had a chance to fly the drone yet since it was delivered late. BUT assembly was straightforward, and it didn't take long to have it ready to fly. Also the controls are simple enough for someone who has never flown before to understand. I highly recommend this purchase even if your new flying drones. Another plus is the customer service at Holy Stone cannot be beat, any issue you may have can be fixed.
The only thing I noticed after taking it out of the box under good lighting is that there where scuff marks on the drone, but after contacting Holy Stone within minutes they immediately rectified this matter. Outstanding company and service.

title: great drone for the price
text: Expensive drone features at an affordable price. Great customer service. I highly reccomend.

title: Easy setup, easy startup, and super fun to use.  Outstanding buy/value for entry level drone!  Don't hesitate.
text: After opening the box, you'll be presented with a few parts to install along with the tools.  Easy to install in minutes.  Ran through the manual and after downloading the app, view several instructional videos.  Ran through startup activity and was up an flying easily.  All functionality:  Take off/land, return to home, follow-me... worked flawlessly.  The video is 720 and doesn't have image stabilizer so manage your expectations.  But for the money, it's an outstanding value!  My son and I look forward to flying this as much as we can.

title: BEWARE!!!
text: The propeller assembly is a real PAIN to put on!  It consists of a copper washer, a teeny TINY screw, a spacer, and of course the propeller blade.  One must line up a hole in a silver pin with a hole in the spacer, THEN somehow manage to insert the tiny screw so it will remain while you fumble with an accompanying phillips head screwdriver in order to line up with the screw head and turn until it is firmly secured.  Then the exposed spacer with the screwhead is sealed with a cap.  THIS IS EXTREMELY DIFFICULT TO ACCOMPLISH.  This is MICROSURGERY you're performing here, and those with sausage fingers and/or poor vision may be in for a real struggle.  The drone comes with extra screws and spacers, but no wonder!  You'll lose a LOT of them, especially if you crash the drone and destroy the fragile propeller blades, requiring replacement (BTW, don't be too hasty in throwing away the styrofoam packing.  Extra blades are included, underneath and inside the material)!  In addition, the package containing the copper washers had some kind of gooey lubricant inside, probably meant as a lubricant for the blades.  This got on my fingers, and in turn, in my eyes, on my face, etc. (and it burned).  I thought I might use it to keep the miniscule screw on the tip of the screwdriver, but no.  BRAINSTORM: I do have a pack of gum.  Maybe I will chew a stick, then use a bit of the wad to steady the screw just at the hole while I screw it in (Don't laugh.  I AM NOT a watch repairman.  Most of us aren't.)  WISH ME LUCK.  I'M GONNA NEED IT!

title: Value
text:
This is a perfect entry level drone. It does exactly what it is supposed to for the money. Easy to assemble and fly.
Battery life could be better and the image quality could be better, but hard to be critical given the price. I recommend.

title: Great product!
text: Easy to learn for beginners!

title: The best I have ever droven ever
text:
This HS100 is a mega GPS drone. The best I have ever droven ever.

Its not cheap but worth the price. This strong good quality thing had clear instructions with minimal assemblance which my 14 year old was able to do quickly.

I connected it right away with my tablet and was able to see the great clear photos that it was taking while flying.

With the 1 button takeoff I was ready to fly as soon as the battery was charged. It was in the air for about 15 minutes and I would purchase extra batteries for future use as not to disappoint kids when we finally get to the park.
I previously losed drones in the air so I was very excited with the GPS so I won't lose it.

Landing is much better than any other drone cause it doesn't just drop down when you press the button. It hovers in the air and drops down slowly like a airplane

Overall it's great and the best part is that HOLY STONE is a fantastic company with great customer service and I will definitely continue purchasing from them in the future!

title: Great drone for beginners for a fair price
text: [[VIDEOID:ca1c857743b8aa1b3faa554149834788]] This is the first drone that I have ever got and it was a piece of cake to get set up and learn to fly. Great video quality too. I found that my GPS return to home button on the controller and in the app does not work at all. So im trying to figure that out. Over all it's a great drone for beginners and a fair price.

title: Low  price , a lot fun !!!
text: Take a little bit to learn , but is a very good item.

title: More bang for your buck.
text: Don't spend $1000 on a drone when this one does the job at fraction of the cost. Easy to control, easy to put together and great quality camera. Very happy with my purchase!

title: Very good drone with enough features for the price I paid.
text:
I was pleasantly surprised to see how easy it was to set this drone up and start playing with it. I chose a windy day for testing but in spite of the winds, the drone held out pretty good. This is my first drone and was a lot of fun playing with it. It maneuvered pretty good, the return to home feature is really helpful. The video quality is quite good as long as you keep it straight going, once you start doing a lot of zigs and zags the video gets a little grainy. For some reason I could not take good photos but I don't want to say the camera is bad yet. I have only been able to fly it a few times but so far I have loved it. I would love to take it out on a mountain or near the beach to test it on a bigger surface area.
I sincerely hope they improve the battery life on this, I got around 13 mins of flying time and it was too short. Also the charging time is quite long so once you fly, the next time you fly kinda rolls into the next day.

To summarize,
Pros: good drone for the prize, holds out well in fair wind conditions, pretty good video quality.
Cons: would have loved if it was foldable, very low battery life.

title: Great Product
text: Great product for the price  . The size is good, and easy to maneuver.  Would definitely recommend.

title: Good beginner drone.
text: After a mishap they provided great customer service and reacted quickly. Great drone for beginners, you‚Äôll be happy.

title: Honest review. Very nice for the price
text:
This is my first drone, so I don't really have what to compare to. But, I'm surprised it's as good as it is for drones under $300. I would have expected something like this to be more like $500.
Very easy to fly (which is plus especially when it's your first drone), and set up was pretty easy (some things, like calibration, weren't so clear just from reading the manual but made sense after going through them the first time).
Interfaces well with my smartphone for FPV. Camera image and video quality are good.
Only negative I can think of is charge time for the batteries, but overall I'm quite happy and would recommend it to anyone looking for their first drone.

title: Very sturdy, survived crash on house roof

title: Great drone!
text: My husband bought the HS100 for my 60th birthday. Let me tell you I am one pleased grandma! I'm a newbie at flying drones. Right out of the package its a sleek looking drone. You will need to put on the blades and blade guards. The hardest part about that was holding those tiny little screws, lol. Batteries on reciever and drone charged, drone registered. Yes you have to register the drone with the FAA. Did it online, took 10 minutes and $5.00 and I had my numbers. Easy peasy. After following the calibration instructions the first flight went exceptionally well. The HS100 is responsive and very easy to fly. The follow me feature was a hoot. Almost like have a pet flying around following you.lol. And the RTH feature works very well. The drone comes to you very quickly stops near you and lands. Very cool indeed. The biggest reason my husband chose this drone was the camera. I have a small drone and the video is choppy at its best. Let me tell you what, the HS100's camera takes good pictures and decent video. I can actually use my VR headset with this drone and there's no choppiness! I absolutely LOVE the HS100. I have not found anything I don't like about this drone. Good quality drone that won't break the bank.

title: Fast set up, easy to fly!

title: Do your homework when purchasing a drone.
text:

title: Great beginner drone and very good instructions!...
text: This was the first drone I have ever purchased. It comes in a very secure box, with very good instructions. The assembly was easy and most parts for  assembly come with extra parts, a great touch. You can also access the video on the manufactures web page for additional instructions. We did have a problem at first pairing the drone to the controller, but the video helped to show what we were not doing correctly. It was very surprising when we first got the drone airborne at how hard it is to control the height and speed of the drone. My two year old Grandson just loved watching the drone and insisted it was a helicopter, not a drone. I can see having extra batteries for the drone is necessary, as you only get fifteen minutes of flight time and It goes fast. Charging the drone batteries takes about three hours, so extra batteries help greatly the flight time. The drone is made with plastic and appears to be a durable material, as he had some fast and hard crashes learning to fly the drone. However, a very windy day is not going to be good on controlling the drone due to it's light weight. Overall just seeing my Grandson's sheer delight in watching us fly the drone made this a very good purchase so far.

title: The HS100 and the Awesome Holy Stone Customer Service!
text:
[[VIDEOID:53ad29e258ac1ddaeb7969802eefe3db]] My first drone!
I bet you that I read all about flying drones AND looking at my HS100 for two weeks before flying it!
Being like a little kid, the day that my baby and it's extra battery arrived, I brought it inside and read the manual thoroughly before attempting to put it together. I set all the parts out, identified them against
the parts listing, then put everything together. Very easy assembly...
I watched a bunch of YouTube videos, then decided to take it to my local middle school field. No wind, perfectly clear day. Auto take off, auto land, auto take off, auto land. Then, I decided to take a nice flight in the rookie mode. All went well. I was very surprised just how responsive it is. Takes great pictures and very nice videos. Even though you can retrieve the videos from the included micro-SD card, I prefer to record them on my iPhone. That is certainly a nice feature.
After several weeks of flying, I realized that my camera was not articulating. I checked online videos to verify that I knew what I was doing, I sent a message to Holy Stone customer support. I was astounded just how quickly Iris Chen responded to my request. She was very patient with me and my number of questions. After verifying that it was indeed a problem with the camera, she sent another out. I received the camera in a few days...After installing it, VOILA! So impressed that it worked perfectly! I am a true believer in their Customer Support. My HS100 flies better and better every day I take it out. Amazing how that happens when the operator develops a little more skill :)

They certainly have a fabulous business model...A very reliable product with a great Customer Support team!

text: I received this drone as a Father's Day gift from my daughter and grandsons.  I read the manual and watched several you-tube videos of people assembling the drone and then flying it.  I think these steps are important.  I then went out and tried it myself.  As a senior citizen, I found this device really a lot of fun.  The one button for both take-off and landing is good for beginners.  The "home" button is great, especially when you have a soft area for the landing zone when you are learning. title: Great drone for just about anyone
text:
This is my 3rd drone I have owned, all different ones. The first one handheld terrible, and the mothers burned out after a little over a week. The second one was great, but a good gust of wind carried it away, and I never saw it again. Because of that I wanted a good drone that couldn‚Äôt fly away like that, and had a good camera. So after all of the reasearch I did I found this particular drone I knew it was the best bang for my buck. The features on the drone are frat, it is so simple, but still can do so much. The camera is really clear. It is great for people who are just getting into the hobby, or who want a good reliable drone. I really do love this model, and would strongly recommend it.

The only issues I had were that the drone can only stay connected to your phone at about 30 meters, but that is still a really good distance to work with. I also had a small issue with the WiFi that connects to your phone, but my research into the issue showed that it is quite rare, and the customer serves rep was super helpful and fixed the problem with no extra charge.
This drone is 100% worth the money in my personal opinion, and I do not leave reviews often, or always so positive.

title: Highly Capable Drone
text:
I purchased this drone without knowing much about drones and here is what I learned from assembling and flying this one.

1. It comes with all of its parts plus some useful spares. The propellers are on the opposite side of the packaging from the rest of the drone,
2. Assembly is easy, although the assembly instructions are not all that clear. Be sure to watch for where the ‚ÄúA‚Äù and ‚ÄúB‚Äù propellers go.
3. The drone is best used with a smart phone and app. The app is free and easy to follow.
4. The setup instructions in the booklet are difficult to follow, so I followed the step by step displayed on the app.
5. My first controller came with a battery that would not charge. It was replaced by their Customer Service within a week with no problems.
6. Although their Customer Service is staffed by English-as-a-second-language personnel, they are knowledgeable, courteous, helpful, and prompt.
7. The drone flies as expected.

Five star rating, minus one star each for initial controller problem and difficult-to-follow instructions, plus one star for excellent customer service.

I recommend this drone for purchase.

title: Bad remote battery. Cannot fly drown
