title: I love my new toy!
text: I am so happy with my new drone. It was easy to put together and navigate. Shipping was fast and the customer service is excellent.

title: Best drone on the market
text: My Holy Stone HS100 is my second Holy Stone drone. The company has definitely mastered the craft of making quality drones at a lower cost for consumers. The video quality is exactly what I was looking for. The HS 100 has amazing stability from its GPS, it literally hovers, the same spot, super high in the sky even with a breeze. I have recommended Holy Stone to all my close friends and family. Holy Stone is awesome and I can't wait to see what the future holds.

title: WOW - A lot of tech for a great price! Easy to use.
text:
My wife bought me this drone for my birthday. I am new to drones and it is my first so at first I thought this was going to be too much for me to handle with all the tech packed into this thing and I was afraid I would crash it and break it immediately. I was wrong, it is not too difficult for a beginner, I mean I have a long way to go but I am confident I will get there.

The directions are easy to comprehend and makes executing the initial setup quick and easy. I was ready to fly before my battery was even done charging. I have been reviewing drones on the internet for a while now and most of the other drones are much more expensive that fall into the same class as this one. The only thing I can think of that I wish it had is obstacle avoidance but I understand that is a major tech upgrade that comes at a higher price tag. If I hadn't received this as a gift I probably would not have bought it myself, I generally era on the side of you get what you pay for and have learned a lot of hard lessons over the years of trying to go the cheaper route with products. So far I believe this quad breaks that mold.

I love all the fail safes this drone offers that protects it from a beginner like me from ruining it.
- Return home button: I almost ran it into a pine tree and hit the button and it immediately turned around and came right back to me, tragedy avoided.
- Emergency landing button: I was flying it low altitude and again almost ran it into some objects and didn't know if the return home would avoid them so hit the emergency landing button and it sets it self down rather quickly.
- You can set the parameters of altitude and distance it will go from you and if it will stop at what you set them for, very smooth.
- Feel like your getting out of control a little bit, let go of the sticks and it immediately stops, corrects itself, and holds position/altitude.
- Follow me button: It works well, haven't put this feature to the max potential yet but it worked well testing the feature.
- Camera: Holds steady and takes good clear pictures and video even when on the move.

So far I love it.
Chris

title: A great drone for Beginners!
text:
I received this drone for Christmas, but couldn't use it until the middle of January, when temperatures ran into the 40's.¬† Preparing the drone for its first flight was easy, but the manual could have been a bit more precise about how the fixed rings fit in place for each rotor blade.¬† After figuring all that out, I just had to wait until the next day for it's maiden flight.

I was very nervous and unsure about flying this drone for the first time, but with the app on my Android phone, I was easily able to set up the compass.¬† The app told me when the GPS signal was strong enough and the drone was ready to fly.¬† I hit One Button Take-off on the remote controller and we were in the air.¬† Thank goodness for Beginner Mode.

While still getting used to the controls, I have found the HS100 to be very easy to fly.¬† Each new flight (I just finished my third run) I get more daring and venture further from the launch site.¬† The Return to Home feature works beautifully, as does the One Button Landing.¬† I have yet to try the Follow-me mode, as we have too many trees in the area.¬† I like that the drone lights flash red to warn you that the battery is low, prompting you to land as soon as possible.

Overall, I would have to say that the HS100 is proving to be a great device for someone like me who is just starting out with a drone.¬† Once I get more comfortable with the controls, I will turn off Beginner Mode and see how much more I can do.

text: Great drone for a great price.  I have been in the market for a drone and did not want to spend a lot of money for a drone. I am a beginner and wanted something simple that I can learn to fly with.  The HS100 has met and exceeded all my expectations.  It is easy to fly and while i have yet to record a video with the camera I was able to take some good pictures with it.  Very well built and sturdy. The blades were a bit of a nuisance to put on but that is me being picky due to my big hands and the small screws that are used to secure the blades in place.  Thers have packaging it came in was convenient and I will say I was scared for a bit because I could not find the blades but they are on the bottom of the styrofoam.  The only drawback I hav e so far and as others have mentioned is the battery takes 3-6 hours to charge for 12-15 minutes of flight.  I am looking at getting another battery to extend flight time.  I will update the review once i am able to take it to a park to fly with it and record video.  Dont be afraid to purchase this drone if you are on the fence.  You wont be disappointed.

title: Easy to set up and fly, great customer service!
text: The HS100 is an excellent choice for a first drone with streaming video to your smart phone. It would be hard to beat the features, battery life, and range that this drone offers for the price. It was easy to set up and easy to fly. The auto take-off and auto land features are very helpful for a novice pilot. I have not flown it in very windy conditions and don't intend to, but it handles light windy days with no problem, maintaining it's position in hover. the battery is removable and is held in it's recess in the drone very securely, with no change of accidently coming out. the drone does not have object avoidance, so the pilot has to be careful of flying too close to branches, buildings, etc. This feature though is only offered on drones of much higher cost and is not important if the pilot avoids flying in areas that are too small for a drone that is this size.  It is also fairly tough and resilient to damage in minor accidents. Spare propellers and guards are provided, as well as spare landing gear. Other parts are readily available from the manufacturer. the manufacturer is very responsive to customer questions and provides quick service (from China) if extra parts are needed. I recommend this drone to anyone wanting a easy-to-fly drone with several high-end features at a relatively low price of $280.

title: Finally an affordable mid level drone!!!
text: Bought this on a whim as I have not been able to justify the cost of 1500 to 2000 for one that I wanted a couple of years ago. I will say the prop locks can be a pain with the little screws, and make sure you insert them in the side that has the indention for the screw head or the covers will not fit on.  Also make sure you do the calibration correctly or it will not fly-hard to see the lights outside during the bright sunshine, so may want to calibrate early AM or late PM.  And don't push and hold the buttons on the remote-they are just a quick press and go.  Getting ready to get some video of all of this flooding behind the house.

title: What fun!
text: I wasn't sure what to expect since this was the first time I've owned a drone, but what fun!  I had it take off from a picnic table and flew it around to get used to it.  I took some video of my house and neighborhood.  I then had it do the auto-land.  It landed back on the picnic table without a problem.  I know the error built into GPS, so I didn't expect it to land so close to where it took off, but it was within a foot or two.  Very impressive.  Picnic tables are not a very large surface area.  I probably should have done my first flight from the ground to allow for the GPS errors, but the drone did outstanding.  Great job, Holy Stone!  You built an outstanding product.  I'm a downhill mountain biker.  I can't wait to see how it does in the follow-me mode.  Thank you for all your hard work creating a fun product.

text: I purchased this drone to help around the house to check second story gutters and hard to access areas of my house. Another item I have to mention is the customer service is outstanding. I recently purchased a new Samsung S20 and began having connectivity issues with my drone. I reached out to Holystone's customer service for help and they walked me through trouble shooting my new phone to get me up and flying again. title: It's decent, but has some issues.
text:
PROS:
-Easy to learn to fly.
-Good interface with the controller and phone app; phone held in place with a clip that should fit any phone, with or without a case.
-Very stable as long as it has a GPS signal. Will maintain its position even in wind.
-Good vertical & horizontal speed.
-Impressive max height, just below FAA limits.
-Easy to assemble with tools included, and some replacement parts.

CONS:
-I've had issues with the camera, but the Holy Stone is going to replace it (details below).
-Camera mounting is not gyroscopic, so expect sudden dramatic movements any time you start or stop forward or lateral motion.
-Landing can be dicey. I'll get it over the spot where I want it to land, and hit the auto-land button, and it will often move around a bit before landing off the target. I once tried to land on a picnic table on a deck, but instead it flew off the edge of the deck, hit the side of the deck, and crashed in some plants.
-"Follow me" mode will not work. First time I tried, the drone just hovered in place, despite having good GPS signal in a wide-open field on a clear day. Second time I tried, it worked for a few seconds, but then started flying in circles that got wider and wider.
-On rare occasions, it will lurch forward or to the left immediately after takeoff, and be completely unstable and uncontrollable until I force it to land. I've broken landing gear twice because of this, and bent props. Manufacturer first said this is due to a gust of wind (it's not) and then said it's because I'm not controlling it right (it's not). It's because either the left 2 props or front 2 props aren't turning fast enough, and can only be fixed by shutting down and restarting.

Holy Stone is willing to send a replacement camera, but not the whole drone. Here are the issues I had with the camera:
-Video is often poor quality, pixelated, and has interruptions.
-At least 1/3rd of the time, the video will freeze either immediately after hitting record, or at some point during flight. This results in flying blind, and a corrupted video file. It won't record again until I shut down the drone, the controller, and the app, and then restart all three.
-I can tilt the camera up & down manually, but NOT with the controller as intended.
-They had me troubleshoot the camera by formatting the SD card, and trying a different formatted SD card. Didn't work, so they'll replace it.

Bottom line: I'd be on the fence about recommending it. I'm glad they agreed to replace the camera. But not replacing the drone might mean these issues are standard.

Note: Review may be updated once I receive the camera, and if the issues keep happening.

title: Purchased for my 16 year old Nephew. Loves It!
text:
I purchased this for my 16 year old nephew and asked him to write a review. He says "
Fun to fly, good battery life, acts as a stable camera platform, effective safety features, and all around great performance. Great app interface for camera and control. Also, handles wind well and has a stable hover. Has a beginner's mode for new pilots so the drone doesn't fly away. Intuitive, easy controls. Simple enough that anybody could fly it."

title: Cant get it to work

title: It is perfect! It is exactly what my husband wanted and ...
text: It is perfect! It is exactly what my husband wanted and does everything exactly as advertised. I have nothing negative about it. Having the extra parts and the detailed instructions is what we liked most about this. Thank you

title: Very capable streaming drone
text: Great drone, performs as advertised.  Purchased to take overhead shots at an outdoor wedding.  Upgraded to 1080 camera.  A drone with this kind of range easily gets far enough away or high enough so that the indicator lights no longer help determine orientation but the one touch  home button brings it back every time.  I flew it once at quite a distance until the battery was almost depleted and it headed home without being told and landed.  Wifi video usually still works at maximum altitude of almost 400 ft. but even if it cuts out the onboard micro SD card continues to record.  This drone will work as indicated in the description.

title: Easy to fly and stable even in a stiff breeze
text: Easy to fly and stable even in a stiff breeze. Loaded with features usually only found in much more expensive drones. All in all I could not be happier with this purchase.

title: super simple and idiot proof
text:
I have looked at drones for some time now and have not pulled the trigger because of cost for what I wanted. Then I found the Holy Stone HS100. What a great drone this turned out to be. This is my first drone and I couldn't be happier.
The set up was fairly simple and getting it in the air for the first time was flawless. I did make one call to customer support about the initial pairing, but they got me fixed up with no problems. I have flown about 5 times now to get myself used to the controls and it is amazing how quick it is to get used to. No crashes and it does everything I want.
The pictures are good for my purposes but I'm sure some people would want a 1080 camera. I understand the better camera drains the battery faster, so I will stick with the 720. I purchased the case from Holy Stone and it was top notch. It is the only one I found that did not require the removal of the propellers, which would be a real pain. Along with two extra batteries, I am set for a ton of fun. If you are wanting to get into drones, you can't beat this for the price.

title: So far, so good - easy to get started
text: Purchased the HS100 for my wife for Christmas. Her hobby is outdoor photography, and she was looking to add drone photography to her portfolio. Have only made our first couple of flights, but it's been easy to get started. Assembly was a snap, and my wife (who is not mechanically inclined) was able to fly the drone on her first try. Haven't done anything exotic yet, but  can already tell this is going to be pretty easy and a great way to see if she'll enjoy photography with a drone before moving on the more expensive models. We have had a couple crashes with trees and then also took advantage of the "emergency landing" feature. The HS100 bounced back nicely from the impacts. I did install the propeller guards - which I'd definitely recommend AT LEAST while we're still novice pilots. Initial thoughts are this is a good product for the price. Will update the review after some more flight time.

title: Favorite drone
text: This drone is a beast. Man it is so easy to use. The picture quality is fantastic. Yes you have to register with FAA due to its weight but that was easy too. I can say this will be my new favorite quad. Amazon shipped it faster then expected and I just love the freedom of flying. It takes all you problems away for a few minutes.

title: I received the drones, charged the drone and transmitter ...
text: I received the drones, charged the drone and transmitter batteries. Started setting the iphone and after the setup it shows the transmitter battery very low. It would not respond because of the low transmitter battery. Tried to charge the transmitter battery but after less than 1 minute the green light comes on showing that it is charged. Took it outside and tried to start to fly. The transmitter battery still shows low. Will be returning it.

title: GREAT FUN!!!!
text: I purchased this drone with out any flying experience. It has been a treat to learn on this product because of the ease of operation. The auto lift and return function gives me some confidence to fly it in any area. Thanks for the future fun.

title: Good quality for beginners
text:
Ordered this drone for my husband's birthday, and as a beginner, never using a drone before, it was very easy to use. Takes some time to get it set up but I expected that. Downloading the app was easy, and flying it has been very simple and enjoyable. The battery doesn't last a very long time, but I think that is pretty standard for drones of this category. Holy Stone has fantastic customer service, I would recommend buying with them just for the customer service.

Our drone got taken by the wind and tossed into a tree, and even after a 20 foot crash, it still worked. The drone comes with replacement blades so we were able to get it fixed and back working quickly.

Buy. This. Drone! You won't regret it!

title: Nice drone!
text: Nice drone!. Lots of good features,,,,, easy to fly and video the area.  If the first controller hadn't quit due to a bad battery the whole package would have been great.  Transmitter was replaced and works fine.

title: Received my HS100 and love it. Easy to assemble and a breeze to ...
text: Received my HS100 and love it. Easy to assemble and a breeze to fly. Glad it did come with a few spare parts as I have broken off the tip of one of the propellers. So far i've only flown it in beginner gps mode but look forward to opening it up to greater distances.

title: Assembly was very easy - just the propellers
text:
Upon first impression, the Holy Stone HS100 Quadcopter exceeds expectations. All functions work as described: Follow Me, Return to Home, Auto Landing/Takeoff, etc. Works well in wind, but this is dependent on your access to a powerful GPS signal, so make sure you have one! The Follow Me function is dependent on the GPS in your phone, and not facial recognition, so make sure that signal is strong as well. Assembly was very easy - just the propellers, propeller guards, and a few screws. Overall, great quadcopter for the price!

Update: Had a problem with the board which caused the drone to fail on several occasions breaking the frame and camera. Emailed Alex at Holy Stone support. After sending Alex some photos and answering some questions as to the nature of the crashes he determined the problem and actually sent a replacement drone to us!! This is fantastic service folks! Replacement drone works perfectly and we are very pleased with the product!! Definitely recommend Holy Stone products!

title: Holy Stone's Customer Service is #1
text:
My first Drone experience and it has been a great one to say the least. Holy Stone has the best Customer Service I have experienced in recent years and you can tell that they want to be #1 in the industry. That is what in my opinion it takes with any tech-heavy product.
The drone itself is well built and the learning curve an easy one, getting you up and flying very quickly.

title: Great First Drone
text: Easy to assemble. A great first drone.  Enjoyed my first flight.

title: Beautiful beginner drone go for it
text:
[[VIDEOID:e424b023a5c91e7a141e6890f2d2381e]] This done is easy to set up and fly. Invest couple of minutes to read the instructions manual.
For a beginner drone I couldn't ask for more.

Please be cautious not to fly this indoor as I did try out and ended up crashing not once but thrice.
Make sure I'll are in an open area away from WiFi connections of homes, buildings etc.. they interfere big time.

title: Works as well as Drones that cost twice as much ...
text: Works as well as Drones that cost twice as much. I have zero regrets! I do have to calibrate it each flight which only takes a couple seconds. Also, their costumer service was on point and extremely helpful when I needed a hand!

title: Too much hassel, poor customer service.
text: I purchased this drone to do rooftop inspections of client sites. I only needed it to fly straight up, take a few pictures and come straight back down. My experience with this product has been awful. The drone arrived in a box which had been opened and was missing the propellers. I contacted their customer support, which had a very poor telephone connection. I was told tech support would contact me in a few hours. I never received a phone call but I began receiving E-mails telling me the props are shipped on the underside of the styrofoam packaging. I explained that the two grey bags were empty and received the same E-mail three more times. After receiving my spare parts kit, I assembled the drone according to the instructions and took it out for its test flight. It worked well ONCE. After the initial charging, the remote control refuses to take a charge. The kit only comes with a charging cable and the instructions say you must only use a -1AH charger. This means 3 hour charge times for a battery that lasts 15 minutes. After charging the remote (light shows green) the app says transmitter has low voltage, and the battery icon shows red and empty.

title: Ease of flight for beginners
text: Great fun.  Powerful platform. Return home is a Great feature.

title: Great drone, great features and great price
text:
Excellent drone for beginners. Lots of features for the price. The RTH feature
gives peace of mind that you won't lose your drone if the controller loses connection, battery is low on drone or by pushing a button it will return to where it took off.

title: The packaging was very good. The drone was well protected
text: I received the product very quickly. The packaging was very good. The drone was well protected. It was easy to assemble with minimal assembly required. The directions were concise. My son and i flew the drone and it was easy to master the flight within a few minutes of playing around with it. This is a great drone for the price. The camera is clear and crisp. I'm looking forward to spending more time flying this with my son.

title: First Time Experience
text: I love it!

title: Great drone with loads of features!
text: Drone has great features that make it return to you when the battery is low.  It has a training mode that keeps it within height/distance limits so it doesn‚Äôt get too far away.  It has a great camera to take amazing video.  And it has GPS so it is difficult to lose!

title: Excellent Buy & Loaded with Features...
text: This drone is exactly as advertised, and working perfectly. I did contact the seller for some clarification on getting the drone connected to the controller, and they responded within a few hours with detailed information, which did help. I am now flying it, and capturing perfect video and pictures. Love it. Highly recommended.

title: Five Stars
text: great drone easy to fly with great app for phone. love it!!

title: Two Stars
text: I have ordered 2 of these now, the first one did not sync with my GPS and flew into a tree, the second one had engine failure for no apparent reason and fell out of the sky.  For the limited time i was able to fly them though the features worked for the most part.  Auto Take Off and land worked, Camera worked as well.  I am on the fence about ordering a 3rd.

title: A very nice drone,  easy operation for beginner!
text:
The drone arrived the next day, even though I ordered it during Amazon's busy Prime day sale! I was extremely pleased with the shipping, however, it arrived with no instructions or literature. Luckily, holy stone has instructions on its website. One of the small screwdrivers broke during assembly and while holy stone responded to my email within 12 hours, they do not have that item available for shipment. That said, they are working on shipping out a replacement package. I will update if this doesn't work out.

Once assembled, the drone was fairly easy to pair with the phone, calibrated and fly. The flashing light signals on where it is at in calibration may be a little confusing, however it's status is displayed in the app on your phone. This makes it much easier than looking up what the flashes mean. Once calibrated, a single button and we were flying! Even in a fairly stiff breeze, the drone tilted into the wind to hold its place and not drift. I am very pleased with its performance. The follow me option wouldn't work at first due to "weak gps signal." After flying a little more, we tried again and the follow me function worked nicely. Still playing around in beginner mode, but so far, this drone has been really easy to operate. I'm not too sure the camera is going to make me believe it is hd, but i have only viewed it on my phone this far. That said, it doesn't look the sharpest. Plenty good for landscape pics.

Overall, very satisfied. Especially considering it was a prime day deal!

title: Won't charge
text: The controller transmitter won't charge so unable to use the drone.

title: Great customer service
text: New to drones but did all the research before I bought and wanted a good drone but didn‚Äôt want to spend $1000 until I knew I could fly reasonably well.  All the reviews noted excellent customer service which sold me on this drone and company.  Took it out for it‚Äôs initially flight and it immediately lurched on automatic take off and one of the motors would not turn. Not sure what the issue was but I called customer service and they sent me not ONE but TWO new motors.  Watched the video from the email link they sent me, installed the motor and took it out with several successful short flights.  After reading about horrible customer service from other companies I‚Äôm satisfied that I chose Holy Stone!

title: Great company
text: This drone is fantastic, but their customer service is even better.  On my second flight the drone broke and the company immediately replaced the part free of charge. Highly recommended.

title: Flew well. Issue with the app recognizing the remote control level of battery
text: We tested it 2 times and it flew well on both times. We just had a little issue. On the second time, before flying the drone, the app informed that the remote control was with no battery (but it was charged). After fully recharging the remote control the problem remained. After about 5 minutes insisting on trying to fly the drone (holy stone hs100) we made it because the app finally recognized the battery was full. Another thing: the material which the drone is made of is not the best quality. It could be a bit more resistant. The remote control looks like a cheap toy. But the drone is working well despite the battery recognition by the app.

title: Great new toy. Awesome support.
text: This is a cool product. I have never had a drone before. It will take some practice flying as well as calibrating it each time that you use it. I feel that once I get more comfortable using it it will be simple to get going. It is cool to use though. I need to take it out to a field to really get it going. Also I wish it came apart easier for storage but since it is screwed together it will just sit taking up room while not in use. Pretty simple to get it going. I just have to have the instructions on hand in order to calibrate it and fly in the right direction. I will love it the more comfortable I get. Plus customer support is A+... I give the support 5 stars. They are very responsive! Best support experience I have ever had.

title: Great drone at a great price!
text:
I just received the Holy Stone HS100 Drone as a gift. It's my first Drone and it's very easy to operate and has technology and functions that many other Drones have but at a much better price point. The GPS, auto land, auto take off, and return home are a great benefit that I can utilize until I get in more practice. Everything works as it's suppose to and having an extra battery or two will definitely make recharge time not as noticeable. The Holy Stone HS100 is definitely the right choice for not only a beginner but even skilled pilots and has most of the options either would want or require. My Nephew Definitely made the right choice by choosing the HS100 and I look forward to purchasing more Drones from Holy Stone in the future!
Gari B.

title: Awesome. I have flown a few drones but this ...
text: One word, Awesome.  I have flown a few drones but this one seriously is the best I have had the opportunity to fly.  The "return to home"  feature is great for novice flyers and the camera is easy to manipulate and focus as well.

title: Great Drone and Great Customer Service
text:
The Holy Stone HS100 (GPS) is a great drone packed with many features that make it fun and safe to fly. The included 720P camera can be rotated up and down while flying which allows for better photos, videos and FPV (First Person View). GPS enables one button Take-Off, Landing, Return to Home, Low-Battery Return to Home and Transmitter Disconnect Return to Home. All great features that should help prevent even beginners from losing this drone. GPS is a Must Have on any drone that will be flown outdoors.

The HS GPS PRO phone app works well on my Android phone and displays live FPV from the camera. This app is packed with a lot of information pertaining to the drone, transmitter and flight details. Most all transmitter functions can be carried out through the phone app. You will see the battery status of the drone and transmitter. Also, the current speed, distance and altitude are all visible on-screen as you fly (the distance and altitude can be limited in the phone app and any one of three flying speeds can be selected on the transmitter). The phone app also logs flight information so you can look back at the max distance, speed and altitude pertaining to each of your flights. You can also view your pictures and videos in the ‚ÄúGallery‚Äù of the phone app at any time after your flight. Explore this app, especially the ‚ÄúLearn‚Äù and ‚ÄúHelp‚Äù buttons, before your first flight.

The drone battery takes several hours to charge and provides a decent flight time of approximately 15 minutes. An additional battery is definitely recommended so you can enjoy more than one flight per outing.

A few things learned along the way: Start your video recording from the phone app, not on the transmitter. This will prevent the constant beeping while recording. Also, go into the menu of the phone app and turn OFF ‚ÄúBeginner Mode‚Äù if you do not want to calibrate the compass every time you fly. However, any time you change location you should always calibrate the compass before you make your first flight.

Holy Stone is an excellent company and has one of the best Customer Service Teams in the business. I did have to contact them for a question and for a problem with my drone. Alex replied to each of my emails within a few hours. He and I emailed back and forth several times as he worked with me on my problem. Alex determined the cause of the problem and arranged for a replacement. Alex was courteous the entire time and he was genuinely interested in resolving my problem so that I was happy with my purchase. The replacement flies great and flying the HS100 has become a new and exciting hobby for me. Holy Stone will go the extra mile to make sure you are happy with your purchase.

title: As Advertised and Fun!
text: The Holy Stone HS100 is as advertised; which is a good thing.  No undesirable surprises.  The drone and controller are of good quality and very easy to fly and both photo and video functions are straight forward.  I presently am using the drone with a Samsung S8+.  Drone battery life is approximately 15 minutes in duration, so the purchase of extra batteries should be considered.  Two items for Holy Stone to consider would be a quicker charging battery and to offer a case to transport the drone as they do with their other drone products.

title: Awsome!!!
text: These drones fly great!  stable, easy to control, and great pictures.  The app did lock up during a flight and we had to fight it back home upwind, but got it landed again safely. It was an iphone 6s  running the app.

title: I‚Äôve had less expensive drones that were not easy to fly
text: I‚Äôve had less expensive drones that were not easy to fly.  I did not had a chance to try the follow me function due to it being windy today, but the return to home works great.  The video looks good but no sound recording.  Unless you want to hear the motors I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs a big deal.  I will add more to this review as I do more testing.

title: COMPLETE PACKAGE
text: It's no wonder this is Amazons top seller, complete package in a drone. Everything from assembly, setting up the app and flying is complete and easy. Extra batteries are a must though because it is so addicting to fly. Read and read all the customer reviews and couldn't agree more with them. Only issue was having to go through the pairing rituals every battery change, but it doesn't take but a few seconds, just hoop that must be jumped through, a must have drone, good job HolyStone

The follow me mode works great on beaches and scenic trips where you want to add yourself into a moving selfie. the video is crystal clear and easy to access. Wind can be a problem with the stability of the shot but doesn't hurt the flying of the drone. i like it and am researching to step up. it too may be a Holy Stoner.

title: Flies well, high quality! (once you've figured out directions :))
text:
I bought this for my dad, and it has been a lot of fun. I think it is a great value, and is high quality for the money. I thought assembly was a little challenging just due to how small the screws are, but once we got the hang of it, it was a snap! The camera works great, even the 720p, so I''m sure the 1080p is fantastic. We got some really cool shots. Here's what my dad said about it:
"For Christmas my daughter gave me a model HS 100 (720 P). I found the small amount of assembly to be quite simple and easy. While the users‚Äô manual has a few symptoms that English is the writer‚Äôs second language, overall it is adequate and covers the basics quite well. Flying the HS100 is also quite straight forward and, after reading the manual carefully and learning through a little ‚Äútrial & error‚Äù, is both easy and safe. Although I am not yet highly skilled in its operation, I am quite pleased with both the design and operation of the HS100."

title: Very good drone and great value for price.
text:
This is a great beginners drone. The controls are simple and the auto launch and land features work great. The drone is sturdy and can take crash landings as I have had a few. The camera takes very good still shots and the video is also of good quality.
The only negatives are the limited range of the WiFi connectivity to the camera. If you go to high or far you lose the connection and the camera view to your phone. Also the battery has an approximate flight time of 12 - 15 mins. I would buy an extra battery or two to have extended flight time.

title: Great drone, affordable, reliable.
text: This is a great, affordable drone.  Very stable flight, great video quality, and reliable flight time.  It reacts quickly and accurately to controls and is able to fight decent winds.  Overall, this is a great drone for those not looking to spend $1000.

title: Highly Recommended!!
text:
Wow!! This is an excellent drone for beginners like me. I did a lot of research before deciding to buy this HS100. I highly recommend this item
I will buy again as gifts to friends and family members. Bravo!!!

title: Good beginner level drone.
text: The first HS100 I purchased worked one time and then would not sync with the remote control (claimed low battery). Holy Stone support told me to order a replacement through Amazon. I did so without issue and the second drone works perfectly. It works as advertised. Photos and videos have a "fisheye" look to them, but are decent quality for the money. Overall it seems to be a nice starter drone and get the job done.

text: Got this as a gift for my birthday, mainly to take photos of my jobs, did have issues after only using it for couple flights, but the customer service was on point, as we troubleshooted to fix the issue, we could not, so I am awaiting my new replacement drone to be delivered today, will check back with better review of product once I am able to continuously use the product. Camera quality is average, but for the use I have, does just fine.

title: Third Drone, First One I didn't send back to Amazon!
text: I've tried two other drones at about the same price point as the HS100, but had to send them back for defects in the video. This one had much better setup and operation. The video worked well and it was fun to fly. Still haven't tried the virtual headset function, but will soon. Had just a bit of a problem with the calibration being accurate, but a web search unveiled a video that helped. I would recommend it for newbies like me.

title: Great drone for the price
text:
[[VIDEOID:a37852ff823dc51c0cf9660bd4ff3a2b]] This is a great drone and a lot of fun to fly!
I hesitate to call it a beginner drone, I‚Äôd call it more a hobbyist drone. You can spend $20-30 for a toy drone up to several thousand for a pro drone.
Having flown several toy RC helicopters around the house, when I decided to enter the world of drones, this was the perfect model to get my feet wet. I love the features that come with this drone: the GPS, the Return to Home feature and the 1080P camera are pretty impressive for a drone in this price range.
I‚Äôve owned two of these for several months and decided to give one to my young nephew when I bought an HS700D drone. He took to it immediately (and is probably a better flier than I am). I bought a couple of drone clips so we could have some fun dropping water balloons from high above, the HS100 is pretty impressive with its ability to carry the weight of the water balloon. We often fly our drones together which I love because it gets him away from the video games and he really enjoys it (as do I).
I posted a picture of my nephew flying the drone with a water balloon attached, this was taken from my drone flying above. I‚Äôve also posted a short clip of video taken from the HS100, the quality is quite impressive considering the price.
If you want to have some fun with a drone, I highly recommend this unit.

title: Five Stars

title: I love my HS100
text:
I'm a totally disabled Vietnam Vet. I have had a liver transplant and lung cancer all due to Agent Orange. I have not been able to perform things I used to. This drone has gotten me back outside and although I can't move around well,
I don't need to chase it. It comes back to me. Bravo Holy Stone!
Rich Vietnam 70-71.

title: Awesome Quadcopter/Drone
text: I recently purchased the HS100 as I was looking to expand my collection of outdoor drones.  I have a few that fly well outside but none as well as this one.  What a joy to fly as it is  fast, responsive, packed with features and well built.  I was able to connect to my smart phone without any problems.

title: Fun Memories Brought Current
text: I am new to flying drones and received one as a gift from my sister. It has brought back memories of my youth flying remote control planes in the fifties....except the drone is far more responsive, powerful and fun! As with any new skillset, I needed some short flights to get used to the controls. Alas, during one such flight I managed to damage the drone...not the drone fault!  Working with June at Holy Stone was amazing. Inspite of my 'pilot error' situation she was eager to assess the situation, identify the problem and resolve it for me. She was very responsive, easy to work with and definitely exceeded my expectations. June is a great company representative. If you are in the market for a drone, I  cannot recommend Holy Stone enough!

text:
We love this drone. It's easy to fly. It's important to let the drone cool down in between flights. We were not aware of this but after contacting Holly Stone about about a motor locking up, this was advised to us.
Great customer service!

title: Amazing Drone for a great price
text: I bought this drone for my son‚Äôs 12th birthday. He loves it! It is fairly easy to learn especially with the take off/landing feature and return home. I like that is has a beginner mode so it limits how high and far he can take it. The pictures and video the drone takes are the main reason we bought this and I am very impressed by it. Would recommend buying an extra battery so you can use it for more than 15 mins at a time.

title: Fairly easy to use, durable
text:
I haven't tried using the drone without a phone, since I like seeing what the drone's camera is seeing, but using it with one is pretty okay - it takes some time (a couple minutes) to create the direct Wi-Fi connection from the phone to the drone, and for the drone to get a GPS signal, but once it's ready to fly, it works well - the iOS app has a new user feature that limits the height and distance to 30 meters; with that mode disabled, you can still adjust the maximum height, up to the FAA-mandated maximum height of 120 m (400 feet), so you know you're still flying within the height rules (remember to register with the FAA; it's only $5 for 3 years.)

Luckily, I decided to add the blade guards (kind of like training wheels for drones), so even thought I've dug into the ground while landing, flew into a tree (I think its battery was drained and was lowering itself down), and the outside of the garage (always maintain constant eye contact with your drone), the only damage is scrapes and garage paint on the blades and top of the drone.

The only issue I have is my phone doesn't keep a good ad-hoc Wi-Fi connection to the camera (which appears to have its own antenna), especially when attempting to record video; this could either be due the camera's antenna, or my phone (iPhone 11 Pro with a silicone case, clipped into the phone holder in the remote control).

title: Awesome Drone, too much fun!
text: Awesome Drone! Assembly was very straightforward and easy. Battery for drone came fully charged, I installed drone app on my phone and was flying within 30 minutes of receiving package. Drone is very stable and easy to fly. The return to home feature is awesome! I was flying above the trees and taking great photos. I absolutely recommend this drone, it's well built and very fun!

title: Great Drone
text:
this Drone is easy to connect, learn and fly. Very durable. go ahead and get extra batteries. The 15 to 20 min flying time is good as far as drones go but you are going to be having so much fun you will not want to wait for the one batterie that comes with it to charge.
It takes great video and pictures too. I used it to check my gutters on the house. It saved me a lot of unnecessary climbing

title: very very good drone
text: it flies very stable, but does not hold up well when the wind kicks up.everything except the follow me mode  works nearly perfectly. Also i recommend buying extra batteries, as flying gets wonky when the battery gets low. The camera takes pretty good pictures. Though the blade protectors are quite flimsy.

title: Great drone
text: This was my first experience with a proper done, it flew nicely with low wind which is the time I thought was the safest, taking off and landing is a cinch with the automatic takeoff/landing, I really enjoyed my experience with this drone

title: Stay in Beginner mode
text:
Was great...until it stopped responding.

Had flown it about 30 times in beginner mode. Everything was great! Easy to fly, hovered and landed automatically. Took it off beginner mode and up up away it went! Attempted to bring it home to no avail. Saw it crash to my horror...in the water. üò• sad. Was even giving Holy Stone some love on Instagram...oh well.

title: Excellent Customer Service
text:
My son received the HS100 for his birthday recently. We are new to drones so we were excited to get it going. The drone didn't take long to set up and the instruction booklet was very clear on how to charge, assemble and activate the drone. Within minutes my son was flying the drone around our backyard. Unfortunately, on his third flight attempt, my son banked and crashed the drone into our garage and the landing struts on one side broke in half. I contacted Holy Stone via email and they responded immediately. They were sympathetic and asked that I email them photos of the damage. I did so and within a day they replied and said they would replace the drone and that my son could keep the damaged one for spare parts in the future! We can't wait for the weather to improve a bit so we can get outside and fly again.
In short, the drone is well made, easy to set up and maneuver and Holy Stone have some of the kindest and most accommodating customer service I have ever encountered. I highly recommend them and their product line.

title: Good for beginners.
text:
I've just opened this up and tried it out, but so far, it's not too bad! Though I don't have much experience in drone flying, this one seems to be a good one to try out before investing serious money into something with more features. As a beginner, the controls have some getting used to. R/C cars is what I've played with before and this is a bit different, but with some practice it won't take too long to figure out. The remote feels a little cheep, but the drone itself had no issues getting into the air. A few times toward the end of the battery life of the drone, the motors seemed to run a little haywire. This could have been a delayed response from the remote though, I'm not sure. Be sure to follow the set up and sync instructions in the manual and you'll be flying in no time.
PROS: Easy to understand remote, simple assembly, detailed instructions, "Beginners" setting when first practicing
CONS: Short battery life (12-15minutes), Long charge time (2-3 hours), cheep/lightweight remote.

title: easy to fly

title: Good to learn to fly
text: [[VIDEOID:e15557081025ea10d14b9e0115f77d96]] This is an easy drone to learn to fly; very easy to fly the drone once you get a handle on the basics -- my problem was the camera kept malfunctioning and the gimbal would not move the camera.  Maybe I got a lemon; I returned it.  It's worth the purchase price to learn to fly a drone and a solid machine to fly but that's not why I bought it.

title: A really good drone....very plug and play!
text: Great drone! Comes almost ready to fly (just need to install the propellers and guards and charge the batteries). Relatively, easy to pair with smart phone via WiFi and the app. Flying time is 10-15 minutes per charge which is OK, so I recommend getting backups for additional flying time. Good photo/video quality that can be recorded to smart phone or micro SD card, and also works well with FPV goggles. Sturdy build and easy learning to operate. Probably the only down side is the video feed (but not the controls) tends to stall when the drone is not in direct line of sight with the controller (i.e., behind a building or tree), which limits the FPV experience. Support staff is very helpful and responds quickly to emails. Overall a good product, especially for beginners!

title: Great beginner Drone
text: This drone is a great drone for beginners who want a little more than just a toy.  I found the controller easy to use with some good features.  The "Return to Home" feature will bring your drone back to the starting place, but be careful as it will not avoid hazards.  Basically a straight line via GPS.  The camera gimble will move from 90 to 180 degrees (straight down), but it is a little slow, so give it time.  The photo quality is excellent.  I was able to get good shots of my house and roof (checking shingles).  The battery I found to be decent in time ~15 mins.  So once you get the hang of it, I recommend that you get multiple batteries.  I will be upgrading at some point, but this is a definite great drone to start with.

title: Very Cool Tool
text: [[VIDEOID:c56f5a2ec3469fb085cdba714ec22612]] I am a senior citizen who can no longer climb on roofs to check things like gutter leaks or leaks in the solar pool heater, so I bought the HS 100 to help me out. I am very impressed with the drone's performance, even in the hands of a drone rookie. Let's start with assembly... I found the assembly instructions easy to understand and all parts, including spare rotors and rotor protectors were present. I would suggest that when installing the rotors you start the screw in the hole in the rotor first, then line it up and tighten it. That avoids dropped and lost tiny screws. As far as flying it, I am COMPLETELY INEXPERIENCED but the instructions were clear enough to get me going. I was really impressed with the auto-takeoff feature. I pushed the button and it took off and hovered at five feet until I  gave gave it further commands. I also like the fact that when you push the joystick forward and then release it, the drone does not continue forward, but stops and hovers. I was afraid I would have to reverse direction to get it to stop. The auto-landing feature also worked well. I just flew it over my head to a point in front of me and pushed the "land" button and it settled to the ground. Another great feature is that the camera can be adjusted downward in flight so you don't have to point the drone downward to get roof photos. I would buy this again in a heartbeat. I still have a lot to learn and need a lot more practice because it responds very quickly and is subject to unwanted direction changes if the wind kicks up. A video is worth a thousand words so have a look at my maiden voyage, which I have attached.

title: This is a great beginner drone
text: This is a great beginner drone. The set-up was simple, and it had all the features that I was looking for at a very low cost. I had a bit of trouble learning to control it at first, but I wasn't too worried of failing due to the extra part included. I do have to configure it to a GPS every time I fly it, which I thought was only required in new locations, but it's not a big deal. The flight time could be longer, but at the price range it is understandable. Connecting it to the app is very simple and makes flying it much easier. Overall I am extremely happy with the purchase.

title: ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏èHoly stone!!!!

title: Great drone for the price
text: I got this drone on Christmas day and have been enjoying it ever since. All the features work great and it is build extremely well and I feel safe flying it. It can even take some crashes(I know from personal experiene). One of my favorite aspects of the drone is the return home feature. As long as you have a GPS connection it will always come back. The only criticism I have is the follow me mode. It requires you to take the entire remote with you which is a hassle. Overall though, great drone for the price.

title: Easy and Fun!
text: This drone is very easy to get started with; I was up and flying within a minute of plugging in the battery. Connects quickly and seemingly with no issues. Fairly sturdy as well: it has survived crashing into a wall and tree (both due to user error) with only minor scrapes on the propeller. The battery charged in just around 4 or 5 hours, as stated. Camera quality was great. Looking forward to my next flight outside of beginner mode. Definitely would recommend if you're looking to try a simple beginner drone.

title: Good value for the money
text:
Overall great product. Just some notes on things I think could be improved. Placement for phones on the controller causes it to be top heavy and if using a lanyard it will want to tip forward. You'll want a 2nd battery to be able to fly longer in one sitting, especially if travelling far from home.
The light up icons on the controller could be made to read more at a glance. Video quality is decent. The camera on the drone takes longer than I'd like to rotate up and down in my opinion. Id say It takes good photos though. All said, it is packed with features and you're getting a lot of bang for your buck.

-2 month update. Customer support reached out to me about my experience and they were very helpful. Because of this I've raised my review to 5 stars

title: Easy Breezy Flying
text:
[[VIDEOID:101adc30236bd5329eb0f960d648a27b]] I love the Holy Stone line of products. I've purchased a ton, and just can't say enough.

This time, it's better than ever before. Wow. They've really outdone themselves with the HS100... This thing is a beast! If you're looking for the functionality of the larger drones at a fraction of the cost. Posting a short video now, and will post another of this guy in action! Freaking awesome!!!

title: Great product at great price
text: Great product at great price.  Customer service is awesome.  My son crashed this drone on the second day.  I sent an email and they got back to me immediately and are helping me get a replacement part to fix the damage.

title: Powerful, stable, great range and very user friendly......
text: Finally had a chance to fly this drone after waiting for the weather to cooperate.  It was still a bit breezy today but I was getting anxious to fly so I went ahead and gave it a shot.  I was surprised how stable this thing was even in the windy conditions.  My first impression after one flight is that this is going to be everything I was hoping for in a bigger sized drone.  The range on this is amazing.  I was a little nervous to let it get too far away for my first flight with it, but I sent it pretty high and probably flew it a good 300' away from me and it handled just like it was next to me.  The WIFI stayed connected to my phone the whole time and I could see perfectly where I was flying.  At times I had a little lag on my phone screen, but that may be my phone because it acts up on some other apps as well.  Once I have a nice calm day I am going to take it out in a field and see just how far I can take this away from me and I'll give an update.  Assembly of the blades and guards was easy, downloading the app and connecting to my phone worked without any problems and I also love the fact that the charger cable for the controller and drone battery is the same as my phone so If I lose it or something happens to it I can just use my phone charger.  Another bonus is that the controller has a built in battery.  Configuring the drone for the first flight and sinking it with the controller was easy, just follow the directions in the book or the on screen directions in the app for your phone.  One cool feature of the app is that it has a flight log that tells you the date and time, how far you flew, what your speed was and your altitude.  I flew until I received a low battery warning on the drone and then all I did was push the return to home button and it flew back to me automatically and hovered above me until I pressed the automatic take off/land button and it landed itself pretty much within about a foot of where it took off from.  The only problem I had was getting the gimble dial to work for adjusting the camera tilt when flying.  It was working on the ground before I took off, so it may have been that I just wasn't seeing the adjustment on my phone screen or something.  I will try more of the functions next time I fly, like the follow me mode, headless mode, and maybe even fly with the no GPS mode.  I am extremely happy so far with this drone, and  I feel like I got a high end drone without having to break the bank.  I will give more updates as I have time to fly more.  Thank you Holy Stone!

title: good drone
text: like the drone for the price need to get a new cell phone for it to work write.

title: Awesome drone purchase for this price range. Highly recommend!
text: My wife surprised me and bought me this as a gift. I have flown a different brand of drone in the past, but nothing compares to this drone. The instructions were very easy to follow for setting up the drone for the first time. The GPS, return-to-home, and follow-me functions worked awesome. I have not had any issues with the drone so far. I thought the camera tilt was broken at first until I realized that I had to hold the button down. I wish the camera moved a bit quicker, but not a huge deal. Battery lasted around 15 minutes, which is expected with drones in this price range. Overall, I love the drone and would highly recommend it to anyone.

title: easy to fly
text: Recreation. Has all the features that make it easy to fly. If you are new to drones this one is for you.

title: Great value, easy to fly - but read the instructions
text:
This is my first large drone. If you're in the USA this *does* require FAA registration, but that is very easy to do. Do yourself a favor and read the instructions first. I spent a few minutes trying to figure out why it wouldn't take off. It has a take-off / landing button on the remote - press the button and it takes off and hovers a few feet off the ground. Landings are automatic as well and very smooth. I'm impressed with how gentle the auto-landing is.

Like all Holy Stone drones, they give you a lot of extra parts. Mine came with two sets of rotors and rotor guards, plus extra hardware for mounting everything.

I found the iPhone app easy to use, but it doesn't always connect to the video feed. I've found that it works reliably if I keep the phone close to the drone until the video starts.

Flying is very easy and the GPS hold works well. The return to home function also works quite well. I haven't tried the auto-follow function yet because there a lot of trees in my immediate area. With it set in Beginner mode my 8-year old was able to fly it around the park near our house. It's not suitable for children on their own, though. This is big enough that it can do some damage if it hot something.

Overall I am very pleased with this. For the money this gives you a nice video-capable drone with very smooth flight and GPS hold.

title: Wow.. Amazing piece of technology!
text:
What can i say other than Wow! This is the best drone we ever purchased. The drone took off perfectly and stayed steady in the air. Very easy to control and flew extremely high in the air.. The camera is amazing (360 degree flips). We downloaded the app for the drone onto our phones and set it up so we could take pictures and video. Pictures and videos were very clear while it flew very high up above up. Our kids thought it was the greatest thing they had ever seen. I recommend this drone, it's an amazing piece of technology.
The support was amazing too when we reached out of for a question.The only thing i would love to be different is for it to come with an extra charger.

title: HS100 another solid drone from Holy Stone

title: Perfect for a first drone
text:
I have never had an expensive drone, but I have been severely disappointed in a few of these inexpensive drones. this one was easy to assemble and I was in the air fairly quick! it definitely pays to watch the youtube videos provided in the drone app!
The camera is 780p, so I mean, I wasn't expecting anything from that feature but to see where I was headed. the downside, as mentioned on another youtube video is that the feed is run through wifi to your phone from the drone itself. therefore the video may lose connection if you get too far away.
Its fast, easy to assemble, easy to fly, has GPS and is fairly tough! I wrecked it on a manual landing attempt... just use the land button haha

title: Good starting Drone.

title: Nice Starter drone and great service
text: Very nice drone to get started.  I like the fact that it has an on board SD card and is very sturdy. Being a heavier drone it did require registration with the FAA in the US. Here's a tip not apparent from the manual.  Once you turn on the drone and pair with the remote, connect your phone to the Drone's wifi before doing anything else.  Then launch the app.  You can then use the app to check the status of the drone while you are Calibrating the Compass and Gyro.  The manual doesn't mention connecting the app until after all the setup. One of the many things I liked was how fast the GPS locked on.  It was so fast that the app almost immediately went to ready to fly. I also found the beginner mode helpful in keeping me from getting ahead of myself.  Finally, I did have a small issue with the joysticks sticking on the remote.  Holy Stone was very responsive and sent me a replacement immediately.  I can say this was my main reason for buying this drone over some of the other brands. Their reputation for great service.

title: Disappointed to say the least!

this a fantastic drone. packaged well. the drone and controller have a nice build quality. very substantial feeling in your hands. no cheap plastic.

title: PHENOMENAL!
text: I bought this for my dad for fathers day. It is amazing! I had originally bought the GPS shadow drone, which had turned out to be a waste of money. But this one is great. It takes amazing pictures and videos. The only downside is that it doesn't record audio on the video, that we know of. Would definitely reccomend.

title: Awesome Drone with GPS
text: This drone really is awesome. It arrived well packaged and without damage. The drone has a few pieces that you have to put together but it doesn't take long. Just make sure that you're careful with the tiny screws as they can slip out of your fingers. Once I had it assembled and registered I went right outside to fly. The drone is very smart and the GPS feature is incredible. It's really nice to know that if it loses connection to my controller that it will automatically return to where it took off. I lost another drone because it did not have that feature. The battery does take some time to charge but it will give you a good 10 to 15 minutes of flying time. I still have to figure out all the features but so far I really enjoyed using it. It's very intelligent and it senses if there's something blocking one of the rotors. I put the drone down on the ground and there was a long piece of grass that was in the area of the rotor. As a result, the rotor did not spin because it sensed that there was something that may be damaged if it did try to turn. Very smart and very safe. I highly recommend this drone.

title: Great flyer even in the wind!
text: This product is built very well and is very stable. We live on the gulf coast and the wind never stops here. This drone overcomes the wind and is stable. We are totally satisfied with this purchase.

title: Poor customer service
text: Cheap version of a drone. would not connect to the wifi most of the time. Poor customer service

title: Easy to set up
text: Easy to assemble, everything was in box, small screws took a few minutes to install the blades, drone looked great from the start

title: Excellent for beginners
text:
I had a HS120 and needed something a little more wind resistant since I use drones to take pictures of clients roofs and buildings in a coastal tropical area. So far, the controls are exactly like my previous model and the almost 90 degree remote camera adjusting is exactly what I need. It does handle a bit differently than the HS120, but that's due to it being over twice the weight. An FAA is required since its 700 grams.

The only thing I have not found to be impressive is the flight time, which is advertised at 18 minutes however realistically it gets about 10. I ordered another battery, so I'll update when it arrives to compare.

The camera quality isn't spectacular, but for the price and its ability to change the angle from the remote , I'd give it 5 stars. What's really cool which I never saw advertised was the little rubber bushings that the camera mount has- they act almost as suspension for the camera unit and appears to help resist damage if you hit the camera on anything.

This unit does NOT come with a carry case, which is kinda bizarre to me. There are a few 3rd party sellers for cases this size.

title: AWESOME DRONE
text: [[VIDEOID:7ef3fe1e5d7e0a73f4f457a5cc55e295]] I started off with Holy stones F181W and it is a great drone, I have crashed it many times while learning and flying it hard. Customer service has been great, Libby has been a great help to figure things out. I now have the Hs100, this is such a nice drone. The first time I pushed the take off button I was impressed with the power of those big props. I have flown it many times even past it's transmission range. It was so nice that it just came back like a good dog and I didn't lose it. The flat black finish of the drone looks stealthy. The camera works great and is so nice that it pivots up and down so you can see things and not have to raise or lower the drone to view something below. I like the read out that shows your current height, distance away, battery level in the controller and most of all the battery level in the drone. Return to home works AWESOME, it lands within a couple feet of where you started. I would suggest that after you get used to it you adjust the limits on height and distance in the app. A nice feature is the return height so it doesn't return to you and fly right into an object or a tree, it will return to your spot at the pre-set altitude and drop right down to you. GPS is super stable, I can let go of the controls and it just waits for me wherever I stop it even in a good breeze. I just purchased the 2 battery deal they now have and am looking forward to more flights

text:
[[VIDEOID:34672533608912c73a70ab1273ed144e]] Yes I would recommend the HS100 for anyone looking for a higher quality drone. (Scroll to bottom for quick list of pros and cons)

This is only the second drone I have ever owned (the first one being a Holy Stone HS110) so I identify as a "pilot in training". Firstly, I can't speak highly enough of Holy Stone's customer service. Never have I interacted with a company that is as friendly, quick to help and will go above and beyond to make their customers satisfied. Seriously they are awesome.

The HS100 is easy to fly and even has a "Beginner mode" that limits altitude, flight distance etc, to ensure it doesn't fly off out of your control. It has other cool features like "Follow Me" where the drone actually follows your mobile phone's GPS signal and a "Return Home" function that has the drone fly back to where it took off with one click of a button. The camera is much improved from the HS110 and I'm looking forward to getting nice aerial photos/videos. You can even pivot the camera up and down to get the best angle. I really appreciate the detachable battery that has indicator lights on it letting you know how much battery remains and easily slides in and out of the drone for quick swapping/charging. The battery also lasts much longer with flight times of about 15 minutes (vs 4-8 min of the HS110). The controller also has it's own rechargeable battery which is a nice improvement.

My primary dislike is my smart phone not syncing with the companion app which is a big frustration since I can't see what the drone's camera sees. I noticed another reviewer had this same complaint which was solved by rebooting the phone so I'll try that next time. The drone is designed with the expectation of flying it in conjunction with a smart phone although it is flyable without requiring a phone. Pretty much every time I want to fly it I have to configure the gyros and compass systems which involves holding the drone and spinning around in a circle which adds a couple of minutes of "preflight time". This is necessary due to the many complex features of the HS100 whereas the HS110 is more of a toy that is "turn on and go". The many features of the HS100 means there is a higher learning curve before I'll be comfortable knowing all its "bells and whistles". For instance the controller has 8 different LED indicators which will be great once I'm familiar with them but for now is a little overwhelming. (Headless mode vs GPS mode vs Follow Me mode etc) These are hardly negatives since it just makes me want to fly it more! Also, my old drone can do trick flips which are pretty fun while this drone does not flip. It makes up for it by being a supercharged beast that despite its size can really tear through the air. Lastly, the propellers are packaged in a hidden compartment underneath the Styrofoam box! I contacted customer service thinking I was missing them and she finally told me to look at the bottom of the packaging and there they were! So make sure you have your propellers before you throw out the packaging!

Despite my few complaints, I still feel this is a 5 star product and if you are looking for a high quality drone with a good camera, look no further. This is a beast of a drone and I can't wait to learn how to utilize the many features it offers.

Pros:
*Best Customer Service
*Easy to pilot, good choice for beginners
*Lots of cool features
*Good camera that can pivot up/down
*Detachable powerful battery giving 15min flight time
*Rechargeable controller
*Very sturdy and powerful drone
*Very sleek looking

Cons:
*Companion app doesn't consistently sync with phone
*Doesn't perform trick flips
*Propellers hidden in bottom of packaging
*Too many features to learn! :-)

title: Joy stick controller says " low battery" the HS100 drone would not fly... How I fixed this problem.
text:
Update: 8/4/2019 I originally gave my HS 100 drone a three star but now a 4 star.
1. I have been in contact with at least six Holy Stone members. (Zare was the very patient, and understanding and worked with me directly on my problem. ) All members of their team were concerned about my comments. I thought my controller battery was bad because it always indicated low voltage. I even took it apart and considered replacing the battery. Holy Stone sent me a new HS100 and controller to replace the one I previously could not get to work. I could not get the replacement to work either... the controller still indicated "low battery". Today I watched a short You Tube video about the controller and realized that the problem I was having was not with the controller at all nor the batteries in the controller... " Here is what I had been doing wrong...When I pair the controller to the drone I had always tilted the joy stick to the 12 o'clock position as show in all the videos. The message on my HS pro controller app always stated the battery was low.... hence I could not get the drone to fly.
Here was the fix... when you pair the drone to the controller, slip the left hand joy stick to the 12 o'clock position and also down to the 6 o'clock position (this was stated in the instruction book). At this point you will hear a beep, and the flashing yellow light on the joy stick controller will stop flashing. You HS pro app on your I phone will now read ‚Ä¶ ready to fly. I am sorry to have taken so long to figure all this out. I read the book, three times, watched at least 8 hours of You Tube videos, and have probably 10 follow up letter from the courteous folks at Holy Stone.
I flew my HS 100 today and went through four (now six) different drone batteries each lasting about 10-12 minutes. The joy stick controller never had to be recharged so there was never a problem with the controller battery as I had originally suspected.

Also...Make sure you match the blades A-A and B-B. I accidentally had one blade mismatched and every time it took off it nosed down into the grass. This was an easy fix... I matched the correct the blade, took about two minutes.

I hit a pine tree today and the drone crashed down about ten feet, the camera rolled around on the ground like the head had fallen off:) I reconnected the camera and flew the drone ‚Ä¶ camera and drone worked perfectly.
My wife even took control of the HS 100 on one flight and flew it without ever have touched a controller before...it went well up until she flew the drone out of site, behind a tree, at which time she handed the controller back and said " you take over!"

Still give it a four stars because the camera could be better, and it took awhile to work out the problem that "I" had with the pairing of the drone to the controller... a simple flip of the switch, up and then down... not just up.

Would I recommend the HS100... sure lots of fun. In noticed Holy Stone has an HS 700 out. I will take a look at this one in the future.

To all the staff at Holy Stone, where ever you are... Thanks for being so courteous and helpful.

The HS100 was fun to fly. I am a novice and did not know anything about flying drones. I ordered two extra batteries and extra blades.

title: WATCH FOR TREEEEEEEEEEES!!!
text:
Anyone considering buying a GREAT drone for a beginner, should check this out. Holy Stone has been a great company to deal with so far and to me, that goes a long way. I ordered my drone one evening and received the drone the very next evening. I was shocked that they sent it so quickly! So for my first flight... I read the manual, followed the directions and after charging both the controller and the drone batteries, I was off! I live on 6 1/2 acres of wooded land with a couple of clearings. I started the drone and pressed the automatic takeoff button. It started flying, zipped off the ground and sat there about 6 feet off the ground. It held it's position beautifully! I took control and started flying around and having a great time. Then I zigged when I should have zagged. Lol! I got the drone stuck at the top of a 60' pine tree on the VERY first flight!!

Long story short... With an extension ladder, a pole saw and a very nervous 30 year old nephew, the drone came out of the tree. All the way to the ground. THUD! I just knew it had to be damaged. I ran over and everything was intact and flawless! So I took it to the center of the clearing and baby stepped the controller. It flew AMAZING and the whole family enjoyed watching it fly around effortlessly. The camera rotates up and down if you want to change the camera angle and it looks really good. No, it isn't a 4K image, or even a 1080p image. I could have spent a few more bucks and got a Parrot Bebop 2 but I wanted a drone with great customer service and one that was easy to fly for a beginner. I got both in this drone and it does exactly as it promises. And it came with a lot of spare parts. Propellers, landing gears, extra screws, washers, etc.. The controller works great and the instruction manual is pretty top notch as well.

My only downside to this drone which kept me from giving it 5 stars is the battery. It takes 3-4 hours at least to charge it and you only get 10-15 minutes of flight time. They do send you an extra battery for free though, so thats good. But that charge time... ehhh..... Lets work on that Holy Stone!! Great product and I can't wait to go fly it again tomorrow. LOOK OUT TREES!! LOL!!

title: It flies well and was easy to use
text:
I bought this as a gift for my son for the holidays 5 months ago. We flew it a few times but was limited by cold weather. It flies well and was easy to use. As a beginner drone, I would have highly recommend it. However, we just took it out again and now the remote control battery won't charge. First, I charged it for an hour, then 4 hours, then 24 hours with no result. I called customer service who told me it was my fault the remote was no longer working because I charged it for greater than 3-6 hours??? They told me I had to buy a new battery and directed me to their website. We both looked while I was on the phone and could not find the replacement battery for the HS 100. I was told it must be out of stock. They took my info and will get back to me.

This seems to be an awfully short lifespan for a remote control battery. The battery for the drone appears to be working fine. I'm hoping to get better results from customer service and will amend this review accordingly.

UPDATE: I was almost immediately contacted following the original review (by email) with instructions to correct my issue. This did not involve replacing the battery. It's not clear why the original call didn't give me the same info.

Regardless, as I mentioned above, the drone itself works well, flies well, and hovers well. The beginners mode allows my son to fly it without fear getting too far. He did fly it into a tree however and it fell a good 30 feet to the ground. There are plenty of replacement parts included which I used for this crash. We enjoy the camera and have checked out our roof and neighborhood from above.

title: gps home mode is amazing

once you get better go to the app upper right hand corner and adjust how far you want it to go. also you can adjust return height i have mine set at 30 meters (higher than any trees around ) when you hit the home key it will fly strait up to your set height then horizontally to home than down . im going to stay in gps mode as it will always come back .
im glad i bought extra batteries off the start as they take 4-7 hours to charge .

Overall, it works as advertised. Great starter drone for people getting into flying.

text:
UPDATED REVIEW
After posting my review, Holy Stone reached out with me to verify the exact details. After a brief discussion, they took matters above customer service and replaced the item, as opposed to discrediting my input. The 5 stars relate to this, and also the overall experience with the drone. It is almost ‚Äústupid-proof‚Äù, almost. (You can‚Äôt fix stupid).

Regardless, thank you for the wonderful experience and attention to our unfortunate initial experience.

I would give a 5 star, but only if it didnt fall out of the sky. It says it will return if the battery goes low (automatically), but it dropped onto the concrete and more drone.

Prior to that, It is a great beginner intro unit. It will exceed expectations, but watch the battery and use the landing feature to avoid needless hard landings.

title: Not bad for the price but far from great.
text:
Range is nowhere near 500 meters. Looses stability and can crash when descending. Camera is good but it is hard to see anything on a phone screen when flying. Batteries have a short flight time - maybe 10 mins. Remote looses connection to the drone often. A better antenna would be nice.

Specs are exaggerated by the company but it is a decent beginner drone.

The first one had a GPS malfunction and flew away when I hit the RTH button. Amazon replaced it and I have not had any GPS problems with the new one.

Update: New one eventually failed to connect to the remote and now will not work. The company finally contacted me years later to offer me a refund.
