title: Detailed Review from a New Drone Flyer - Feature Rich at a Good Value Price - BUT with a really lousy camera
text:
This is going to be a bit of a detailed review. For those who want to get right to the point, this is a feature-rich, well constructed drone that is excellent for beginners and experienced flyers alike. Now for a bit more detail.

To start, I am a novice drone flyer but I have a lot of friends that have been flying drones for years. I've heard stories of drones flying away never to be seen again so I was looking for a drone that was beginner friendly but that was feature rich enough that as I get better as a flyer, my drone can continue to grow with me and in six months, I'm not looking to upgrade. Likewise, I didn't want to break the bank. I wasn't even sure how much I was going to like flying drones (a LOT) and in case I crashed or lost the drone, didn't want to be out a lot of cash. I received a lot of recommendations to get a DJI but didn't want to spend that kind of money. Looking at the feature set, camera and flight time of the HS100, I thought it was a very good value for the price. Lastly, my main reason for getting a drone was to take aerial photographs and video for construction planning and real estate marketing.

The components were well organized in the box and securely packaged. From first glance, you could tell this was probably a well thought out product. I was surprised and very happy to see that that HS100 comes with a replacement set of rotor blades and landing gear. I've flown RC planes before and as I've mentioned, heard plenty of drone crash stories so I know that at some point, these spares are going to come in handy.

Assembly is a quick and easy and Holy Stone provides two small screwdrivers that are the only needed tools. That was another nice touch since some of the screws are very small and you would need an eyeglass screwdriver to install them. So far so good. I liked the build quality and look of the drone. Drones are a cool thing and they should look cool :) and this one does. The remote control is very lightweight which is nice so you aren't lugging around a clunky remote while you are flying. The physical integration of the remote with my iPhone was seamless.

Next I tried to setup the drone for the first time and had difficulty because the pre flight instructions are not very clear. At least they weren't to me. This is the only knock on this drone so far and I would have given it a 4-star rating but I called Holystone's tech support and to my total surprise - someone answered the phone. They emailed me a link to a brief YouTube video showing a preflight tutorial that was easy to use and had me flying in minutes. Nice job guys. I'd still like to have more documentation on things like: Can you fly the drone without a cell phone connected and if so, how? Can you take off and land manually (not in the auto mode)?

Flying was a total blast. As previously mentioned, this is my first drone so I don't have any comparison but I've flown remote controlled airplanes before and this is MUCH easier. Auto take off and landing is a fantastic feature for beginners - it's going to save a lot of broken parts - and it makes flying the drone easy. All the controls are well placed on the console and the drone is very stable in flight. Take your hands off the controls and it essentially hovers in place. The stabilization is very effective and I had the drone zipping around in front of my house in minutes. The controls to me have just the right amount of sensitivity - the drone is very nimble but if you press one of the joysticks all the way down, the drone doesn't just go flying off out of control. I live on the beach and it was a windy day so I started in the lee of the house and kept the HS100 close to the ground. I wanted to make sure the wind wasn't going to take the drone or cause a crash. Then I flew it up into the wind above the top of the roof of my house and I was surprised to see how well it handled in the wind. One tip: don't try and take pictures or especially video on a windy day. As stabilized as the drone is, it still bounced around in the wind and you end up with off axis images and really jerky video.

As with all drones, flight time isn't as long as I would want it to be. I didn't time my flights but it seemed like that batteries lasted 10-15 minutes. I ordered this with a spare battery and would highly recommend you do too. In fact, a couple of spares would be a good thing because the last thing you want it to get into flying and then have to quit right as you're starting to have fun. The batteries take a while to charge (a couple of hours).

I've just started using the camera and video features and as noted, they don't work well in a lot of wind. I'm waiting for a calm morning and then will fly up high and shoot some footage and stills. I tried playing with the camera pan feature but don't think I've been able to get it to work yet. As I do more flying - higher altitude and longer distance, and take more imagery and video. I'll update this review.

As of now, I'm very happy with this drone and think it provided the right set of features for me - a beginner that wants to be able to grow into more advanced flying. And the price was right.

First Update: I've been flying the drone for a week now and can definitively say it's great for a beginner. In GPS mode, with the auto takeoff and landing, it's fairly hard to crash. In addition, when in this mode and you take your hands off the controls, the drone comes to a hover in place. So if things are getting out of control, all you need to do is let go of the controls and the drone will come to a stop and hover. Then you could even hit the autoland button if you needed. It is very stable and relatively easy to fly and I was surprised at how well it did in windy conditions. The four engines produce enough force to allow the drone to fly into a stiff breeze and keep it steady in hover even when windy. I live on the beach and it's windy here a lot. Yet, it's highly maneuverable. Again, I don't have a lot of other drones to reference but this is fun to fly and can zip around. I disabled the beginner mode so I could take it higher and farther out and had no issues. I like the look of the drone and so far it's been sturdy. I've only had two harder landings with no damage or issues. If you really want to enjoy this drone, you need at least one additional battery (2 total) or two would be better (3 total). It takes a couple hours to charge batteries and with only a single battery, you're done in 15 minutes or less.

I've tried the non GPS mode which requires a lot more attention to flying but is still pretty stable. In addition, I used follow mode which worked great and the drone followed me as I rolled down the street on my beach cruiser. I would doubt that this drone could keep up with me down a trail on my mountain bike but if you are out jogging or walking, it will do the job. More to come as I get into the photo and video.

Photos and Video: One of the main reasons I purchased this drone was to take aerial photography. If you want more detail, read on but in short the camera on this drone is really awful. 720p sounds great and the Holystone website doesn't give more detail other than it's "epic" but I would really say epically bad. For background, I've worked as a professional photographer and wanted to use the drone to shoot aerials of real estate. When I first looked at the captured images, I thought I had done something wrong. They were incredibly grainy and and lacked detail. I hadn't seen anything like that in a digital image in years which isn't surprising. Then I did more research. For comparison, the camera in this drone is under one megapixel and a current iPhone is 12MP. The original iPhone in 2007 was 3MP. There are other things that go into image quality than just the resolution of the sensor including lens size and quality and processing engine and both are weak on the HS100. Images lack good contrast, saturated colors and it has a problem with even reasonably high dynamic ranges. Add that all together and you get some lousy images. I'm very disappointed in the poor performance of the camera especially given that it was one of my primary needs in a drone. My fault for not doing more hard research up front but the website purports the imagery to be hi-def and epic and I thought epic would be good enough.

With that said, I'm dropping my review to Four Stars. This is still a very feature rich drone that is friendly for beginners and more advanced drone fliers. It is really fun to fly. Just don't get it if you are looking to do a lot of photography or videography.

title: Quality product here

title: STURDY & FUN
text: STURDY & FUN!!  I originally bought this drone to use as one that I could learn to fly manually.  I recently bought two Phantom 4 Pro drones, but I need to be able to fly manually before I put those in the air.  I didn't have very high expectations for the Holy Stone because the price is low, and I was pleasantly surprised.  The machine takes off easily, and the GPS keeps it in place quite well.  It was pretty breezy when I launched this little jewel for the first time.  I have to say that it has very good manners.  It is easy to control and it's predictable.  Of course the most important flying characteristic of any drone is the FUN FACTOR.  Again, this machine surprised me.  It's actually a blast to fly!  I didn't time my flights, but I think that I got somewhere in the neighborhood of 15 minutes, and as I said, it was pretty breezy.  I bought a couple of extra batteries.  You'll want to as well because they do take a while to charge.  My "smart" phone display is not that bright, so I mostly left it in my pocket and flew by keeping the drone in my sight.  That's another practice point, since I'm going for my Part 107.  The "follow me" works pretty well.  The camera is not stabilized, but the video wasn't bad.  The thing that impressed me the most is that this thing is STURDY.  Being brand new to flying quads, I crashed the Holy Stone into bushes, trees, and the side of a shed several times.  Not a single thing ever broke.  Each time, I picked it up, reset the compass, and took right off again.  For some reason, I needed to reset the compass several times.  That was really the only annoyance, and it was a minor one.  It sounds like a weed eater when it's going into a bush, but the props are flexible enough to take a pounding without serious damage.  After the beating that this thing took from my first flights, it still looks good, with only minor scuffs.  The build quality is pretty darned good.  It was easy to assemble and the instructions are decent.  The props do have to be screwed on, and you'll need to avoid the coffee before you do it, as you'll need steady hands.  If you are looking for a fun drone that flies well and makes an awesome trainer for more advanced machines, this is the one.  If you are a good flyer already and want a fun little "grab it quick" drone or one that you can start your kid on, then this is the one.  Have fun!
Ok

Syncing up with GPS satellites was very instantaneous, if you follow the directions (just don't get dizzy). I would definitely have this on the Christmas list for family members interested into getting into drones.. Its not a stocking stuffer, because its quite large. This drone is Fast, and Stable... I actually took it out when the winds were gusting 17knots and it remained quite stable. Definitely do not do that if you are a beginner. With that being said!! I was truly amazed at its performance. title: Awesome features for the price
text: Very easy to setup and launch. Great for beginners.....just follow the video instructions and you should have no issues. I highly recommend for those just getting into the drone scene.

title: Very easy learning curve
text: The Holy Stone HS 100 is my first drone.  My experience to date has been wonderful with this drone.  Having never operated a drone prior to this one I was amazed at the ease of flight!  I assumed their would be a learning curve but the GPS capability on the HS 100 virtually eliminated any learning curve.  I've now flown my drone 5 times since receiving it and feel fully confident in my abilities to control this drone.  At some point I may move to a more advanced one but have decided to wait until the battery capacities allow for 40-60 minutes of flight time which I believe will be available within the next year or so.  Until then I plan to continue to enjoy my Holy Stone HS100 Drone!

title: Great for beginners!
text: I'm happy with this drone.  It's the first drone I've ever bought, and it's really great for the price! Very easy to fly! It struggles a bit in high winds, but I would imagine most drones do.

title: Great drone for the money
text: This drone is a pleasure to fly and handles very well. Enjoyable to fly. Longer battery life would be a welcome improvement.

title: The assembly institutions were easy to follow and in just a few minutes it ...
text:
The drone arrived on schedule as they said. After opening the box and inspecting all the parts everything was there.
The assembly institutions were easy to follow and in just a few minutes it was together.
Battery came 90% charged. Camera was already connected with sd card installed.
After doing all the calibration, I was able to get the unit to hover.

title: Great product!
text:
Great product! Well made and easy to use, even for beginners. Works well even in slightly windy conditions, and the GPS and "return home" features eliminate worries of losing the drone.
Holy Stone customer service has been very helpful and courteous, promptly returning both phone calls and emails.
I would recommend this product to anyone in the market for a video drone.

title: Great Value
text: Just received, everything was clear and easy to assemble. Currently this is a total 5/5

title: Great First Impression
text: Great first impression. I‚Äôve had several smaller, $50 drones and this one puts them to shame. GPS held the drone in a ~10mph wind, autolands gently and very impressive. Takes a little time to put the propellers on the drone but not a big deal. Camera has great quality for what I needed in a recreational drone, and paired easily with the phone. This drone has all the features I was looking for in a larger drone but without the $1,000 price tag. Looking forward to getting it out in an open area.

title: Best drone you can buy for this price
text:
I ordered the HS100 drone because it was rated the best "bang for your buck" drone in this caliber, but it has features that you would compare to and find in higher priced models. Right out of the box you can tell the drone body is a high quality flexible plastic that will allow it to survive some hits. Setup is simple, but necessary. Besides decreasing the size of the box it serves as a guide to teach you how to replace the propellers and propeller guards which is just a fact of life with any drones. It's easy and all tools and parts are included along with spare landing gear, propellers and crash guards. The product page doesn't mention it, but the camera is on a motorized gimbal that you can adjust in flight. The product page says you can adjust it 90 degrees, but I really wasn't sure if it was something you adjust before you fly. I was pleased to see you can move it in flight from the controller. Overall this is a great beginner drone that you would not be quick to replace even as you advance in skill. There are not really any features you would miss. The GPS is a great feature for keeping your drone where you want it, but you can turn it off and they offer a Trim mode which allows you to balance the drone in flight to keep it from drifting in any direction.
The drone itself is powerful but easy to fly. It defaults to a beginner mode that limits you to height and distance, but you can easily turn it off in the phone app once you feel comfortable. Headless mode makes the drone fly in relation to you, turn that off and it flies in the direction the drone is facing, it's the difference between flying through looking at the video screen or looking at your drone to fly it. One way might make more sense to others, but I think Headless might be the easiest to understand - you want the drone to back away from you you push forward or up on the stick, if you want it to come back to you then you pull back. Without headless mode pushing forward or up on the stick and it will fly whichever way the drone is facing.
Calibrating the drone is quick and easy. It involves rotating the drone in 360 degrees in the horizontal and vertical, and the bright flight LED's let you know if you were successful. It takes seconds really once you know what to do. From the controller itself you can adjust the speed of the drone with a dial as well as another dial to adjust the tilt of the 120 degree view 720 HD camera. Video can be viewed in the app and also recorded and saved to the included micro SD card. You also get a card reader that allows you to easily transfer video to your computer. GPS, one touch takeoff and landing. Follow mode. Headless mode. Return to home on one button or low battery or if the transmitter disconnects. HD video and still camera. Great service. I am not sure what else you can ask for at this price.

title: Perfect drone to start on
text: This is a great product perfect for beginners very easy to fly never once had a problem

title: Nice beginner drone. Easy setup.
text: Drone arrived quickly . Assembly was very simple with the instructions. Battery had about 3/4 charge and a USB charging cable was provided. Setting up the drone was simple and easy to follow. My first few flights was a little disappointing but live in the mountains and gps is somewhat weak The gps signal on the controller kept saying week signal. Drone would fly for a few minutes then descend quickly. Move to a better clearing strong gps signal solved problem. Flights now are smooth excellent controls with drone fast response. After about 6 flight took it off beginner mode. Controls really improved even follow me mode worked without flaw. Very pleased with this drone. My first drone after reading several reviews went with this one. Battery life not bad getting 14 to 16 minutes flight time. Tested continuous flight around football field on the second setting on the left wheel control speed setting at 50 to 75 meters altitude. When the battery meter turned red with one bar I pressed the return home button and landed exactly at takeoff point times 15m 42sec very pleased. Camera works fine nice video  but always forget to press the record button getting better at that. Very satisfied with my purchase. Battery takes some time to charge but extra batteries will help with that.

title: Awesome drone
text: The drone arrived quickly and was well packaged. This drone is awesome! It flies smoothly and it's easy to control. The phone bracket allows you to clearly see what the camera is capturing. The camera records in 1080p which is great for all types of applications. Very happy with this purchase!

title: Very nice but! I would recommend
text: It actually is a really nice drone, compared to my Dji mavix or mavic mini it is pretty good, especially for the price! Wish the battery time was longer but they will send you another batter for free so that is absolutely awesome, quick and easy to setup and assemble!

title: The instructions were simple and easy to follow
text: I just want to start by saying that I have tried other Drone's.  Furthermore all Drones are not created equal.  My experiences have been frustration after frustrations at simply getting the darned devices to fly.  To hover.  To respond to the basic of commands.  I all but given up at attempting to enter the world of the Drone pilot.  Having limited resources I was reluctant to buy another dud.  From the opening of the box I knew this had the potential of being exactly what the doctor ordered.  The Staff is friendly, courteous, professional, and prompt in response to any inquiries.  The instructions were simple and easy to follow.  I was up and running in no time at all.  The Return Home and Follow Me commands are marvelous.  It's like have my own eye in the sky.  To see who might be following me.  The only thing is, and this is not really a knock on the HS100, I wished the batteries lasted longer.  I would recommend purchasing several spare batteries as this will make your Droning experience that much more awesome.  To all the folks at Holy Stone I want to give a BIG THUMBS UP!!!  Job well done.

title: Good product!
text: Easy and fun to manouver.

title: Holy Stone
text: Very good and easy to use

title: Quality drone for beginners
text: I purchased this for my 11yo. Assembly was relatively straightforward and instructions easy to follow. Watched couple of YouTube clips and we were ready to head out into the yard. Took a couple of goes to complete calibration but that was us missing a step in the process rather than a fault with the machine. We like the stability and responsiveness and the auto take off and land function is great. Camera seems to be good quality and the phone app is easy to navigate. Looking forward to getting it out into a wide open space to test it out further. The battery pack life of 15 mins and and 3 hour charge time is the only drawback so having an 2nd battery would definitely be an advantage.

title: Good for beginners and experienced operators.
text:
If you take your time with set-up and follow the instructions you will be more then happy with this drone.
The transmitter is easy to use and camera works well. Overall a very solid unit!

title: Great product
text: Love ease of use. A great product we‚Äôd highly recommend!

title: Best in class
text: My 4 stars is only because this was my first real drone I ordered two extra batteries for more air time plugged them all in USB ports to charge and one battery never finished when others did and after careful inspection I notice this battery looked a little swelled I cannot say for certain if it was battery that came with drone or extra one purchased but delivery was fine just upset I only have two batteries With that being say I love this thing by far the best drone in its class

title: Drone
text: Perfect

title: Five Stars
text: Great product, easy to learn and fly, automated takeoff and landing are great

title: Still Learning the Ropes
text: I purchased this drone as a present for the Hubby.  The original one was lost during shipping, so I ordered a replacement and Amazon covered the next day shipping to get the item here asap.  Hubby has flown it several times and is learning how to use it.  A few things off the bat, I didn't realize the flying time was so short per battery (totally on me) so I should have ordered an extra.  By the time we got through the basics, we had to charge and a spare would have been nice.  Beginner mode is helpful to get the controls down.  The low battery feature is nice because it comes back to point of take off if the battery gets too low.  Overall, we are happy with this purchase and look forward to utilizing it fully!

title: Great for Beginners
text: I've been wanting a drone for a while and the wife got me this one for Christmas. After reading the Instructions I was a bit Intimidated but once I started flying it I got the hang of it really quickly. I am really enjoying the advanced features at an easy level. The beginners mode also makes it much easier to learn with reduced risk of damage.

title: Good entry to mid level drone with lots of good options.
text: This was my first drone purchase.  I took advantage of Prime day and pulled the trigger. I am  very happy with this Holy Stone GPS FPV RC Drone HS100 with Camera Live Video 1080P HD and GPS Return Home Quadcopter.  I had no problems with shipping and the setup was no problem.  I've flown it about 8 times and had no mechanical issues. It worked as advertised,  The auto return for low battery may have saved it on one flight  (Good option for beginner).  My only disappointment is the battery life,  I can only get about 10 minutes of fling time and it takes over an hour to charge.

title: Everything they say and more
text: This drone went from the box to controlled flying by a complete novice in 30 minutes!!! It was extremely easy to operate and the images are fantastic. When a problem with the controller developed, Holy Stone's customer support was absolutely the best.

title: Very helpful!!
text: Thank you for all the help!! Great business with holystone!!

title: Easy to fly and FUN!
text: This drone is very easy to fly, takes great images and video and their support people are fantastic! Highly recommend!

title: THE BEST $300 DRONE EVER
text: [[VIDEOID:cd478ef96f68c6a4f2dbb95bb717bcc9]] I just bought this drone and it is absolutely fantastic. The GPS is also great. Follow me mode is something I liked too. The camera on it though is just fantastic. I've made some pretty good videos with this thing, and I love it. Everything about it is fantastic. The attention to detail that holy stone has used when making this drone is phenomenal. I really really love this drone, and you should too. After using it, I can say that this is the best $300 dollar drone ever with confidence.

title: ... crash) lesser quality drones I decided to make a better purchase after having one of those lesser quality drones ...
text: After I learned how to fly (and crash) lesser quality drones I decided to make a better purchase after having one of those lesser quality drones fly away. A majority of my research had Holy Stone ranked in the top three. People on several of the drone pages that I am a follower of recommended the HS100. I have to say after receiving the drone I was quite impressed.  It has the look of a stealth bomber (color, not shape). Once I was able to fly it I was also impressed with the power and control. The only down side I have found is how long it takes to charge the battery (took 3.5 hours) but that is why they sale extra batteries. If you are just getting into drones I would HIGHLY recommend getting the HS100!

title: We love it
text: We love the drone! Excremental product!

title: When a beginner practice 4 feet off the ground in an open area.
text: Once assembled it was fairly easy to opperate -- I started 4 feet off the ground to learn controls and speed. I did get a like over confident and hit a tree. Started over and stayed close to the ground. Then toke it on camping trips and got some great pictures.

title: Great drone for the money
text: Great drone for the money lots of fun to fly and had pretty good quality camera, had a problem with the remote but the customer service was awesome and took care of it right away

text: Love it came on time was easy to put together very easy to fly all controls work as they should flys great great video I would buy another if I needed to

title: Great Features
text: Just as advertised.  Great features for the price.  I am a beginner drone pilot and I could easily pick it up and fly it.

title: Graet Out of the Box Drone
text: This was very easy to assemble , the instructions were great but I also watched 10 Youtube videos as I was a very nervous first timer - Work great - Just need controller time - I would definitely recommend to friends -

title: Great value and features for those just getting into the drone hobby!
text:
Being new to the drone hobby, I was leery about making a sizable investment only to watch it crash and break upon my first attempt to fly it. The price point of the Holy Stone HS100 was attractive, especially once I read the detailed product description and understood the features it offers like, Smart Return-to-Home, Follow-Me, Alititude Hold, and One-key for take off and land operations. After understanding how those features work, I realized that the HS100 was tailor made for my needs, directly addressed my concerns, and gave me the confidence to enter the drone hobby.

Thus far, it has been everything I had hoped for. I am having the time of my life! Have not crashed once!! I heartily recommend the HS100 as a reasonably priced, yet highly capable entry level drone.

title: Outstanding Drone!
text: Awesome!!!! We have bought other drones in the past and none compare to this one. Easy to set up and fly. My 13 year old daughter flies it on s daily basis. Definitely worth the money!

title: Exceeds expectations
text: Bought this one for my 14yo for Christmas.  We've been through a couple of other drones that just wasn't up to par with this one.  There was an immediate noticeable difference.  It was quick and easy to figure out and calibrate.  And as soon as he started with it, i could tell by the look on his face that he enjoyed this WAY better than the others.  The camera is of pretty decent quality... i think.  I only say i think because he hasn't used it to capture or record anything although the capability is there and we are able to monitor the camera while he flies and it looks great.  Completely satisfied with this one.

title: Easy to get in the air
text: Excellent drone.  Easy to assemble and get into the air quickly.  Well worth it.

title: Use common sense and be safe at all times, and be aware of your surroundings.
text: This is an amazing drone it's well put together, the instructions was straight forward. Once I put it together, then read the instructions calibrate the drone down loaded app the gps app to my smart phone, received the GPS signal an away it went.this is my first experience with a drone, the holy stone hs100 is awesome.

title: Very easy to fly and control
text: Very easy to fly and control. i am a total newbie, never flew a drone before, but I was immediately able to take off and land without crashing thanks to a ‚Äúbeginner mode‚Äù. It really helps to practice without risking losing or crashing the drone. I am learning and increasing my flight duration every time. If there is one thing I would change I would ask for a higher quality camera!

title: Excellent customer service
text:
I received this drone as a gift from one of my friends. This is an excellent beginner drone. It's very basic, but also has some amazing tech inside. I love the automatic take-off and landing feature. I also love how well it streams live-feed. The range isn't huge, but it's pretty decent for the price. The controls are relatively easy too. I would highly suggest only using this drone in very open areas with little to no obstruction.
The Camera gimble on my was defective when I received the product. I am giving a 5-star review because the customer service was very quick. Within the same day I emailed my complaint to the company they got back and kindly asked if I could take a video of the problem to confirm there was an issue with the camera. They are currently sending me a new one as of today. I'm excited to venture into this new hobbie!

title: Great Drone
text: Great drone at good price.  Customer service was prompt and very helpful.

title: Definitely worth the money!
text: We really debated back and forth about buying this for our teenage son. Sometimes boys can be destructive. This thing is amazing, the quality of picture is not what I was expecting! It‚Äôs better! Not hard at all to fly, although I didn‚Äôt get to fly it long since he took over and has loved it ever since. I‚Äôm so happy with got this! Best gift ever

title: Good first drone!
text:
I got this for my boyfriend for Christmas, his first drone. It was too cold when we first assembled it to take it outside, so we have finally got it out this last week. After finally getting it connected (which drove me insane, also don't do it in the house...) and it attacked him on the first flight, he is now having a blast with this thing!

There is a learning curve, but a little bit of practice and he's got it.

title: Travel distance and battery time.
text:
It comes with all necessary parts plus some spares. I thought propellers were missing at beginning, maybe instruction should say propeller blades are located at bottom of the box,
Easy to assemble and propeller was marked A B A B so easy to spot.
Free smart phone app was very useful.
Setup instructions was easy enough, but it could be little better with picture illustration.
Overall good product with long enough range to video recording.
Just one thing is if it was equipped with extra battery, it would make user more happy.

title: Solid Drone for the price. Recomended a must for beginner
text: I bought this on prime day. thought it might be a little tough to fly since I've never flown a drone before. i was pleasantly surprised! it was fairly easy to operate. all controls work smooth. video is about a 5 out of 10 seems a little too saturated. i couldn't get the drone battery level and remote battery level on the app to work. i wasn't able to see live video either. i may have to do a little more research to get these thins working. definitely a must for a beginner who doesn't want to drop too much cash to crash lol. battery is 12 mins thats the other minus but fir the price you cant beat this set up.

title: Great Beginner Drone
text: Our daughter received this for Christmas.  It's perfect because it has multiple settings allowing the user to get used to smaller radius's before giving a kid full access.  The other nice thing is the auto launch and land that's also a wonderful feature.  The only complaint that I have is that occasionally when starting the unit you have to rotate it around.  Most of the time it works well but sometime it has issues homing in on the starting GPS location before it will launch.  Overall  I'd give it 4.5 stars.  If they could fix the startup there then I think this would be a solid 5.  The battery last much longer than the other drones for the price range.

title: My first Drone
text: I received this Drone as a gift. I am so thrilled and happy with the easy set up and instructions. There was no instruction to "throttle down" to land and shut off the drone. It was very easy to link to my cell phone to take pictures and vides. Overall, very easy to set up and use. I am very happy with this and HIGHLY recommend.

title: What a fantastic drone for the price
text: What a fantastic drone for the price! I bought this for my 12 year old and he loves it. We have flown it quite a bit even in wind and cold and it performs great. The holder for the cell phone is kind of flimsy, but we don't use it a majority of the time and the video and pictures are great. I would highly recommend this drone for having a great time. The only drawback is the batteries are only 15 minutes of flight time so we burn 3 batteries pretty quick and the charge time is quite lengthily.

title: Good customer service
text: Easy, works as it says

title: Great drone and easy to fly.
text: Great drone. It is the best one for the money. Very easy to fly and has a lot of capabilities. The battery last a long time. The quality of this drone is acceptional.

title: Replacement parts should be the same or better than the original, not lower quality
text:
Well here is my update.... got everything set up, drone took off and landed and flew for about 3 minutes when it stopped because the controller was dead. Charged the controller again and it lasts about 1 minutes now before it dies. Called customer service and they keep disconnecting my call after about 5 minutes on hold. Waiting to hear back on answer from email on what the process is for returning the drone. Which is a shame because most if the reviews were so good.

I'm starting with 3 stars because I haven't been able to fly it yet. So I'll update when I do. It arrived with a bad battery (wouldn't charge) so I called and emailed customer service and after several days of back and forth was able to convince them the battery was no good. So they finally sent me a new battery and I got it today. It is not the same battery it came with. The original, as advertised battery was a 7.4v 3500mAh, the one they sent me is only 2500mAh which means the flying time will be shorter by about 5 to 7 minutes. Which is a lot when you are talking about 18 minutes of use per battery, but at least it will charge. I'll give it a few tests flights and update if needed. I wish they would have sent me a replacement battery that was the same as advertised. I would contact them again, but I don't want to wait another 2 weeks before I can fly the drone.

title: Didn‚Äôt know what I was missing
text: My first drone. Fianc√©e bought it for me as a Christmas gift. Two words. Love it.  Make sure to read manual and watch tutorials on learning to fly. Only had two flight so far and I took it very easy as to not have any wrecks or damage to drone. As soon as weather is agreeable outside it‚Äôll be going up again. Definitely need spare batteries. 15 minutes when you having so much fun is to short. I‚Äôll definitely be getting spare batteries. Can‚Äôt emphasize that enough. Great drone. LOVE IT.

title: Shadow Drone  flys great
text: This is a great drone to learn how to fly . ALTITUDE HOLD WAS A BIG HELP..I've crashed drone that I've had in the past because they diddnt have the features this drone has . I LOVE IT !

title: Good purchase

title: 5 stars
text: Lots of fun. Wifey loves it!

title: Good drone and love how everything fits in a storage place
text: This was bought for a 10 year old birthday present. Though it says it for 14+, he did a great job flying it. Overall it is a great drone. Small enough to fly inside if you have a large area. It was great outside but you can't fly up too high because if the wind is blowing it will just take it. I love how you can put everything back in a case when you are done using the drone. This is very important to me and my son. He likes to be organized so this was a definite plus in buying this drone. The only reason why i couldn't out 5 stars is that the guards come off very easily. I am glad they are on the drone to protect the blades but after flying it several times he already lost one guard. This drone does come with extra blades but not extra guards. I wish that was added to the bundle. Maybe something to consider for the next one. I know we will spend many hours on it.

title: Great beginner drone
text: The HS 100 is a great beginner drone. I crashed it on its first flight when I accidentally use the GPS to return to the launch site and it flew itself into a tree.  Totally my fault but Holy Stone was great and replaced the camera in a timely manner.  Amazing customer service.  Would recommend.

title: Great so far
text: I like this drone a lot, it works well. The GPS works well and I especially like the altitude hold feature, I've always had a hard time with other drones keeping them in the air, altitude hold fixes that. title: HolyStone & GPS !
text:
[[VIDEOID:f0ae6bf1fca64be41240be3d68a7837]] [[ASIN:B074YYVXQH Holy Stone HS100 FPV RC Drone with Camera Live Video and GPS Return Home Quadcopter with Adjustable Wide-Angle 720P HD WIFI Camera- Follow Me, Altitude Hold, Intelligent Battery, Long Control Distance]]

I admit I was very skeptical about this GPS model. But once again, with the outstanding customer support they are known for, I have accepted the HS100 a big step up for them, with a legit entry into this market. I have seen some reviews posted by others and will not cover it all, from un-boxing to first flight. I am familiar with other GPS drones for a reference point. First and foremost, Fly Safe! Open area! Un-populated, especially with this one, she can be a bit finicky. Maintain visual contact and never rely totally on GPS. This goes for all Drones. What I like About it? The stow away phone holder, fits my Galaxy S8 with Otterbox! RTH feature has worked every time flawlessly. The weight adds considerable stability in windy conditions. Being able to adjust camera angle in flight is huge step for HS. Follow me mode works close range well, just keep her close for remote range. The variable speed is great. I was pleasantly surprised by how fast and nimble she is. The rechargeable Li-ion remote holds charge very well. The option for GPS or not is great for "seat of the pants" flying. Photo's and Video's are stable and clear. Line up your shot b4 you hit record. The amount of information on app and controller is just the right amount for situational awareness. I strongly suggest that b4 each flight you at least do the gyro calibration! She responds much better. Gyro and compass Calibrations every time you relocate and fly. I do both every-time/every-flight. It only takes a second. Make a Pre-Flight checklist. I don't use Headless Mode so cannot comment on that. The Trim W/O GPS, once you learn it, works very well. Nice touch. In a Nut Shell, HS has stepped up their game! This is a sophisticated Drone and that takes patience and learning her before you go all out flying her. Watch the tutorials, read the Manual. Customer support is OUTSTANDING and will answer any question. If you are not used to this much info she gives you at once, TAKE IT SLOW AND EASY. If you do, This Quad-copter will serve you well and keep your investment safe as you learn more and more. One issue I have is the battery charge time. It has a good flight time, but it just takes, to me, an excessive time to charge. I recommend two batteries for this reason.

title: Fantastic (Easy-To-Use) First Camera Drone
text:
Really impressed with this drone. Bought it last year and it still works perfectly without any replacement parts or repair needed (and I had some accidental collisions and hard landings.)

It's feature rich, too. The drone can follow you, hover, and land itself. The setup is easy (I was using it not an hour after charging my battery and remote control.) I've never had any problem with the connection to my phone or anything like that.

Depending on usage the batteries last only about 10-20 minutes each (the way I use it.) I usually go out with multiple batteries.

Again, fantastic. Highly recommended for new drone users.

title: The automatic takeoff and landing works great except if you hold the button more than 2 ...
text: Received the unit as a birthday present on time. I do have some experience in flying drones but there is some things that this unit does not live up to in the price range. The camera is only a 720p so the pictures do not live up to the expectations at this price point. Additionally the flight time is only around 12 minutes and then takes 3-6 hours to recharge and that's a lot of down time for a unit of this caliber. The price of an additional battery is around $40:00 which pushes this unit well over the $300 dollar level. The automatic takeoff and landing works great except if you hold the button more than 2 seconds (beginners panic when the unit did not immediately respond to emergency landing) the unit goes into "emergency stop" and falls from whatever altitude it is at. Compass calibration looks like it has to be done every time the battery is changed. . Since my original review of this product and the HOLY Stone excellent follow up on the battery issue I have improved my rating to 4 stars . Additionally their customer service has clarified several of the early perceptions of the product performance.

title: Nice stable drone
text:
[[VIDEOID:8f8b4851a840f5a5bd61b4dc038b19a5]] I own the Holy Stone F181 Chaser and the Holy Stone HS 110 W toy class drones. The HOLY STONE HS 100 (GPS) is a major upgrade in the Holy Stone toy class fleet. This drone is much larger than the other two.
Unofficially, on my kitchen scale, this unit weighs in at about 1.5 pounds, without prop guards, compared to 4 to 5 ounces for the other two, making this a much more stable unit. The HS 100 has GPS capability added. This feature eliminates the issue of the drone drifting away in windy conditions and allows the drone to hold steady with regard to altitude and distance from the controller. This allows the pilot to concentrate more on taking photographs than on trying to control drone flight.
The camera is motorized and can be moved up and down. This action is controlled from the transmitter. The 720P HD WIFI camera takes clear still and video pictures. The camera, though, does not have a gimbal. As a result, with the GPS feature continuously adjusting the drones‚Äô position the fixed position camera mount makes for a lot of movement on videos.
This drone has a much bigger battery (15 mins flight time) and larger motors. This drone can fly to the 400‚Äô U.S. altitude legal limit and 500 meter distance from the controller. At these distances, it is impossible to fly the drone by visual observation. You can‚Äôt see it let alone tell which direction it‚Äôs going. You need to fly here using the viewer screen on your smart phone. This is where a good WIFI connection (which this drone has) and the return to home features are critical. When you are at these extreme distances, all that needs to be done is to press the return to home button. The drone will fly back to its take off point and automatically land itself. The same thing occurs if the drone loses contact with the controller or starts running out of power. The risk of loss is greatly reduced here. I would recommend this drone to a friend.

title: Learning Curve but worth it
text: First, we've only had for a week so the curve isn't steep.  The instruction manual was probably translated so you have to read between the lines in a few spots or try a couple different methods.  The video was also helpful but the manual was better for us when calibrating.  Our <13 year old could use it.  She games.  The beginning mode and return features were perfect since we didn't have to worry about losing it or it diving to the ground from such a great height.  We quickly learned you need to be sure when you hit the return button that the drone has an unimpeded straight line between where it is located and where it first took off.  As an aside (and certainly nothing to do with the product rating), we also had a little bit of a learning curve in relation to where we could fly the drone.  We were visiting family and our family did not think they lived within 5 miles of an airport.  When we arrived we used the recommended B4uFly app and found out we were too close to a local airport.

title: Excellent GPS Drone, Fast, Stable, and Powerful!
text:
[[VIDEOID:cf71c1499cee4641f9411c1b6ad213d0]] This is a Holy Stone! This means Awesome Customer Service. They have a great community on their Facebook page for assisting fliers, especially first time flyers. The flight time is about 12 to 15 minutes and the drone weighs 672.8 grams (1.48 pounds) without the prop guards. You do need to register this drone with the FAA if flying in the United States. While the instructions may be a little confusing, there are videos available on the Holy Stone Website and tech support to work thru anything you might not understand. I've enclosed a video taken by the HS100 and a Pix from it so you can see the quality of the 720P camera.

The one key takeoff and landing functions work well. It also has some great emergency features Return to Home on low battery, Loss of signal, or by pressing the Smart RTH button on the remote. Keep in mind though, this drone has no obstacle avoidance ability! So fly it in an open area free of trees, powerlines, etc. The Follow me functions also works well and tracks on the GPS signal on the remote. The same caution about this function also - no obstacle avoidance!

While, it would be great to have brushless motors, higher quality camera, and more features, this new drone by Holy Stone is an awesome picture platform at a great price especially when you keep in mind their customer service. IMHO that is.

title: Very easy to fly!
text:
Excellent quality and instructions. Very easy to fly as others have said.

I have owned several of those cheap mini $10 and $20 drones, which are very difficult to fly and quit working very quickly.

The HS100 was an instant success. The easy take-off / landing feature worked perfectly as advertised. The Return to Home feature worked great, although as warned by other reviewers and from YouTube videos, the drone will return the most direct route possible and will not avoid obstacles like the expensive drones, You need to make sure your path home is "clear". The camera is fine and adequate for my needs. If picture quality is important for you, this is probably not the right drone.

The ease-of-use is what I really appreciate. I have flown this drone from my heavily treed front yard without any issues. Even as a novice it has been very easy to navigate through the trees until I can get it up and over the trees. I have total confidence I can get it back home through the trees, even though it is quite a maze to get through.

I would highly recommend this as a very easy to fly "learning" drone.

text: Finally a drone with all of the features I want in a drone that doesn't break the bank. I also love that it has a beginner mode so you can get used to the drone before you take it out for a long flight. I would recommend this drone to anyone!  Great Price!!!

title: Great drone for beginners!
text: I got this drone for my birthday for use in the mountains camping, but have used it almost daily in open fields around home.  I've never flown one before, but this was simple to assemble and learn how to fly.  It even has a "beginner mode" that keeps it close to you until you get comfortable with the controls and flying based off the camera's FPV.  The Return Home feature is great for if you get turned around in the sky, and the Follow Me feature is great for action shots.  It also comes with spare parts for those of us beginners that are prone to a crash or two before really getting the hang of it.

title: The camera seems like it is built weak in comparison to the rest ...
text:
UPDATE: 7/17/2018
I have been extremely critical of this drone over time and with the upgraded camera along with a lower price, I believe it is worthy of a 5-star review. The customer service Holy Stone provides to the customers is nearly unmatched, and rivals Bose (known for their customer service). My statement still stands in terms of the camera, it seems weak in the build compared to the rest of the drone which is built fairly tough. Luckily, Holy Stone is fairly new to the mid-range market and I have hopes their next model that comes out will be a game changer for them and rival the likes of DJI. Overall, the flight is smooth and stable then when coupled with the App it is a fairly simple process to get your newly purchased drone in the air. I already own the DJI Spark, Ryze Tello, and HS190 from Holy Stone. I have a decent amount of experience with drones now, and on my DJI Spark I have 40hrs or so of flight time. This Holy Stone drone is a great addition to my growing collection and gives me a little more confidence when flying due to its strong build. I really wish Holy Stone would have had developed a gimbal for the camera as to create a more stable image. Luckily, you can work around that by flying smoothly when trying to capture the video shots you want and I highly suggest upgrading the camera to the new 1080p. Holy Stone has continued to listen to their customers and make improvements and over time I think they will be a competitor in the more expensive market once they establish a solid camera foundation. A huge deal to me is customer service, and Holy Stone nails it. You can rest assured that any issues you have, they will do everything in their power to make it right. They have DJI beat outright when it comes to their service and loyalty to their customers. If you want to test the waters of a larger drone and step up a little from the smaller drones I highly suggest you start with this one.

title: Photo quality excellent...

I am a beginner and this drone is good for what I use and gaining experience on how to fly the drone. Over all it is a good drone and the price is right.

title: Awesome Drone for the price!
text: I received the Drone within 2 days.  Instructions are very easy to understand and assembly of propellers were no issue.  Once I got the transmitter and Drone battery charged, I was able to add the App to my iPhone and begin my new hobby.  It was awesome and expect to be using a lot more.  Only issue is the battery length, but I knew that before the purchase.  Definitely would recommend.

title: Great Beginner Drone
text: This was one of my first legitiment ‚Äúbig‚Äù drones.  The  HS100 is 20‚Äù x  20‚Äù with the propeller guards installed and sits 7‚Äù tall.  It‚Äôs definitely not one of fastest drones out there ‚Äì but its quick enough to keep you from getting boards.  It uses a blue / white light combo ‚Äì although I prefer the red / green setup ‚Äì the lights are very easy to see from the ground.  The drone flies nice and smooth; and the layout of the updated HS GPS Pro app is great.  The flight time could be better ‚Äì but once again ‚Äì this is a bit of a bigger drone.  I did have some issues with my camera tilt ‚Äì but Holy Stone immediately sent a replacement camera which just snaps right in.  The drone does offer a limiting ‚Äúbeginner‚Äù mode which is controllable from the app which is great for letting the kids take over ‚Äì or if you just don‚Äôt trust yourself.  You set your ‚Äúsafety‚Äù distances and if the drone distance or height exceeds that set ‚Äì it pauses for a second and then returns to that distance set.  The controller is bit bulky and limited to just light up icons for status ‚Äì but the buttons are laid out well and easy to manipulate.  There are definitely nicer drones out there  - but for the price to fun ratio ‚Äì this one is right in the mark.

title: Great Drone!

There is a slight delay from the drone to the camera, but it is only a second or two. it can compensate for the wind very well, and keeps its altitude very stable. the auto takeoff and land features both work very well.

text: Great beginner drone easy to fly and takes good pictures. I had a couple issues with it and the customer service was great to deal with and made it really easy to get what I needed.

title: This is my first real drone and I love it.
text: I saw some fancy ad on Facebook about some drone and I ordered them. I was disappointed. They were junk and much like false advertisement. Then I did some research on Google for reliable and a good drone. This time I wanted to do my homework and I read a lot of reviews before I wanted to make the purchase. After reading a lot of reviews and research finally I came to choose this Holystone HS100. I ordered it and it arrived promptly. I have been playing around with it and I love it. After some minor assembly, I downloaded the app on my smart phone and turned on the camera indoor. It is amazing to see great photos and videos right on my phone screen. This machine is great. I am having a lot of fun with it and I love it. This is real folks and this is a good machine.

title: Great Drone and very intelligent controls!
text:
I have had few drones in the past and most of them were very cheaply designed and lacked functionality. Needless to say, I don't have them anymore since they crashed badly or they just flew away, never to be seen again. I had pretty much given up on Drones until I saw the intro videos to the HolyStone HS-100 Drone. The features like beginner mode which limits your flight distances and auto launch/land are great! I really love the Follow-Me Mode too! it works very well at the beach on a calm day! And the phone app and built in holder on the remote are very good features. I would recommend including a nice adjustable neck strap in the box since that is always something I add to my remotes.

I would recommend this drone to anyone from beginner to frustrated users like myself who need the drone to be a little smarter than I am. Happy Droning!

title: Excellent value
text:
Found Holy Stone offering 20% off for a few days before and after Thanksgiving. Read many reviews for HS 100 and was happy to see most were good or better. Ordered through Amazon and chose Free (5-7 business days) shipping. Received my drone 2 days later (WOW and thanks to Holy Stone).

Build quality is very good. Body is smooth, gaps are nearly invisible and all markings are either molded in or painted. No decals. Very nice. I've only had 3 flight sessions so far, but all seems to work as it should. Auto take off is great. Drone rises 3-4 feet and holds Altitude and location. Then I took over and, well, played a bit. Auto land is even better. As I played, more than once I let the drone wander outside my comfort zone. Auto land stopped it dead in it's tracks, then safely landed it. I've tried Return Home a few times. Pretty sure I wasn't far enough away to make it work properly. More sessions to come.

I haven't used the camera at all. I have noticed that a live image is displayed on my phone even before take off and it looks good. It should be interesting to use it once I can fly a bit better.

The only down side is the screws that secure the propeller retaining collar are really small.

So far, all I can say is that the reviews I read before the purchase were accurate. The drone operates as advertised. I am pleased (except for the screws).

title: Not what I was looking for...
text: This drone looks great.  I had some issues with Follow me and Return to home, and I don't recommend flying in high wind.  I was looking for a drone for photography and the still image quality didn't meet my expectations nor did the lighting requirements for capturing high quality video.  This is probably fine for a hobbyist and is a fun to fly drone for the cost.  Salmon from Holy Stone's customer service provided exceptional help and did everything in his power to help troubleshoot my issues both over the phone and via email.  If you are looking for a fun to fly drone  and don't need HD/4K image quality this is a good choice.

title: Fire hazard, no help from customer service
text:
Update- emailing pictures directly to the company they finally made it to someone who was concerned about it catching fire. Holy Stone‚Äôs customer service got better and after messaging for a couple days they will be sending a new drone to us. Definitely keep an eye on the battery while charging and maybe get a fireproof bag for charging.

Caught on fire within the first few hours of playing with it and because it was bought during prime days in July and stored until Christmas no one will do anything about it.

title: Good to use - I‚Äôd recommend

title: Very full-featured and easy to fly drone.
text:
Pros: Easy to fly. Take off and landing is an automatic push-button breeze. Return to home and follow features work great. Not at all stressful to fly for a novice. All said - great bang for the buck.
Cons: Video recording @ 720p was not great but on par for the sensor size, apature and the level of compression. The color tone and field of view was decent however.

title: Awesome, fun beginners drone.
text:
This drone is awesome! I've never flown a drone before and this one was so easy to fly. Instructions are clear and assembly was easy. It is very sturdy and even flew well in an ocean wind. The HSPro app worked great, so I was able to view the video perfectly while I was flying.

About the only thing that was sketchy was the GPS lock. I am in Panama so maybe the signal isn't as strong here as in the US or maybe the trees intermittently blocked the signal.

I'm going to need more batteries, since it takes so long to charge them up, and waiting for them to charge takes some of the fun out of it.

I highly recommend the HS100 as a very good beginners drone.

My husband has had drone envy for years and may also be able to use this for business purposes. He is thrilled with the pictures and video it produces as well as how well it works with his iPhone. The "follow me" mode is outstanding, as is the ability to fly home when the battery gets low (we've seen family members lose their drones over that). Wish the battery life was longer, but for what this drone does and for the price it's an exceptional toy.

title: Quality Drone
text: I‚Äôm very happy with this drone. Setup was easy and I was flying it within 30 minutes of opening the box. This is my first drone and I found it easy to calibrate and operate. The camera footage is compressed and doesn‚Äôt look great but it‚Äôs a cool feature to have. Overall I‚Äôm very happy with this drone.

title: Great Budget Drone-Camera amd Battery Could be Better
text: A pretty-well shared view of this drone is that it is a great drone. I hold this view completely. I have in addition to this drone a HS 220, which I found to be lacking in stabilization. This drone more than makes up for that problem. Its stable and its EXTREMELY powerful, it lifts into the air almost effortlessly. I love the versatility of the drone with the tilting camera and other features. A great pro to this drone is that I can actually rely on it to see something from the air without constant worry that it will simply be carried off. While one still must be carful and watchful of the drone, one can fly it with more assurance than with some of the smaller, lighter machines. All in all I only have two main complaints. One the camera is only 720p. I think it could stand to be at least 1080p, or maybe even a newer vairiant of the HS 100 with said camera, even though the price would be increased (although I hope only slighty increased since this is not a large upgrade). Next would be the battery life. Although I‚Äôve never timed it and ot may very well live up to the 12-15 minute battery life as stated by Holy Stone, it seems rather short to me and I would like a long flight time (especially for the lengthy time required to fully charge the battery). In spite of these issues, I would fully 100% reccomend the drone and, from what I‚Äôve experienced so far, Holy Stone as a drone company in general. The customer service is great, the extras that come with the drone (i.e. notebook and extra parts)bare great, and of courese the drone is fantastic.

title: Great drone !!!
text: Just got here today. Simple to assemble, easy to use. I love the home return button. An extra battery is a must

title: issue with locating the drone when its on headless mode.
text:
I purchase this product for my husband birthday. This is what he likes about this product the ease of use and responsiveness of the controls. Best feature is the return home and the worse is the headless mode. Return home calls the drone to go back to initial takeoff spot. It will also do it automatically if the drone becomes out of reach from the controller. Headless is based on the direction of the controller but is confusing when mixed with standard mode. He has issue locating the first drone when it flew off. It was on headless mode.
Customer service was great assisting us when we had trouble operating.

title: Excellent
text: I ordered my Holy Stone HS100 Sunday at 10p and it arrived Tue at Noon via USPS. Very prompt service. Package was well protected inside it's main box and also outer box. 15 year old son was able to unbox then assemble then fly all within 60 minutes. Blades were easily attached and instructions were very clear. SD card came installed. Battery was fully charged. Controller is easy to use and all buttons located logically. Learning curve was very short and we were off and flying and recording video and pictures in no time at all. We are still getting our drone wings under us so to speak. But I would highly recommend this drone to others.

title: Easy to fly, good beginner mode, easy take off and return/landing.
text: You get everything you need to fly this right out of the box. it is very easy to assemble the propellers on to the drone. I like the fact they give you extra replacement parts to start with. This is my first drone and it was easy to learn to fly it. Yes I have crashed a few times, but with the guards on it has not damaged anything. The video is good quality and the SD card for saving the pictures and video is very convenient. Customer service from Holy Stone is top notch service.

title: Feet on the ground, head in the clouds....
text: I received the Holy Stone HS100 as a gift and can't be happier with it. This is actually my second drone but the first with any advanced feature; GPS, video, Return home, Follow-me, etc. After getting past the calibration process, I have to admit I didn't read the instructions as closely as I should have (I was using the wrong axis for the vertical calibration :), this drone is great. Haven't used the multitude of features available on the HS100 yet but look forward to exploring them. I can say that the video quality, stability and Return home is excellent and the overall battery life is very good. I'm also pleased w/ the build quality as well as the multitude of spare parts that come in the box in the event operator error caused a tumble breaking and requiring the replacement of a blade, hasn't happened to me yet but sure it will at some point so I'm prepared when it does. The only downside up to this point is the overall time required to recharge the battery however this is easily enough corrected through additional batteries...

title: Perfect Drone to begin with
text:
Never having any drone experience the Holy Stone HS100 turned out to be a great choice. The automatic features like launch / land button, Return home button really help relieve fear and trepidation. The unit also has an advanced user mode for those familiar with remote control equipment. I would buy it again. Battery life became an issue for longer time to enjoy flying so I bought a second on board battery as a backup. Recommend for beginners.
Marcus

title: Overall Good Beginner Drone, Severe Customer service issues.
text:
UPDATE: The drone comes with a "free extra battery" offer. However, we have not been able to receive this battery since Christmas (2 months ago) because the manufacturer says they are "out of stock." However, they are in stock on Amazon. And they refuse to even provide an Amazon credit to buy the battery from Amazon.

Original Review:
Good beginner drone. Relatively easy to learn. The instructions could be a bit more clear, however. It has been fun.

title: Best beginner drone on the market
text: Haven‚Äôt got a chance to fly my drone yet since one of the motors was bad, but the support and customer service is great.  I‚Äôm sure once I receive the part the drone will be a great beginner drone.

title: Awesome!
text:
I got this for my bf for Christmas and he loves it. I did quite a bit of research and really glad I got this one. I‚Äôll let him write the rest of this review since he‚Äôs the one who has used it.

If I‚Äôd have bought a drone for myself, it would have been this one. It‚Äôs loaded with features and capabilities at a much more affordable price than similar drones. So, this one will work for me as a beginner, but also when I get experienced and want all the extra capabilities. If you buy this, here‚Äôs one tip. When you pull the parts out of the handy reusable case, flip the case over to find the propellers in a compartment on the bottom. At first, I couldn‚Äôt find them.

I got this assembled in minutes. I was impressed that it comes with extra propellers, propeller guards and landing gear. This thing looks really cool. The instructions are clear and simple. I downloaded the free app and had this thing synched and ready to fly in no time. Like more expensive drones, you can trim the controls if they are not well-tuned, but mine came already well trimmed.

Flying is easy. There is a button to automatically take-off and land, or you can do that manually. There is also return to home button - one push and it automatically flies back to where it started and lands itself. The controls have a good feel and sensitivity level. I haven‚Äôt tried the follow me function, but that should be fun and useful. The alititude hold is great for taking steady pictures and video. Speaking of that, the pic and video resolution is excellent. Another important thing - many drones have hard to see lights to tell which way it is facing. This one has very large lights marking the front and back. I could see them clearly from over 100‚Äô away.

If you‚Äôre looking for a full-featured drone at a great price, get this one. She also got me an extra battery - you‚Äôll want to get one.

title: Pretty cool to start out on
text: I like it because it is good for learning. It is durable. Most drones i have tried to learn on were such poor quality that one seriously flew off never to return. I am happy with the quality for the price.

title: The beginner mode makes learning easy and allows you to gain some technique before moving ...

title: Great choice for a first time pilot
text:
This is my first drone. It is easy to fly. I push the take-off button, and it lifts to about 5 feet and hovers there. I take it up, fly around, look at the live feed on my phone, take pictures/video, and smile a lot. When the battery gets low, I push the return home button. It flies straight to the spot above where it took off from. I push the land button, and it lands within a few feet of where it started. That's the experience I was hoping for. My kids can fly it, and they love to.

If you want a drone to take crisp hi-def pictures and video, I think you are going to have to spend a lot more money. The pics and video are in line with my expectations, so I am happy.

title: Perfect "Roof Inspector"
text: The roof shingles on my house are not visible from the ground. My new HS100 drone solved that problem.  It's very easy to fly. I felt confident after just two flights.  Now after a storm, I just fire this baby up and take a look at my roof (neighbors too!).  Buying this drone is a lot cheaper than having a contractor come out every time the wind kicks up.

YouTube videos also helped out when trying to take the first flight. After that was watched he was flying in no time. Excellent purchase!!

title: Great Drone for the money
text: This is my first drone. The customer support from Holy Stone is by far the best. They will take all the time you need. I went through setup and took to my first flight. I couldn't believe how high this drone flew, I was seriously impressed. The return to home feature is one of the best on this drone. I didn't take any pictures or videos yet. That will come. I'm more interested in learning to fly it and not crashing it. I bought the case for the drone, but the only thing is you have to remove the props and guards to get it in the case, bummer. I'm going to get a smaller drone to take on vacation with me too take shots of the beach. I don't think I would deal with any company other than Holy Stone. Thanks for a great product.

title: The Drone is easy to assemble & fly
text:
At first, when I opened the box, I was confused why there were so many parts. I put together the drone and there were extra legs, propellers, propeller guards and bunch of other things. Without spending too much time understanding the controls, I tested the drone after charging overnight. First flight in an open ground, not bad. With too much confidence, I tried flying in the neighborhood. Bad mistake, Flew into a tree and when it came down the legs were broken and the camera had come disconnected. After a week, I put it together and tested. The camera and controls still works. Then I realized I have extra legs in the box. Wow, thank you Holy Stone for already thinking ahead of beginners like me. Since then I have flown it a few times, carefully tracking the movements and I am getting better at controlling it, even in slight winds.
Great drone for a beginner.

title: What a great drone!!
text: [[VIDEOID:7c8e9d3960200f04945acfe0bcf06c41]] Its been a blast so far. Its fun and relatively easy to fly. The only problem I had was with my cell not connecting and a simple reboot of my phone fixed that. I love the fact that the drone will hover wherever I stop, this makes it easier to snap pic's or a video. The camera quality is great. All images are clear. Even during flight of the drone videos and pic's are perfect.  Also the beginner mode makes flying it easy. Having set points so it doesn't fly off out of control, helps me feel safe I wont crash it. My friend has a Best Buy drone where he spent double the price and this one the HS100 is by far superior. The best out of everything is the support you get from Holy Stone. They will do everything possible so you have a great experience flying their drone. They stand behind their products without trying to sell you more items.  I have already purchased and will continue to buy from Holy Stone!

title: Easy to use and excellent images.
text: I always wanted a drone, but was very afraid that whatever I spent would be a waste because I would crash the thing right after putting into use. I‚Äôve never used a drone and have limited gaming controller experience but I found this device to be easy to use and with the home button there is always a safety net.  Better than all the ease of flying is the quality images taken both with video and still photography.  I attached a picture I took on the very first time I put the Holy Stone into the air.

title: A solid drone/camera platform
text: I received this drone for Christmas this year so I have had it for about a month now.  I have never flown a drone before, so this was new territory for me.  In my opinion, this is a great intro into drones, especially if you are as interested in photography as flying.  I started in beginner mode, which limits the performance of the drone.  This was great for me to learn the basics of flight.  Within a few minutes, I was flying like a pro.  Once I removed the beginner mode, I was able to start exploring the capabilities of the drone.  The speed is good, especially in sport mode.  I was surprised at how far and high I could fly and maintain a connection over the wireless network.  The camera is solid and the ability to change the angle in flight was one of the key reasons that I selected this drone.  Because the camera is not mounted on a gimble, the video can be a little shaky at times - but that is one of the reasons why this drone is more affordable than some from DJI. You can minimize the shakiness of the video by slowing your movements when flying, especially when you come to a stop.  The smoother the flight, the smoother the video. All in all, I am very happy with the performance of the drone and camera system.  I think it is a very good choice for beginner and intermediate drone enthusiasts.  Happy flying!

title: They provide prompt help and great warranty.
text: Received my drone promptly. Very nicely packaged. The small amount of assembly easily accomplished. I fly fixed wing RC aircraft so I'm used to the tiny screws and such. Had some trouble with getting synchronized with GPS. A call to customer service was quickly answered and she got me squared away on what I was doing wrong. After a few enjoyable flights the controller kept showing low voltage and would not allow further flight. After a couple of e-mails with Wendy at technical support she sent me a new one under the warranty. Everything works great now. Would highly recommend this drone. Very easy to fly although my experience with RC aircraft may have helped.

title: Great for the price and excellent customer service!
text: I am really impressed by how easy the controls are, the clarity on the screen and the return to home function.  It maneuvered beautifully and gave us beautiful video and photos.  The first one I purchased fell out of the sky breaking off the camera and a propeller.  There is an emergency button that stops the engine and is also the landing  button.  I'm still not sure if the crash had something to do with that button.  The company immediately responded to my panic email about crashing the drone and after reviewing my situation sent me a replacement a week later.  Needless to say, I am very impressed by this company's customer service and support.

title: Caution with RTH Mode
text: After spending some time with my first drone, Syma X5C, I upgraded to the HS100. As for control, the transition was startling and disabled the beginner mode after just two flights. I chalk it up to flying a basic drone that gave me no sense of overconfidence and provided good basic skills. Its was like learning to drive with a standard transmission before driving an automatic. As for the HS100, it mostly lives up to what‚Äôs advertised but with one important caution. While going through function familiarity, be careful of the Smart Return To Home (RTH) function. The assumption is the drone will simply return to the take-off GPS coordinates, but is not the case. Ive done this several times with the same results. When the RTH function is pressed, the drone becomes stationary and then begins a steady accent. The problem is the altitude the drone climbs too can be disturbing if GPS distance, trees, or wind are a consideration. Once the drone reached this uncomfortable altitude, it progressed "very slowly" towards its take-off GPS coordinates. Obstacles and winds should be considered as there is the possibility of losing the drone in the RTH mode. I contacted Holy Stone about the RTH and was not offered any acceptable explanation with exception of basic or rudimentary questions that were answered at my initial contact with them. I truly believe there is a language barrier but in fairness they do respond and their customer relations is better than average. My personal explanation is the drone climbs in order to receive a GPS signal, and again the height can be a problem with the drone not avoiding obstacles. My suggestion is to test the RTH in a wide area void of any obstacles and as a practical manner, avoid the RTH unless absolutely necessary.  All the other functions worked as advertised and only suggest beginners take small steps while becoming familiar. I would also suggest buying an additional battery and charge cord as it can take up to 4 hours to charge a single battery.
